70b8: dag gi dbus kyi snying po la byang chub sems dpa' lus skes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa dag byung bar gyur to/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lha'i bu dpal bzangs ldan
71a1: kyis 'di skyed ces smras so/ / 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' 'de dag gang nas lhags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha bu ma tog 'di dgag las 'ongs pa nyid nas so// lha'i bres s+thAm
71a2: 'jam dpal me tog 'di dag ni sprul pa ste/ bdag gis khyod la mchod pa'i las bgyi ba'i slad du gtor to// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu ji ltar me tog 'di dgagra sprul pa yin pa ltang byang chub sems dpa'
71a3: de dag gi lus la'ang de bzhin du lta'o/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi cha 'jam pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi
71a4: zhal gyi bsgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ngo // de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mtha sa
71a5: mumed pa snang bas khyab par byas nas/ steng du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par byung ste/ gzi brjid kyis nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzi brjid ci'i khyim mnan nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub po//
71a6: de nas lha'i bu dpal bzangs ldan stan de las langs te/ bla ges phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom
71a7: ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa/ / gsang bzang dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis gzi brjid ldan// skyes chen mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis sna tshogs mnga'/ yon tan khrag khrig yon tan gzhal /
71a8: gzi brjid can// mgon po ci yi slad du 'dzum pa ston pa mdzad// sgra stan 'byin par mdzad cing rab tu gsung 'brel ba// tshangs pa'i dbyangs su gsung zhing 'jam pa'i tshig gsung ba/ nor bdun 'od zer rgya chen
71b1: bde gshegs blo gros ldan/ / ka la bad ka'i gsung can ci smad 'jam pa gsungs// mi mchog skyes bu dam pa ngan pa'i tshogs can 'dul// bdud kyi stobs ni rtag par tha mar 'byin par mdzad// lha dang lha minanapa
71b2: mkha' lding gis rtag mchod pa/ / stobs bcu ldan pas ci smad 'dzum pa bstan// dri med dri bral drim gsum spangs pa// zla ba nya ba 'dikyil 'a khor lta bur zhal rgyas pa// mun pa rab rib sgrib pa'i rdul gyi nyes
71b3: gcod pa/ / bde dang bde ldan sbyin par mdzad pa' rnga mngon gsungs// bde bar gshegs pas dang lha yul phan pa mchog/ bde dang bde ldan sbyin mdzad yon tan mtha' yas pa// mtshungs shing 'brel la legs gsungs
71b4: gsal ba'i gsung ldan pa/ / 'dzum bstan 'di don na rdo ltar rtogs par bgyi// ling tog smug po mun par rab rib rnam gsal ba// shes rab skyon ma 'od kyi gzibarjid ldan pa po// glang chen lha mchog stobs dang se
71b5: ge'i bstabs ltar brjid/ / 'gro ba'i don mdzad 'dzum pa'i don ni bstan du gsol// mi mem pa mi ngan tshogs can 'dul mdzad pa// zab cing mthong bar dga' la gting tshad dpag dka' ba// srid pa'i chu ni skems
71b6: mdzad mnyam pa med pa can/ / sgra med stobs bcu ldan gyis 'dzum pa ci slad bstan// rga shi zhi bar bgyi ba'i bdud rtse'i don stsol ba// zhabs ni 'jam zhing dra ba dag dang 'khor lor ldan// blun pa skyong mdzad srid pa
71b7: gsum na mnyam med pa/ / ye shes chen po mnga' bas 'dzu ma don bstan dragasol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bud la sang sa ngan la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu khyod kyis
71b8: byang chub sems dpa' steng gi bar snang la seng ge'i khri la pad ma'i snying po la 'khod pa 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu
72a1: byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa 'di dag thams cad ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i drung du chos mnyan pa dang / bzhi pa bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa'i phyir lhags so//
72a2: yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams cad ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yongs su smin par byas pa yin no// yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
72a3: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa yin te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams madri sna tshogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
72a4: rgyu bar 'gyur ro/ / lha'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gi grangs rtogs par rngo mi thog na ji snyed cig mchis/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu
72a5: la bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dgag grangs rtogs par nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gang skar
72a6: ma'i gzugs de dag thams cad ni skad cig thad cig/ yud tsam cig gis bgrang bar spro'o/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni la brgyar yang bgrang bar slob ma lags so//
72a7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gal te 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyis gang bar gyur kyang rdul phra rab de bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par nus kyi/ byang chub sems dpa
72a8: 'di dag ni bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa 'di dag ni de tsam du tshad med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'odi dag gang du byang
72b1: chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed mchis par ga la 'gyur/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu kha rog 'dug de skad ma smra shig/ shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas
72b2: kyi zhing tshad med pa dag de bzhin gshegs pas stong ngo / / shA ri'i bu yongs su brtag pa gzung na/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gyur la/ nyi ma re re thams cad
72b3: la'ang chos bshad pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'jug par gyur cing chos bshad pa thams cad la'ang byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed lung bstan par gyur la/ gang gis shar phyogs su sangs/
72b4: rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gcig mtshan mar gzhag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis de tsam du stong na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
72b5: k yi zhing gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sha'i spyan tha mal bas gzigs par 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skyes pa'i sems can de dag gi sems de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de
72b6: dag gis stong pa la lta ci smos/ de nas nyan thos chen po de dag dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ tshig 'di skad du bdag cag gi ston pa de dag de ltar rdzu 'phrul che/ de ltar mthu che/
72b7: de ltar ye shes gzigs pa chen po dang ldan te/ bdag bcag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa
72b8: steng gi bar snang la 'khod pa de dag bar snang de las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bskor nas phyogs bcur dong ngo // de nas 'jam/
73a1: dpal gzhon nur pa la lha'i bu dpal bzangs ldan gyis 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis mdzad pa mdzad cing sems can tshad med pa byang chub tu yongs su smin par mdzad pa legs so les
73a2: so/ / 'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub yongs su smin par bgyid pa'i chos las brtsams te spobs par mdzod cig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnam
73a3: kyi byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos ni sum cu rtsa lnga'o/ / sum cu rtsa lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dus su bskul ba dang / chod la bskul ba dang / ngan pa na bskul ba dang / dbang po la bskul ba dang / brtan par
73a4: bskul ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la bskul ba dang / thabs la bskul ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa la bskul ba dang / byams pa chen po la bskul ba dang / snying rje chen po la bskul ba dang / theg pa chen po la bskul
73a5: ba dang / theg pa dman pa la bskul ba dang / bden pa la bskul ba dang / de bya ba la bskul ba dang / chos bsrung bar bskul ba dang / thos pa bstan par bskul ba dang / sems can sna tshogs su mi dbye bar bskul ba dang /
73a6: tshul khrims 'chal ba dang / tshul khrims dang / ldan pa la sbyin pa'i gnas su mtshungs par bskul ba dang / bdud kyi las bstan par bskul ba dang / de bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par skul ba dang / 'khor bas yong
73a7: su mi skyo bar bskul ba dang / bdud gdul bar bskul ba dang byas pa shes pa dang / byas pa bzo bar bskul ba dang / rgyu zad pa la 'jug par bskul ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo la mi 'jigs par bskul ba dang / de
73a8: bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya bar sgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad la ci bya snyam pa la spro bar skul ba dang / 'jig rten gyi chos dang ma 'dres par skul ba dang / dgon pa la dga' bar bskul
73b1: ba dang / 'dod pa chung gang chag shes par bskul ba dang / 'das pa dang ma 'das pa mgrol ba dkyil ba da/ dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bskul ba dang /
73b2: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par skul ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su dag par blang bar bskul ba ste/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos
73b3: ni sum cu rtsa lnga po de dag go/ lha'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yongs su smin par byas pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bskyod du med pa yin te/ de ni phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis thul bar/
73b4: mi nus so// de ni phyin chad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i dregs pa bcus dregs par mi 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ tshul khrims kyis dregs pa dang / thos pas dregs pa dang / spobs pas dregs pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang /
73b5: tshigs su bcad pas dregs pa dang / dgon par gnas pas dregs pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pas dregs pa dang gzugs dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang / g.yog khor gyis dregs pa dang /
73b6: brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bsnyen bkur byed pas dregs pa dang bsam gtan dang / mngon par shes pas dregs pa dang / sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la dad pa'i lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang /
73b7: dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dag 'dod pa dang / bstod pa dang / bsngags par byed pa des kyang snyems pa med pa yin te/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dregs pa bcu
73b8: po de dag gis mi snyems rab tu mi snyems so/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lha'i bu dpal bzangs ldan gyis 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod phyogs gang na gnas pa dang / chos kyi
74a1: rnam grangs 'di gang na spyod pa der ni sangs rgyas 'byung bar blta'o/ / de na ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar blta'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// lha'i bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa
74a2: bzhin no/ / phyogs gang na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas pa de ni stong pa ma yin par mngon no// gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sprod par 'gyur ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi bdag po nyid brtson par mdzad do// gang
74a3: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nyan par byed/ mos par byed pa'i sems can de dag ni nga'i yin par 'gyur ro// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / mos pa'i sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul bar blta'o//
74a4: gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams
74a5: pa dang / gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po dang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag ji tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blang pa dang / gzung ba dang / bshad pa dang / kun chub par byed pa'i phyir
74a6: khyed la gtad do/ / nga ni ring por mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba 'gyur gyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis gnas par gyis shig/ byams pas
74a7: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzud par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams
74a8: pa de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzhi ba sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang / byang chub sems dpa' yongs su smin par byed pa zhes bya ba zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas
74b1: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
74b2: mngon par stod do/ / 'phags pa bzhi pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// @/ rgya gar skad du/ tri d+harma ka nA ma sU tra/ bod skad du/ chos gsum pa zhes bya ba'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub
74b3: sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun
74b4: chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di na mi blun po la la dam pa'i chos ma yin pa gsum dang ldan na sbyin pa dag mi sbyin zhing bsod/
74b5: nams dag mi byed la/ tshul khrims yang dag par spangs nas gnas par mi byed do// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang / ser sna dang / bag med pa ste/ dge slong dag 'di na mi blun po la lo dam pa'i chos ma yin pa
74b6: gsum po de dag dang ldan pas sbyin pa dag ma byin zhing bsod nams dag ma byas la/ tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas par ma byas pas/ lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems
74b7: can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ / dge slong dag skyes bu dam pa dam pa'i chos gsum dang ldan pa ni sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing / bsod nams dag byed la/ tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas par byed do// gsu
74b8: po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi chags pa dang / ser sna med pa dang / bag yod pa'o// dge slong dag dam pa'i chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na skyes bu dam pa sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byed la/ tshul khrims yang dag
75a1: bar blangs te gnas par byas pas lus zhig ste/ shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te bde bar gshegs pas
75a2: deskad gsungs nas/ ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gang phyir ser sna bag med pas// sbyin pa sbyin par mi byed de// de phyir bsod nams 'dod pa yi// mkhas pas sbyin pa sbyin par bya// ser sna can gyis
75a3: 'jigs pa ni/ / bkres dang bsgom pa 'di yin na// gang gis 'jigs pas 'dir ma byin// de nyid mi yi 'jigs pa yin// gang gis ser sna'i dbang gis na// yod ma byin pa 'jigs pa ste// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// de yis
75a4: byis pa bgos par 'gyur/ / gang dag ser sna spangs nas kyang // dus su sbyin pa sbyin byed na// shi yang de ni shi ma yin// rgyags bzangs po yi 'gron po bzhin// gang dag shin tu gtad dka' ba// nyung ngu'ang mang po gtong byed
75a5: na/ / btang ka gtong ba de dag ni// dka' ba'i las dag byed pa yin// dam pa min pas mi rtogs te// dam pa chos las 'da' mi byed// de phyir dam pa dam pa min// 'di nas shi bar 'gyur ba na// dam pa min pa dmyal bar
75a6: 'gro/ / dam pa dag ni mtho sa 'gro// nabs gtses pa la ni skyabs med de// tshe thung bas ni srog khyer dus kyang nye// 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'di mthong rnams kyis ni// bsod nams bde sbyor dag ni bya ba'i rigs// bud rje
75a7: spangs 'dir sto bas 'cha ba grang / / dka' bas byin pa zung du byin na yang // stong ga mchod sbyin brgya stong byed pa ni// des bcu drug char yang mi pod do// ci phyir mchod sbyin yangs shing rgya cheg// mchod sbyin 'thun pa de yi la ma
75a8: 'gro/ / ji ltar stong gi mchod sbyin chernams kyang // de yi bcu drug char mi 'gyur zhe na// byis pa la la gsod cing 'chi byed 'dir// gzhan nor ma byin len byed brlag par 'gyur// mchi ba'i gdong bcas chad par bcas pa yi//
75b1: yo na de'i mchod sbyin 'thun pa'i lam mi 'gro// de ltar mchod sbyin yangs shing rgya che ba// mchod sbyin mthun pa'i lam du mi 'gro la// de ltar stong gi mchod sbyin stong rnams kyang // de yi bcu drug char yang mi phod do//
75b2: la la gang dag gzu lums ma yin pa// chos bzhin nor rnams thob pa gtong byed pa// de dag gtad dka' de rnams btang bas na// rang gi bsod nams kyis ni lte gnas 'gro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
75b3: nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// chos gsum pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi le ts+tsha ba ban de de ba
75b4: tsan dras bsgyur/ lo ts+tsha ba dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa// // @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya d+harmA ke du ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi mdo theg pa chen po'o//
75b5: sangs rgyas deng byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
75b6: dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal mtshan bya ba 'dug pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan/ 'das la 'di skad
75b7: ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rig
75b8: kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'dir byang chub sems dpa' dad pa dang ldan par bya ba dang / byang chub
76a1: kyi sems dang ldan par bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su ma gtang ba dang / dgon par bstan cing 'du 'ju brang ba dang / bla ma dang mkhan pa'i gdams ngag yongs su stsal ba dang / snying rngu
76a2: dang ldan pa dang / mang du thos pa dang / ldan pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pas don ma lus par sgrub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bkru
76a3: stsal pa dang / rti rje dang byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi mdo rdzogs so//
76a4: rgya gar skad du/ d+harma sa mu dra na ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ theg pa chen po'i mdo chos rgya mtsho zhes bya ba/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho'i gling bran po ta la
76a5: ke'i ri la rgyal ba'i sras mi ldog pa bal po ches bskor cing mdun du byas te bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bka' stsal pa/ skyes
76a6: bu dam pa chos kyi gtam ci 'dod pa dri bar gyis shig ces 'dod pa la rtog cing mi rten pa dang / mi 'chang ba dang / nga rgyal med pa dang / shes rab dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / stong pa nyid la shin tu mos pa dang ldan
76a7: te/ yod pa dang med pa spangs pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa la rtags pas grangs med par 'khor bar 'gyur/ ji ltar na dge bar gsungs pa'i chos dang / 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
76a8: bsnyen par rdzogs pa lags/ / 'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos rnams las 'das pa dang / gnas ngan len la rten cing 'jug pa'i sems dang / yid dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa las 'das te/ mi gnyis pa'i chos thos
76b1: pani shin ta rab tu byung ngo / / sems can gang za dad pa 'di lta bus rab tu byung ba de ni yang dag par rab tu byung ba'o// gang rab tu byung yang tshul khrims dang / spyod yul dang / 'tsho ba dang / lta ba dang / bsam pa nyams pa ste/ de ni mgo dang kha spu
76b2: bregs kyang don med pa ste/ rnyog pa 'chang bas rang rnyog pa des ngan song du gzhol ba yin no// ngas dad pas byin pa spyod du gnang ba ni rigs pas grol ba ste/ dge slong gang brtsol ba mi 'dor ba des gzugs mi 'dor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
76b3: byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi 'dor/ phung po lnga tha dad pa dang / ril gyis brtags pa'i rang bzhin pas na mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par lta ba de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis khams dang / skye mched rnams
76b4: ma yin par spro ba dam par byed pas rtag tu bsgom mo/ / snying po med pa dang / 'brum pa can/ zug rngu can dang ldan pa/ skyon can/ pha rol po slu ba'i chos nyid ces sun 'byin pa de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul du sbyor bas/ gang lus kyis lus
76b5: la srid pa dang / lus la byams pa dang / lus la bdag yid ches pa dang / lus la zhen pa de dag rab tu spong ngo // gang 'di lta bu'i dge slong ni dge bar gsungs pa'i chos dang 'dul ba la rab tu byung bar gyur/ dad pas bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i
76b6: yang dag par rdzogs pa yin te/ 'di lta bu'i dge slong ni lha dang 'jig rten tu bcas pa rnams kyi sbyin gnas su gyur pa'o// de nas byams pa byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten gyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa
76b7: bcom ldan 'das kyis ci las dgongs te 'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos rnams la 'das shing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams thos pa de ni dge bar gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung bar gyur/ bsnyen
76b8: par rdzogs pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa zhes gsungs/ gzhan gang zhig rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs kyang bdag bslus pa ste/ pha bang ltar byi ba yang
77a1: ma yin/ bya yang ma yin pa bzhin du de ni khyim pa yang ma yin/ rab tu byung ba yang ma yin pas na glen pa'i skyes bu de de lta bu'i tshul du zung shig/ skyes bu dam pa 'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos de dag ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ de
77a2: las 'da' bar yang mi nus/ 'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos ni yongs su ma rdzogs pas na/ de las 'da' bar yang dga'/ sems can gyi khams ni phyin yang med/ nang na yang med de// gnyis kar yang dmigs su med pas na/ gang
77a3: sems can gyi khams kyi dngos po de ni 'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos kyi dngos po ste/ de las 'da' bar yang dga' ba de la kye rgyal ba'i sras bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos las 'das shing 'jig rten las 'das/
77a4: pa'i chos thob pa'i dge slong de ni rab tu byung bar gyur/ bsnyen par rdzogs par yang dag par rdzogs pa ste/ de ni dad pas byin pa spyod pa'i mchod gnas su gyur pa'o zhes gsungs pa yang kye rgyal ba'i sras rten pa'i gnas
77a5: med na/ de la 'thob pa gang ci ste 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams 'thob par 'gyur na de ni dmigs par gyur pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid ni mi
77a6: dmigs pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di ltar dgongs nas 'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos las 'das shing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thob pa de ni dge slong yang dag par gyur pa ste/ dad pas byin pa spyod pa'i mchod gnas
77a7: so/ / de nas byams pa byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten gyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci las dgongs te/ brtson pa mi 'dor ba'i dge slong gang gis gzugs mi 'dor/ tshor ba dang
77a8: 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi 'dor ba de ni rab tu byung ba'i dge slong ste/ de ni dge bar gsungs pa'i chos kyi 'dul ba la shin du rab tu byung bar gyur pas na 'di lta bu'i dge slong ni dad pas byin pa spyod pa'i
77b1: mchod gnas su gyur pa'o zhes gsungs/ 'jig rten gyi dbang pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcom ldan 'das kyis chos nyid la dgongs te chos kyi dbyings nang na yang med/ byin yang med de/ gnyi gar yang dmigs su
77b2: med pas na nad med par btags pa dang / mi skye bar btags pa dang / mi 'gag par gdags pa rnams gdags su med pa ste/ sems can gyi khams mnyam pa bzhin du chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid chos kyi dbyings mnye
77b3: pa bzhin du sems can gyi khams mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid du mi gnyis te gnyis su medade// de mi gnyis te gnyis su med pas na de la dor ba yang med/ mi dor ba yang med/ gang dor ba yang med
77b4: mi dor ba yang med pas na de la mnga' ba dang / thob par mi nus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di ltar dgongs nas gdags su med pa'i dge slong btags pa la mi 'jug go/ gang yi ge med pa'i dge slong yi ge las 'das
77b5: pa ste/ de la grangs kyis bstan par yang mi rung ste/ de ni mi 'ong mi 'gro mi gnas mi 'dug nyal bar yang mi rtog go/ zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba rnams mi dmigs pa'i dge slong la brtags pa ste/ spyod pa rnams kyang brtag
77b6: pa'o/ / log pa la rnam pa mang du rtog pa'i dge slong spyod pa ni ma brtags pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar dgongs nas 'di lta bu'i dge slong ni dad pas sbyin pa spyod pa'i sbyin gnas su gyur pa'o// de nas bcom
77b7: ldan 'das kyis spyan ras gzigs dbang po byang chub sems dpa' la dge ba byin te ngas dgongs te bshad pa bzhin du skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis bstan pa ni dge'o dge'o/ / dge bar gsungs pa'i chos kyi 'dul ba la rab
77b8: tha byung ba 'di bla na med pa dam pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya ste/ 'di tshul khrims nyams pa dang / ma dul ba dang / nga rgyal mngon par byed pa rnams kyi mdun du mi bshad par gyis shig/ de lta bu de dag rnams kyi snyoms
78a1: ba spang ba'i phyir phyag rgya 'di la gang gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes rab kyis bltas shing mi dmigs pa'i lus mngon du byas na/ des yid kyi lus myur drang thob bo// gang gi yid kyi lus des grang
78a2: med pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu smin par byed do/ / de nas chos kyi gzhung 'di bshad pa'i tshe dge slong bdun stong zag pa med par mi skye ba'i sems rnam par grol bar gyur// byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu mi
78a3: skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur/ dmigs pa can gyi dge slong lnga brgya chos kyi gzhung 'di mi sgrub cing mi 'jug pa dang / ma dad pas na stan las langs te dong ngo // bcom ldan 'das ngas dgongs de gsungs
78a4: po 'di dag 'jig rten thams cad yid mi ches pa'i gnyen po yin pas na chos kyi gzhung 'di dmigs pa dang bcas pa rnams mi 'thun pa'o/ / yod pa ma yin pa la brtan pa rnams dang mi 'gal te/ dge ba'i shes gan
78a5: gyi gzung ba rnams dang / zab mo'i chos la mos pa rnams dang / skyo zhing chog shes pas bsnyungs te dben pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa rnams
78a6: kyis nga'i chos kyi gzhung 'di la ston par shes so/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu gang zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na 'gro ba mang po'i mdun na smra zhing chos 'chad kyang chos de 'jig rten thams
78a7: cad 'asam grags na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ci 'gro ba mang po de rnams yod de/ gang des sangs rgyas kyi chos bshad pa dang mi 'gal ba snyam du sems sam/ byams pas smras pa/ rmil ma ni yang dag par ma
78a8: mchis pa ste/ 'khrul pa tsam zhig mchis par bas na de ngan 'gro phal po che la tshes 'chad par gyur pa lta ga la zhig mchis/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar de bzhin du chos thams cad ni rmilam dang mtshungs te/ yang
78b1: dgra pa ma yin par 'byung bar byung nas klung med par gyur pa ste/ kun rdzob kyang 'khrul pa tsam zhig yod kyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no// 'phags pa'i shes rab kyis jil ba mngon du byas na pas ma gtan sems
78b2: pa'i bsam gtan pa yang mi dmigs pa ste/ de la chos kyi tshul tsam zhig yod kyi kun tu brtags pa dang gzhan gyi dbang las kyi rnams ni yod pa ma yin no// de ltar de bzhin du chos 'di na 'jig rten pa thams cad dang
78b3: mi mthun pa'o/ / chos 'di dag la dmigs pa rnams kyis ni don dam par 'dzin gyi 'phags pa'i rnams ni mi dmigs so// byis pa rnams mi shes pas de la mngon par zhen pas na dmyal ba dang / yi dgas rnams
78b4: kyis sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs pa myong bar 'gyur ro/ / chos kyi gzhung 'di ji lta ba de ni dmigs pa'o// ji ltar dmigs pa de ni chos thams cad do// de ltar dus gsum gyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de/ mi
78b5: dmigs pas na gang dmigs pa de ni rtogs pa'o/ / gang rtogs pa de ni thob pa/ gang thob pa de ni byang chub gang byang chub pa de ni de bzhin nyid/ gang de bzhin nyid pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yang dag pa'i mthu de ni
78b6: stong pa nyid/ gang stong pa nyid de ni mtshan ma med pa/ gang mtshan ma med pa de ni smon pa med pa/ gang smon pa med pa de ni don dam pa/ gang don dam pa de ni chos kyi dbyings/ gang chos kyi dbyings de ni gnyis su med pa'i
78b7: mtha' gang gnyis su med pa'i mtha' de ni dbu mar sgrub pa/ gang dbu mar sgrub pa de ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku rtag pa/ brtan pa mi 'gyur ba ste/ rtag pa yang ma yin/ mi rtag pa yang ma
78b8: yin te/ de ni gdags pa yang ma yin/ mi gdags pa yang ma yin/ gang gdags pa yang ma yin mi gdags pa yang ma yin pa de ni 'jig rten pa yang ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa yang ma yin/ gang 'dzi/
79a1: rten pa yang ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa yang ma yin pa deni brjod du med pa/ gang brjod du med pa de ni chung bad kyar med pa ga cung zad kyang med pa de na sems can rnams kyi bsad nams rgya/
79a2: shi ga sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi zhing de ni ston pa/ gang ston pa de ni rnam par mi rtog pa/ gang rnam par mi rtog pa don dmigs pa myed pa/ gad dmigs pa med pa de na mi 'gyur ba grub pa/ gang mi 'gyur
79a3: bgrub pa de ni 'di bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che sa/ 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ji ltang mos pa thams cad byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mang po de dag
79a4: gis tshig 'thun par smras pa/ chos kyi gzhung 'di gangadan spyod pa'i sa phyogs de rdo rje lta bu ste/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams bzhugs pas na sems can de mAr du mngon par shes pa dang / dbang ngo //
79a5: non par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// gang zhig chos kyi gzung 'di la rjod dam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ kha don du byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na de bdud kyi dbang du mi 'gyur ro//
79a6: ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa 'di bshad nas 'jig rten gyi dbang po dang / byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang / lha dang mir bcas pa dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar
79a7: bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa la mngon par dga'o/ / theg pa chen po'i mdo chos rgya mtsho zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// // chos kyi rgya mtsho sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis bya
79a8: chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gnas bshad pa le'u bcu ste/ bam po dang po// sangs rgyas kyi bu thams cad thal mo sbyor la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims chen po bshad pa sems theg pa nas nyon
79b1: cig/ mang po tshogs pa yid bsdus te nyon cig/ bdag la kun du ltung ba yod par shes na mthol tshangs byos shig/ mthol tshangs byas na bde bar 'gyur ro// mthol tshangs ma byas na sdig phyir zhing zab tu skye'o// kun tu
79b2: srur ba med na ma smra bar 'khod cig dang / kun kyang gtsang mar mngon no// legs pa chen po yod pa'i rnams dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa brtags par nyon cig/ sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das
79b3: pa'i phyir na mchod rten las chos byed pa'i tshe so sor thar pa la btsun cing lci ba dang / gus shing rin cher byos shig/ so sor thar pa zhes bya ba'i tshul khrims ni 'di yin na// tshul khrims 'di bzung na mun pa
79b4: las snang par phrad pa dang mtshungs so/ / mi dbul po las nor chen po thob pa dang mtshungs so// nad pa sman rnyed pa dang mtshungs so// btson khri mun nas phyung ba dang mtshungs so// lam ring por sod pa las slar 'gro
79b5: ba dang mtshungs te/ 'di ni kun gyi mkhan po chen po yin par mngon par sangs rgyas 'jig rten na bzhugs pa na dang mi mtshungs pa med do// 'jigs pa'i sems ni skye dka'/ dge ba'i sems ni g.yo dka' bas na
79b6: kha na ma po bo las brnyas te med snyam du byas na chu'i thigs pa chud mod kyi/ rgyun gyis na snod chen po 'gad do// yud tsam gyi bar du sdig byas pas na bstir med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo // re shig mi lus sto
79b7: na bsal pa khri'i bar du yang slar mi lus mi thob po/ / dang ba'i tshe me sdong ngo // dper na ni rta rgyags pa dang 'dra/ mi'i tshe yang rtag pa med de/ dpa' rgal gyi chu 'bab pa bas kyang myur te/ de ri son mod kyi/ sang gi gnyal
79b8: yang dka'o/ / da dus kho na la bab kyis mang po'i rnams sems nas sems gcig tu 'grus shing 'bogs pa btsal ba'i rigs so// bag byas la le lo blo khyed dang / nyal ba dang / gnyid kyis log cing rang nyams
80a1: kyi yang mi bya'o/ / mtshan zhing ni sems bsdus la rtag par dkon mchog gsum gzungs su bzung la phyal ba don med pa la nyon mongs ngal chad cing tshe phyi ma la yang rab tu 'gyod pa mthar ji'ang thob pa
80a2: med par mi bya'o/ / mang po'i rnams gcig nas gcig tu tshul khrims 'di bzhin legs par byos shig/ de'i tshe na sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis mang po'i phyir chu bo gang gA'i brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyis brjod du
80a3: med pa'i chos kyi sgo mo'i mde phye ste/ de'i nang nas sems kyis gnas spu nyag ma'i mgo rnyed do// snga ma 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la yang bshad do// da ltar gyi sangs rgyas la yang de bzhin 'chad do// ma 'ongs
80a4: pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la yang de bzhin 'chad bar 'gyur ro/ / dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' lobs pa dang / slob pa dang / slob par 'gyur ro// ngas bskal pa brgya'i bar du sems kyi gnas 'di
80a5: byas pas na nga'i mkhan po rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku zhes bya'o/ / khyed sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ngas bshad de cog gcig nas gcig tu sems can thams cad la sems kyi gnas lam phye shig/ de nas pad
80a6: mo'i snying po'i snod kyi khams na gnam gyi 'od lham me lhang de ba'i seng ge'i gdan gyi steng nas sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'od btang ste/ 'og gi me tog stong gi thog gi sangs rgyas la sbran te/ nga'i sems
80a7: kyi gnas kyi chos kyi sgo mo'i le'u gzungs su zud la deng shig/ yang gcig nas gcig tu 'bum phrag brgya'i yang phrag stong gi shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad la mthar kyis nga'i yan chad kyi sems kyi gnas
80a8: kyi chos kyi sgo mo'i le'u shod de khyed la sogs pa sems gcig tu gzungs su zung la byos shig/ de nas me tog stong gi thog gi sangs rgyas 'bum phrag brgya'i yang phrag steng gi shAkya thub pa pad mo'i snod kyi kham
80b1: na lham me ltang de ba'i seng ge'i khri las langs te/ so so nas mchi phyag 'tshal te phyir nur nas lus kun gyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od btang ste/ kun 'od kyi nang nas grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas byung ste/ gcig na/
80b2: grangs med pa'i me tog sngon po/ ser po// dmar po/ dkar pos rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku sangs rgyas la yon du gsol nas yan chad sems kyi phyi mo'i le'u bshad pa yang khong du chud nas so sa pad mo'i snong
80b3: khams kyi nang du nub ste/ rang bzhin gyis bskal pa stong pa nyid kyi nang du nub nas me tog 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin thug ma byung ba'i gnas su slar song s+t+wa~M/ 'dzam bu'i gling byang chub kyi shing drung du phyin nas rang bzhin
80b4: bskal pa me tog 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin las byung ste/ gdod rdo rje'i rgyal po'i gdan dang / 'od shin tu bzang po'i khang par 'dug nas phyogs bcu'i chos rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa bshad do// de nas yang seng ge'i
80b5: las langs te sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi pho brang du phyin nas gral bcu'i chos bshad do/ / de nas zung ma'i gnam du phyin te/ las su bya ba bcu bshad do// de nas yang khri las langs te rgyal chen ris bzhin
80b6: gnam du phyin nas phyogs shing lta ba bcu bshad do/ / de nas yang 'dug pa'i sa nas langs te/ 'phrul dga'i gnam du phyin nas bsam gtan mi 'gyur ba bcu bshad/ de nas yang 'dug pa'i sa nas langs
80b7: te gnam bden gnam du byin nas sa bcu'i chos bshad/ de nas yang bsam gtan gcig gi nang du phyin nas rdo rje bcu bshad/ de nas yang bsam gtan gnyis kyi nang du phyin nas bzod pa bcu'i chos
80b8: bshad/ / de nas yang bsam gtan gsum gyi nang du phyin nas smon lam bcu bshad/ de nas yang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i nad chen po che ba dbang mchog 'du mched gnas kyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin te/ de'i
81a1: thog ma'i phyi mo'i pad mo me tog sna tshogs kyi khams rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyis sems kyis gnas kyi chos kyi phyi mo'i le'u bshad pa bshad do/ / gzhan 'bum phrag brgya'i yang phras
81a2: stong gi shAkya thub pa yang de bzhin te/ gnyis su med do// tha dad pa yang med do// bsam gtan bskal pa'i le'u'i nang nas kyang zhib tu bshad do// de'i tshe shAkya thub pa pad mo'i me tog snod kyi khams kyi shar phyogs nas/
81a3: byung nas lding ba'i khang bu'i nang du zhugs nas bdud kyis chos mnos pa bzhin du bshad zin nas/ yas babs te 'dzam bu'i gling gi ka bi lar skyes nas yum gyi mtshan ni lha mdzes chen mo// yab kyi mtshan ni zla
81a4: gcang ma/ nga bdag gi ming ni sid+d+han+da zhes bya ste/ lo bdun na rab tu byung / lo sum cu nas sangs rgyas su phyin nas nga'i mtshan ni shAkya thub pa zhes bya ste/ mi 'gyur ba'i gtsang ma'i sar rdo rje'i me tog gi khri la 'dug/
81a5: nas dbang po chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin te/ de'i nang gi 'dug pa bcu'i gnas mthar gyis bshad/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi sa rus gtsang ma chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal po dra ba'i rgyal mtshan mthu
81a6: ba'i phyir grangs med pa'i khams dpar na dra ba'i bu gu dang mtshungs par bshad na khams gcig nas gcig so so'i mi mthun te tha dad pa'i grangs med do/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgo mo bshad pa'ang de dang 'dre
81a7: 'o/ / ngas khams 'dir lan brgya stong phyin te/ khams 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i phyir rdo rje'i khri steng du 'dug ste/ dbang po chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin nas de'i nang gi mang po thams cad sems kyi
81a8: gnas kyi mdo che'o/ / de nas gnam gyi pho brang nas mar babs te/ 'dzam bu'i gling byang chub kyi shing drung du phyin nas/ de'i sa'i steng gi sems can blun po ma rabs rnams kyi phyir thog ma phyi ma rdzogs longs
81b1: spyod pa'i sku sangs rgyas kyis sems kyi gnas kyi nang bshad do/ / sems thog ma g.yos pa ni rtag par 'od snang ba'i tshul khrims gcig kha don du klog go/ rdo rje rin po che'i tshul khrims ni sangs rgyas thams
81b2: cad kyi thog ma'i phyi mo yin no/ / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ni thog ming phyi mo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sa bon no// sems can thams cad la yang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi skal pa yod/
81b3: do/ thams cad kyi shes pa dang / kha dog dang / sems dang yid dang / sems so cog thams cad kun kyang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi nang du 'dus so// tshul khrims kyi nang na rtag pa yun du rtag par bsod nas
81b4: yod do/ / rtag pa yun du rtag par chos kyi lus yod do// so sor thar pa 'di rnams bcu ni sangs rgyas kyi dbyings nas byung nas chos kyi tshul khrims byas te/ dus gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyis gzung
81b5: sa 'dzin to/ / nges de mang po 'di'i phyir zad pa'i mtha' med pa'i tshul khrims kyi le'u bcu bslabs te bshad do// rdzogs longs spyod pa de bdag ste// pad mo'i dbus su gdod bzhugs nas// mtha' bzhi'i me tog
81b6: stong gi stong / / shAkya thub pa stong du bzhugs// me tog gcig khams 'bum phrag brgya// khams de gcig kyang sprul pa gcig/ kun kyang byang chub shing drung bzhugs// mnyam par sangs rgyas gnas su son/
81b7: dayang 'bum phrag brgya pa stong // rdzogs longs spyod pa rang bzhin lus// sprul pa 'bum phrag brgya stong po// kun kyang rdul phran mang bar 'dren// gcig na rang yiganas su 'ongs// sangs rgyas dal tshul
81b8: khrims nyon/ / zil ngar sgra med nas bya// bung nas 'bum phrag brgya stong po// sbed du gtsang ma'i gnas su phyin// kun kyang byang chub shing drung bzhugs// da pe mkhan po tshul khrims kha ton lhags// tshul
82a1: khrims chen po rtogs par lnga bcu brgyad/ / tshul khrims snang khyad nyin zla bzhin// gcig tu nor bu yang nyo 'dra// byang chub sems dpa' rdul phran bzhin// 'di yi yon gyis yang dag 'grub// gdod rdzog
82a2: longs spyod nyid kyis blags/ / ngas kyang de bzhin kha ton blags// byang chub sems dpa' gsar slob pa// glang la khyer zhing khrims bzung bzhin// thub bzhin gcig tu sems can ston// nga yi bde blag rtag par nyon//
82a3: sangs rgyas chos rnams tshul khrims snod// so sor thar pa shes rab bzhin// mang po yid kun brtags par ches// khyed rnams sangs rgyas phyin par 'od// nga yi sangs rgyas phyin zin kyang // rtag par 'di bzhin
82a4: yid ches byed/ / tshul khrims le'u kun tshig gtsang zin// yid sems yod pa thams cad ni// kun kyang sangs rgyas khrims kyis bsdu// sems can sangs rgyas khrims mnod pa// de nas sangs rgyas sa
82a5: ru phyin/ tsher chen sa dang mtshungs zin te// sangs rgyas kun gyi bu yang dag/ mang po kun gyis gus par byas// sems gcig brtul te ngaklog nyon// de'i tshe na shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas thog ma byang chub shing drung
82a6: bzhugs bla na med pa'i g.yung drung rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo/ / byang chub sems dpa'i thog ma so sor thar pa'i 'dud pa ni pha ma dang / dge 'dun dang / dkon mchog gsum la sri zhu dang / yid dang mi 'gal bar bya'o// sri zhu
82a7: byas te bla ma'i yid dang mi 'gal ba ni chos zab mor thob pa'i gzhung ste/ sri zhu'i ming ni tshul khrims so// ming gcig tu ni sdom pa dang / gtong ba'o// de nas 'od snang ba grangs med pa 'byung ba/ de'i tshe 'bum phrag
82a8: brgya stong mang po tshogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / gzugs yod pa'i khams kyi gnam bcwa brgyad dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnam rim pa drug gi lha dang / rgyal po chen po rnams thal mo sbyar
82b1: te/ sems gcig tu mnyan nas sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims chen po blags te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ da ltar zla ba phyed phyed cing bdag gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims
82b2: kha ton du klog go/ khyed la sogs pa thog ma sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang kha ton du lhogs shig/ sems g.yos te phyogs pa bcu dang / g.yo zhing bskyed pa bcu dang / rdo rje
82b3: bcu pa dang / sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang kha ton du ltogs shig/ 'dun tshul khrims kyi 'od kha nas byung ste rgyu yod/ rkyen med pa'i 'od ma yin te/ 'od sngon po dang / dmar po dang / ser po// dkang ngo //
82b4: nag po yang ma yin/ kha tog kyang ma yin/ sems kyang ma yin/ yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin/ rgyu rkyen gyi chos kyang ma yin te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni gdod ma phyi mo byang chub sems
82b5: dpa' thams cad kyi ni lam gyi rtsa ba bas na mang po thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams kyi rtsa ba'i phyi mo zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams kyis kyang gzungs su bzung ba'i rigs so// legs par
82b6: bslabs pa'i rigs so/ / sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams brtags par nyon cig/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims nod na ni rgyal po dang rgyal bu dang / blon po che phra dang / dge slong phos spos dang / gzugs kyi kham kyi gnam bcwa
82b7: brgyad dang / 'dod pa'i khams gnam drug dang / gdol pa dang nyid grum dang / pho g.yam dang / mo g.yem dang / bran phos spos dang / lha ma srin sde brgyad dang / phyag brnyan dang / byol song dang / 'phrul zhing 'gyur ba
82b8: mi la sogs te chos kyi mkhan po'i tshig brda phrad pa'i rnams thams cad tshul khrims gnod du rung ste/ kun kyang ming rab tu gtsang ma zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ so sor
83a1: thar pa la bas pham pa bcu yod do/ / sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims mnos pa ni tshul khrims 'di kha ton dum blags na byang chub sems dpa' yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyis bon yang ma yin/ da yang /
83a2: 'di bzhin du kha ton du klog go/ lobs zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / phyis slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ngas so sor
83a3: thar pa'i gzungs kyi mdo tsam zhig bshad kyis bslab cing gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs so/ / sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ bdag gis bsad pa dang / mi gzhan gsod du bcug pa
83a4: dang / thams cad kyis bsod pa gsod pa la sdod pa gsod pa mthong na dga' bar sems pa/ sngags dang / rngad mo byas te bsad pa/ gsad pa'i rgyu/ gsad pa'i rkyen/ gsad pa'i chos byed pa/ bsad pa'i las byed
83a5: la sogs te sems yod do cog la ched kar gsad du mi rung / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni rtag par snying rje ba dang / sri zhu che zhing mi 'gal ba'i sems rtag par g.yos te bags kyis sems can
83a6: thams cad kyi ra mda' dang / 'or ba bya ba'i rigs so// bdag gis rang nyams byas te snyid tshim par sems can bas dan/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag gis ma byin par blang
83a7: sam/ pha rol po ma byin par len du bcug gam/ thabs kyis ma byin par blangs sam/ mabyin par len pa'i rgyu/ mabyin par len pa'i rkyen/ mabyin par len pa'i las byed pa/ sngags sgyum byas te nor khyer lasaH
83a8: te/ lha ma srin dang / bdag po yod pa dang / yang blo'i nor rdzas dang / nor rdzas so cog la khab dang / rtswa nyag ma gcig la nges ched kar ma byin par blangs su mi rung ngo // byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin
83b1: skyed la/ srid zhu'i yid dang mi 'gal zhing / byams zhing snying rje bar byas te rtag par sems can no cog gi yon tan dang / bsod nams bskyed pa'i rigs so// de la slar log par mi'i nor rdzas ma byin par blangs na byang chub sems
83b2: dpa'i phas pham pa'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag mi tshangs par spyod dam/ gzhan mi tshangs par spyod par bstan nam/ bud med do cog la mi tshangs par spyod par byed pa dang / gzhan la mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod dri
83b3: rgyu dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa'i rkyen dang / mtshangs par spyod pa'i chos byed pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa'i las byed pa dang / byol sor dang / lha dang / lha ma srin gyi bu mo la mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / chos dang 'gal ba'i mtsham
83b4: par spyod na byang chub sems dpa' ni sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems kyis sems can thams cad thar pa'i ra mda' bya zhing chos gtsang ma gzhan la sbyin pa'i rigs so/ / de la slar mi'o cog la mi tshangs par spyod pa bskyed de/
83b5: byol song dang / ma dang bu mo dang / srid mo la sogs te gnyen pa drug la mi tshangs par spyod pa byas te/ byams shing snying rjeb med na de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag gas brdzun byas sam/
83b6: rol po brdzun zer bar bstan nam/ thabs kyis brdzun byas pa dang / brdzun gyi rgyu byas pa dang / brdzun gyi rkyen byas pa dang / brdzun gyi chos byed pa dang / brdzun gyi las byed pa dang / mthong ba la ma mthong zhes zer ba dang / ma mthong ba
83b7: la mthong zhes zer ba dang / lus dang sems kyis rdzun byas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ni rtag par tshig drang po skye zhing gcig tu na sems can gyi tshig drang po bskyed pa yin na/ de la slar log par sems can thams cad kyi tshi/
83b8: mi grang ba dang / yon po la lta ba dang / yon po'i las byed par bskyod na de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu spro ba'i khu ba bdag 'tshong ngam/ pha rol po smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshod par bstan tam/ thabs
84a1: kyis skyo ba'i khyab 'tshod dam/ spro ba'i khu ba 'tshod pa'i rgyu byed dam/ spro ba'i khu tha 'tshor ba'i myi byed dam/ skyo ba'i khub 'tshed pa'i chos byed dam/ smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong bI las byed pa la sogs te/ spro ba'i bu
84a2: pa'o cog 'tshod du mi rung / spro ba'i khu ba'i rgyun gyis kha na ma tho ba skye'o// byang chubs mas dpa' ni sems can thams cad la snang zhing thar pa'i shes rab bskyod pa'i rigs na/ slar log pa ri sems can thams cad kyi phyin ci loH/
84a3: gis sems bskyed na byang chub sems dpa'i phas phas pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu rab tu byung ba dang / mabyung ba dang / byang chub semam dpa' dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma'i nyes pa bdag gis/ 'phyas su byas pas sam/ gzhan
84a4: 'phyas byed par bstan tam/ 'phya ba'i rgyu byas sam/ 'phya ba'i rkyen byas sam/ 'phya ba'i chos dang / 'phya ba'i las byed na byang chub sems dpa' ni mur 'dug dang / theg pa chung ngu rnams gnyis byed pa'i mi sangs rgyas kyi
84a5: chos kyi nang na chos ma yin/ tshul khrims ma yin zhes zer na/ rtag par snying rje bskyed de ngan pa rnams theg pa chen po la yid dga'/ yid ches par bstan cing bslab pa'i rigs na/ de la byang chub sems dpa'
84a6: slar log par sangs rgyas kyi chos la des shes bshad na de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi thul la zhig bdag gis bdag stod cing phar spod pa dang / gzhan la bdag stod/ phang smod par ston
84a7: pa/ sdod pa'i chu/ smod pa'i rkyen byed pa/ spyod pa'i chos dang / sbed pa'i las byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyi sbyin par rnga dbab cing nga nasems dpa' ni bdag gis blangs te/ dge zhing legs
84a8: pa ni gzhan la sbyin pa'i rigs na la la zhig gis bdag gi ma legs pa ni bsnyad gzhan gyi legs pa ni bcabs te/ gzhan la rmad dbab par byas na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag
84b1: ser sna che'am/ gzhan ser sna che bar ston tam/ ser sna che ba'i rgyu byed dam/ ser sna'i chos byed dam/ ser sna'i las byed na byang chub sems dpa' ni dbul po 'ongs so cog dang / gzhan ji 'dod pa bzhin dgos/
84b2: so// byang chub sems dpa'i sems la ngan du sems shing sems la gshe ba dang / dod tshe gcig gam/ khab cig gam/ rtsa nyag ma cig mi ster ram/ chos 'dod pa zhig 'ongs na tshig gcig le'u gcig/ rdul tsam
84b3: gyi chos kyang ma bshad la/ slar dag ngan pas spyos te rma phab na de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag khro 'am/ mi pha log po khro bar ston tam/ khro ba'i rgyu byed dam/ khro ba'i rkyen byed
84b4: dam/ khro ba'i chos byed dam/ khro ba'i las byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad kyi nang na dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing 'thab cad rtsod pa med par byas la rtag par snyed rje bskyed cing bya ba'i rigs kyi/ phyir log par
84b5: sems can thams cad kyi nang na sems can ma yin pa la kha ngan pas gshe zhing lag pas 'tshog pa dang / ral gri dang / dbyig pas gdab cing brdeg kyang snying brtsem bri ste/ pha rol po 'gyod cing tshig 'jam pos
84b6: 'chags shing gnod bkur kyang khro ba'i mdud pa ma bkrol na de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bul la zhig gis dkon mchog gsum la ma yin zhes zer ram/ gzhan dkon mchog
84b7: gsum la ma yin zhes zer bar bstan tam/ ma yin zhes zer ba'i rgyu dang / rkyen byed dam/ ma yin pa'i chos byed dam/ ma yin pa'i las byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni mur 'dug dang / sa rabs kyi ngan tshig
84b8: gcig sangs rgyas kyi sgra skad ma yin zhes zer ba zhig mthong ngam/ thos na mdung rtse kha gsum pa sum brgyas snying la zug pa dang mtshungs na/ bdag gi kha nas ma yin zhes zer blta smos kyang ci dgos te/ yid
85a1: ches pa'i sems sri zhu dang / mi 'gal ba'i sems bskyed pa'i rigs na/ slar log par ma rabs log pa la lta zhing ma yin zhes zer ba'i grogs byed na de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// dgezhugs
85a2: spyod pa'i rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i so sor thar pa 'di bslabs pa'i rigs so/ / 'di'i nang nas rdul phra mo tsam yang zhig tu mi rung na tshul khrims bcu chad par bshig pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ la la zhig gis
85a3: tshul khrims bshig pa zhig na da ltar gyi lus la byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa'i las ma nus te/ rgyal po'i gral yang ster/ 'khor lo bskor ba'i rgyal po'i gral yang stor/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma'i gral
85a4: yang stor/ g.yos shing phyogs pa bcu dang / bskyed cing gsol ba bcu dang / chos rdo rje dang mtshungs pa bcu dang / sa bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid rtag pa'o// yon tan zab mo la sogs pa zad par stor nas ngan song
85a5: gsum du lhung ste/ bskal pa gnyis sum gyi bar du pha ma dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi ming mkhan kyang mi thos te/ de bas na gcig kyang gzhig tu ma rung ngo // khyed la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lobs pa dang /
85a6: slob pa dang / slob par 'gyur ba'i rnams tshul khrims 'di bcu bslabs la gus par byos te rtag par gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs so// gsal bar ni le'u brgyad khri ba'i nang nas rgya cher bshad do// sangs rgyas
85a7: kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ phas pham pa bcu ni bshad zin to// ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi bu rgyal po'i gral thob pa'i tshe dang / 'khor los bskor ba'i rgyal po'i
85a8: gral thob pa'i tshe dang / blon po'i gral thob pa'i tshe dang / sngar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims mnod pa'i rigs so// 'ung tang lham srin thams cad kyang rgyal po'i lus dang / blon po'i lus kyi rim gro dang
85b1: skyabs byed do/ / sangs rgyas thams cad kyang dgyes so// tshul khrims thob zin na sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems dang / sems la gus par byas pa'i sems dpa' bskyed de/ gral mthon po na 'dug pa'i mkhan po dang /
85b2: slob dpon dang / theg pa chen po la tshangs par spyod du mtshungs pa dang / mtshungs par mthong ba dang / las 'thun par byed pa// mthong na langs te bsu la phyag 'tshal te nad dri ba'i rigs so// byang chub sems dpa'
85b3: slar dregs pa'i sems dang / le lo'i sems dang / glen pa'i sems bskyed de ma langs/ ma ba su/ phyag ma byas te/ ji la'ang chos bzhin du zhes dang / ri mo dang / bdag gi lus dang / yul 'khor dang / pheM smos dang /
85b4: nor rin po che bdun la sogs te nor ro cog btsongs la dgos so cog ma sbyar te/ de ltar ma nus na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu la la ched kar chad 'thung na chang gi nyes pa skyes te/ dge ba'i bsod nams grangs med
85b5: pa stor to/ / la la zhig gis bdag gi lus dang lag gis chang snod blangs te mi pha rol po la byin te/ blud na tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du lag pa med par 'ong na/ bdag 'thung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'di lta ste/
85b6: mi'o cog thams cad dang / sems can thams cad la chang 'thung bar bstan du mi rung ngo // bdag rang 'thung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ bdag che kar 'thungs pa dang / pha rol po la bder ba ni ltung ba'o// sangs
85b7: rgyas kyi bu sha che dkar zos pa dang / sho'o cog bzar mi rung ste/ zos na snying rje zhing byams pa'i rang bzhin gyi sa bon chad pas sems can thams cad kyis mthong nas 'jigs nas spong ngo // de lta bas na byang chub
85b8: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi sha bzar mi rung ngo / / sha zos pa ni sdig grangs med de sha zos na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu dku ba rnam lnga bzar mi rung ngo // sgog pa dang / tsong dang / rgya sgog
86a1: dang / ri sgog rnams dang / shing kun dang / 'di rnam lnga kha zas so cog gi nang du gzar mi rung ngo // la la zhig ched kar zos na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sems can thams cad kyis tshul khrims brgyad dang / tshu
86a2: khrims lnga dang / tshul khams bcu dang / rtsa ba rnam pa bzhi pashig pa dang / log pa bdun dang / gnod pa brgyad kyi tshul khrims bshig pa'i sdig byed pa mthong na mthol tshangs byed du gzhug pa'i rigs so// de las byang chub
86a3: sems dpa' ma bstan te/ mthol tshangs byed du ma bcug na/ lhan cig 'dug 'dug cing tshangs par spyod du mtshungs pa'i dge 'dun gyi rnams gcig tu tshogs te tshul khrims bshad pI tshe sdig dngos su byung gis nyes
86a4: pa mthol tshangs byed du chug shig/ ma bcug na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu mkhan po theg pa chen po la lhan gcig tu lta ba lhan gcig tu las byed pa/ dge 'dun gyi khang khyim dang / mkhar du 'ongs pa mthong na
86a5: rgyad grags stong gi lam na tshur 'ongs nI na ba su/ 'gro ba ni bskyal cing phyag 'tshal te/ bkur sti dang / ri mo dang / nyin gcig cing dus gsum du ri mo bya nyi ma gcig gi zan du gser srang gsum gyi kha zas dang /
86a6: khri stan dang / chos kyi mkhan po ci 'dod de cog dgos kyang kun sbyor te byin la rtag par chos kyi mkhan pa gnyer te/ dus gsum du chos bshad de nyin cig cing dus gsum du phyag gus par 'tshal la khro ba'i sems
86a7: dang / mya ngan gyi sems mi skye bar bgyis so// chos kyi phyir lus dang bsngos te chos gsol lo// de ltar ma byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu gang la yang rung ste/ tshul khrims dang mdo sde 'chad pa'i khang khyim
86a8: chen po nadan chos 'chad pa yod na/ byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob pa tshul khrims kyi glegs bam khyer te/ chos kyi mkhan po'i gnas su sad la/ gsol te dri zhing mnod pa'i rigs so// la la zhig ri dang /
86b1: tshal dang / shing ga dang / dge 'dun gyis dang / khyim smin dang / zas 'chad da cagags phyin par byas// mnyan cang 'ad/ dab gnas su song snyam mnyan/ ma mnos na gang ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi busems ni
86b2: brgyan pa dang 'gal zhung / rtag par sangs rgyas kyi y-i dang/ tshul khrims la 'dug kyang khar sman sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa ma yin nas zer na/ rtag par theg pa rlung du rna ma gnyis dang / s+yAng 'dug gi chos la lha zhing
86b3: log par lta ba'o cog gi tshul khrims dang / chos kyi yi ge gzungs su bzung na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu mi nad kyis btab po cog rtag par rim gro byas te/ gsos la sangs rgyas dang mtshungs par byas na dge ba
86b4: bsod nams rnam pa brgyad kyi nang na nang pa la lta zhing gsos pa'i dge ba'i bsod nams ni bsod nams kyi dam pa'o/ / pha ma dang / mkhan po dang / dge 'dun dang / slob ma 'am/ dbang po ma tshang ba nad do cog gis btab cing
86b5: nyon mongs na kun kyang bsos te sos par bya'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems can la ltag she zhing ngan sems kyis dge 'dun gyi khyim dang / yul mkhar du ma phyin pa/ dbye dang / ri lung dang / 'khor dang / tshal na nad
86b6: pa 'dug pa mthong ster mda' dang / rim grom byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ral gri dang/ mda' gzhu dang / mdung dang / sta re la sogs te thab mo'i spyad mtshon cha dang / sems can gsod pa'i spyad dang / 'dra ba rgya rnam
86b7: la sogs pa 'chang du mi rung ngo / / byang chub sems dpa' ni pha ma gzhan gyis bsad kyang sha mi glan na/ sems can thams cad bsad pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ mtshon cha ched kar 'chad pa na ltung ba'o// 'di lta bu'i
86b8: tshul khrims rnam bcu ni bslabs te/ rtag par gzungs su bzung ba'i rigs so// 'og ma le'u drug gi nang na rgya cher bshad do// sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bu kha
87a1: 'dod pa'i phyir sems ngan pa bsams te/ nya 'gagayul du la nyar 'drul bar dmag gi g.yul bshams te/ dmag bskyod nas 'thabs ta sems can mang ba bsad na byang chub sems dpa' dmag go/
87a2: nang du song zhing // phan tshun du 'drul yang mi rung na ched dkar yul gyi dgra byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de la che dgar byed pa ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bla 'bangs dang / bran pos smos dang / phyugs bdag sna drug dang
87a3: gshin sbom do bzhug pa'i snod la sogs pa/ khe dang tshor spogs bdag gis kyang bgyi ba'i mi rigs na gzhan la byed par bstan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de la tshe dgar byed pa ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bus pan
87a4: sems bskyed de pha rol po dge ba nges pa/ chos kyi mkhan po/ dge 'dun rgyal po/ ya rabs btsun pa la mnyes par log pa bdun dang / khas pham pa bcu dang / pha ma dang / phu bo nu bo dang / gnyen pa rnam drug gi tshul khrims bshig
87a5: go zhes bkur na sre zhu dang mo 'gal zhing byams shing snying rje ba'i sems bskyed pa'i rigs kyi/ de la slar log pa'i gnod pa skyed na mi bde ba'i gnas su ltung na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed de/ ched kar
87a6: chen po btang la ri dang / tshal dbye dang / ri lung dbyar zla rab man chad/ ston zla tha chung yan chad/ bsregs sam/ la la zhig gis me btang ste/ gzhan gyi khang khyim dang / mkhar dang / grong dang / dge 'dun gyi khyim dang / 8
87a7: dang / bskyed shing dang / lha ma srin dang / bla'i dkor la sogs te bdag po yod do cog gi nor rdzas bsreg du mi rung ngo // la la zhig gis ched kar ba sregs na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi slob ma bdag dang / mung
87a8: 'dug dang / gnyen rnams drug la sogs te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen no cog kun kyang ci yang theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang / tshul khrims nod cing gzungs su 'dzin par bstan pa'i rigs so// gzhung dang lugs shes she
87b1: byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa dang / bskyed cing gsol ba'i sems bcu dang / rdo rje 'chos kyi sems g.yo bar bstan te/ gcig nas gcig tu gor mas dang / chos kyis chog shes par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'
87b2: la byang chub sems dpas ngan sems dang / zhe sdang bskyed de/ gzhan nyan thos kyi theg pa chung rnam gnyis kyi tshul khrims dang / yi ge dang / mur 'dug dang / log par lta ba'i bshad pa bstan pa ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi
87b3: bu legs pa'i sems kyis sngar theg pa chen po'i go cha dang / tshul khrims dang / yi ge bslabs nas rgya cher phye nas bzung gi roco thob shes nas byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob pa rlung grags brgya stong gi lam nas theg pa
87b4: chen po'i yi ge dang / tshul khrims 'dod cing 'ong ba mthong na/ chos kyi phyir dka' thub spyod pa chos bzhin bshad pa'i rigs so// dka' thub ces bya ba ni lus bsregs pa/ lag rar bsregs pa sor mo bsregs pa'o// de la
87b5: lus dang / lag ngar dang / sor mo bsregs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad la yon du ma gsol na/ de'i rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ma yin no// stag dang spyang gi dang / seng ge ltogs pa la sogs pa dang / 'dre
87b6: ltogs pa la sogs pa thams cad la lus kyi sha dang / rkang lag gtong phod par byas te/ byin la de nas gcig nas gcig tu mthar gyis yang dag pa'i chos bshad de/ sems ni phye/ yid ni gol bar bya'o// de la byang
87b7: chub sems dpa' bdag bso ba'i khe 'dod pa'i phyir/ lan glan pa'i rigs pa nam blan gyi/ yi ge dang / tshul khrims ri mo dang / 'bru phyin ci log tu bshad nas snga phyi med par dkon mchog gsum la 'phya zhing 'chad pan
87b8: ltung ba'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag/ kha zas dang / nor rdzas dang / gso ba'i khe dang / ming snyan pa'i phyir rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po chen po la sogs pa gnyen zhes zer te/ snyems shing nan gyis nor slong la/
88a1: btsan dag gis bsdigs tenan gyis nor dang / khe tshal lo cog gi ming ni ngan pa mang po tshol zhes bya'o// gzhan la yang snying rje med cing si nu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems yod med par bstan pa ni ltung ba'o//
88a2: sangs rgyas kyi bu tshul khrims kha ton tu klog pa slob pa ni nyin cig cing dus drug tu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bzung la/ de'i gzhung dang / don sangs rgyas kyi ba nyid shes par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' tshul
88a3: khrims kyi yon tan tshig gcig la'u gcig kyang mi shes par sgyu ma'i tshig tu nus shes zer ba ni bdag la brnyas shing bslus/ gzhan la yang brnyas te chos so cog rnam pa gcig kyang migs par gzhan la mkhan
88a4: byed cing tshul khrims ston pa ni ltung ba'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed de/ tshul khrims 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i lag na pog snod khyer te/ byang chub sems dpa'i las byed pa la mthong nas phan tshun gnyis kyitha
88a5: du bar bcug ste/ 'phags pa'i mi la brnyas ma shin byed cing ngan mi byed pa med de zhes skur te/ de lta bu ched kar byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu snying rje spyad de ni'ang mi gsad par btang ba'i las byed cing po'o
88a6: cog ni bdag gi pa yin/ mo 'o cog ni bdag gi ma yin/ bdag sngan chad kyi tshe rabs la ga ra skyes so cog na yang de dag la sa ma skyes pa med pas na 'gro ba drug gi sems can bdag gi pha ma yin te/ de bsad cing zos
88a7: bdag gi pha ma bsad do/ / gcig tu na bdag gi lus snying ba bsad do// sa dang chu thams cad ni bdag gi lus snga ma yin no// me dang rlung ngo cog ni bdag gi gzugs kyi phyi mo yin pas rtag par gson por btang ba'i
88a8: las byed/ gar skyes gar skyes kyang sems can bsod pa mthong na thabs spyad de bdag gis 'or ba dang mda' byas te/ nyon mongs shing phongs pa thar bar bya'o// rtag par byang chub sems dpa'i tshal khrims bshad
88b1: de bstan bslabs nas sems can thar pa'i ramada' bya'o/ / pa ma dang / bu pho dang nu bo zhig shin de nyin par chos kyi mkhan po gnyer te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bshad na de'i bsod nams kyis shi ba de sangs rgyas
88b2: thams cad dang phrad de mtho ris su skye'o/ / de ltar ma byas na/ ltung ba'o// // chos kyi rgya mo// bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o// 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims 'di bcu bslabs na sems gus par gzungs su bzung
88b3: ba'i rigs so/ / sdig bkru ba'i le'u'i nang nas kyang tshul khrims gcig pu gcig nas rgya che zhing bsal bar bshad do// sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ khros pa'i lan khros pas mi glan/
88b4: bsdig pa'i lan brdeg pas mi glan/ pha ma dang / phu nu bo gnyen rnam drug bsad kyang sha glan du mi rung ngo // gzhan zhig gis sa bdag gi rgyal po bsad kyang sha glan du mi rung ngo // srog gcod cing sha glan na sri zhu'i chos
88b5: dang 'gal lo/ / bran pos smos la dag ngan pas spyos shing bsdigs la nyin gcig cing las ngan pa rnam gsum bskyod pa la yang sdig grangs med na ched kar log pa sna bdun gyi sdig byas pa lta smos kyang ci bgos te/
88b6: rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la snying rje med/ gnyen rnam drug la sogs pa'i sha glan pa ched kar byed na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu gdod ma dang po rab tu byung ste/ ji'ang mi shes par bdag dbang po rnol
88b7: 'dzangs par rlom zhing la la ni lo grangs rgan zhing phyug btsan snyems te/ la la rus che zhing thabs na mtho ba dang / mang du shes pa dang / dbang che ba dang / nor rin po che sna bdun mang du bdog pas rgyags dregs sngan chad chos
88b8: shes pa'i mkhan po la yi ge dang / tshul khrims mi gsol/ mi gnod/ chos kyi mkhan po la la ni rung chud/ la la ni nas gzhon/ la la ni thabs chung/ la la ni dbul/ la la ni dbang po mtshar yang legs
89a1: pi'i chos dben pa yodade/ chos kyi yi ge dang / tshul khrims so cog zad par shes na byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob po// chos kyi slob dpon ma rig pa dang / thabs la 'phral gang du bltas shing chos kyi mkhan po la
89a2: yang dag pa'i bden gzhung do cog gsol zhing nod du ma 'ongs na ltung ba'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas 'das pa'i phyin sems dge bas sangs rgyas kyi khrims 'dod cing nod na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
89a3: gzugs kyi spyan sngar bdag gi sems la yi dam bcas te/ zhag bdun gyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar mthol tshangs byas la/ ltas bzang po mthong ba ni tshul khrims thob po// ltas bzang po/
89a4: ma mthong ba ni zhag bdun gnyis/ bdun gsum/ lo gcig gi bar du ltas bzang po mthong ba'i drod kyis gzung ngo // ltas bzang po mthong nas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar tshul khrims
89a5: mnod de/ / ltas bzang po ma mthong na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar tshul khrims mnod kyang ming tshul khrims thob pa zhes mi bya'o// la la zhig gis sngon chad byang chub sems dpa'i
89a6: tshul khrims mnos pa'i mdun du nod na ltas bzang po mi dgos so/ / ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi mkhan po gcig nas gcig tu bstan pas na ltas bzang po mi dgos so// chos kyi mkhan po de'i mdun du tshul khrims
89a7: mnos na tshul khrims kyang thob ste gus pa'i sems skye'o/ / rgyang grags stong lam tshun chad tshul khrims sbyin nus pa'i mkhan po med la sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar tshul khrim
89a8: nod na ltas bzang po mthong bar dgos so/ / chos kyi mkhan po la la zhig bdag theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang / tshul khrims shes pa dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po rnams byams shing mdza' bsnyems te/ byang
89b1: chub sems dpa' gser du slob pa chos kyi yi ge'i lugs dang / tshul khrims kyi gzhung 'drar 'ongs pa la brnyas pa'i sems dang / ngan sems dang / le lo'i sems kyis gcig pu gcig pu nas 'dri ba'i lan ma bla na na l+h+wa
89b2: ba'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / tshul khrims kyi yi ge dang / theg pa chen po'i drang po'i chos/ drang por mthong ba/ drang po'i ngo bo nyid/ drang po'i chos kyi lus kyis 'grub par slob cing spyod sgrom mi nus pa rnam
89b3: nidakon mchog bdun bdun btang ste/ slar log par bltas te theg pa chung ngu rnam gnyis dang / mur 'dug gi chos dang / ma rabs kyi gzhung la sten pa dang / a b+hi d+harma bshad pa slob pa dang / theg pa chung ngu'i yi ge dang / 'dug
89b4: par slob na de ni sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sa bon chad pas lam 'gog pas bsgribs pa'i rgyu rkyen kyis byang chub sems dpa'i lam ma yin no/ / de lta na ched kar byas pa ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas 'das
89b5: pa'i phyin chos 'chad pa bdag po byed pa dang / dge 'dun gyi khyim bdag po dang / ston cing 'phrul ba'i bdag po dang / bsam gtan du 'dzag pa'i bdag po dang / 'gro zhing 'ongs pa'i bdag po dang / de lta bu byed na byams pa'i
89b6: sems bskyed la mi mdza' ste/ 'thab cing rtsod pa yang dag par bsdum pa'i rigs so// dkon mchog gsum gyi nor yang dge par bsrungs te ma 'os par mi spyad / bdag gis bdag gi sgor bab pa dang / mtshungs par bya'o//
89b7: de la las log par mang po 'grub cing 'bad pa dang / rang nyams kyi sems kyis dkon mchog gsum gyi nor spyad na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sngon chad dge 'dun gyi khyim gyi nang na 'dug la byang chub sems dpa' dang /
89b8: dge slong 'gron po zhig phyis dge 'dun gyi khang khyim dang / mkhar dang / grong dang / rgyal po'i khyim dang / dbyar tshul tu zhugs pa'i tshe dang / 'khor gyi nang du 'ongs pa mthong na/ snga na 'dug pa'i dge 'dun gyis 'ong na ni
90a1: bsu 'gro na ni bskyal te/ zas kyi sti stang dang / khang khyim nyal ba'amal cha dang / khri dang / snga snga nas sbyar te sbyid ni// la la zhig bdag la nor med na bdag gi lus dang / bu pho dang / bu mo dang btsongs te/ ci 'dod pa
90a2: kun sbyar te sbyin dgos so/ / sbyin bdag la la zhig 'ongs te/ dge 'dun pha la dang / dge 'dun gyi 'dron pa zhig gnyer te/ yon byino skal pa yod pa'i sang dge 'dun phyim bdag pos dge 'dun 'dron pa'i rnams rims kyis gnyer ba btang ste/ de las dge
90a3: 'dun snga nas 'dug pas bdag 'ba' zhig gnyer bar song ste/ dge 'dun 'dron po ma btang na dge 'dun gyi khyim gyi bdag po sdig grangs med par thob ste byol song dang mtshungs so// dge sbyong ma yin shAkya'i rigs kyi sa bon ya
90a4: ma yin te/ de ltar byas pa ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ci yang go rims su ma bab par logs shig tu yon blangs shing bdag gir bkur du mi rung ngo // de lta bu'i yon gyi nor rdzas ni phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun dbang ste/ de la log
90a5: shig tu mnos shing khyer na phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi nor bdag gi sgor khyer na bsod nams rnam pa brgyad dang / sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa rnams dang / mkhan po dang / dge 'dun dang / pha ma dang / nad pa'i rdzas bdag gri
90a6: spyad kyis ltung ba'o/ / sangs rgyas kyis bu byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dang / rab tu ma byung ba'i sbyin bdag gis dge 'dun gnyer te/ bsod nams bskyed cing smon lam gsol na dge 'dun gyi nang du song na dge skos
90a7: l-i dris te/ de ring go rims gang la bab pa gnyer na phyogs bcu'i 'phrul gyi dge 'dun 'thob bo// gung nas dgra bcom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / dog 'dun lnga bcu gnyer babs go rims su bab pa'i dge 'dun
90a8: tha mal pa cig gnyer ba bsod nams che'o/ / de las dge 'dun gzhan gnyer ba ni mur 'dug ngan pa'i chos so// sangs rgyas bdun la ni gung nas gnyer ba'i chos med do// sri zhu'i lam dang 'gal bas gud nas dge 'dun gnyer
90b1: ba ni ltung ba'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems spyad de gso ba'i khe'i phyir phos spos kyi g.yem pa 'tshong ba'i bdag dar cing zan byed pa dang / bdag rdung ba/ bdag 'du ba pos smos kyi mtshan lta rmi lam bzang ngan 'gro la tho zhes zer
90b2: mo zhes zer/ log pa'i chos kyi sngags sgyu ma rang bzor zer/ dgra bslab pa'i chos byed/ dug go cog sbyor zhing byed la dug rtsi rnam pa brgyad stong byed de sbrul drug/ gser dngul ma btul ba'i dug dang / byang ste ma la sog
90b3: pa snying rje yod med pa lta bu ched kar byas na ltung ba'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed de/ bdag gi lus kyis dkon mchog gsum la bkur ba byas te gzhan la gnyen sgyu ma smos te/ kha ni stong pa 'chad/ las
90b4: ni yod pa'i las byed la/ tha mal pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa'i smyan byed cing mi tshangs par spyod par sbyor te/ ci la'ang mi 'jigs shing chags pa med/ dus drug tu mchod ston byed pa'i nyi ma dang / lo gcig la zla ba gsuM
90b5: gsum mchod ston rtag tu byed pa'i tshe sems can gsod/ rkun po dang / chom po byed cing mchod ston gyi tshul khrims bshig pa ni ltung ba'o// tshul khrims 'di bcu bslabs la brtag par gzungs su bzung ba'i rigs pa
90b6: khrims bzung ba'i le'u'i nang nas kyang rgya cher mngon par bshad do/ / sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas 'das pa'i phyin ngan pa'i dus la mur 'dug dang / mi ngan pa'o cog dang / rkun po chen
90b7: pos sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' pha ma dang mtshungs pa'i gzugs 'tshong ba mthong ngam/ chos dang tshul khrims kyi yi ge 'tshong ba mthong ngam/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma 'tshong ngam gcig tu sems
90b8: bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'tsheng pa dang / la la zhig snying rje'i las la mdags pa'i 'brang nas bran po bran mor byas pa zhig byang chub sems dpas de lta bu mthong na byams pa'i sems bskyed de/ thabs kyi sar
91a1: mda' dang / skyabs byas te gnas gnas na 'khod do cog kyang slar slob cing ston cig/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzugs dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / tshes dang / tshul khrims
91a2: kyi yi ge thams cad nor yod na nor gyis zlas shig de ltar ma blus na ltung ba'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bu 'chang du mi snang ba la mtshan cha dang / mda' gzhu 'chang ba dang / tshod spogs byed pa dang / srang dang bre che chung 'chad pa dang / rtsa
91a3: lag snyems shing mi gzhan la nor len pa dang / sems can la phrag dog byed de/ pha log po bcings drags byas pa dang / ngo sa don du yod pa zhig btang byi la dang / sel gyi dang / khyi dang / phag dang / bya 'chang zhing gsor mi rung
91a4: do/ / de lta bur ched kar gsos na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed de pos smos la sogs pa 'thob bo cog la lta ba dmag gi g.yul dang dgra chom po byed pa la sogs pa la bltar mi rung ngo // yang gcig tu dung
91a5: 'bud pa dang / rnga gling dang / gyi ma sha ri dang / rjed dang / gling bu dang / kong hi'u dang / klu lan pa dang / rol mo'i sgra la mnyan du mi rung ngo // tshe lo dang / mag mangs dang / bar sig gi rtsed mo dang / ra 'bri lug gi dmag gi rtsed mo dang / po long
91a6: rdob pa dang / rdo 'phen gyis rtse ba dang / bum bu la bde bu 'phen pa dang / khras byed pa dang / ma long byung ba byar mi rung ngo // rtsa ni cha'u dang / rgya lang dang / por kha ru ba dang / mi'i thod pa dang / de rnams la mo gdab tu mi rung ngo // rkun bI
91a7: than gyi pho nya la sogs pa gcig kyang byar mi rung ngo / / da ltar tsha dkar byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu tshul khrims thub par bzung ba'i rim gro byas na 'gro nyal 'dug langs/ nyin mtshan dus drag tu tshul khrims kha
91a8: ton klags na rdo rje dang mtshungs so/ / rgyal ba thogs pa mtsho chen po rgal ba dang mtshungs so// gcig tu na dge slong rtsas bcings pa dang mtshungs te/ theg pa chen po la dge zhing yid ches pa'i sems rtag par bskyed la
91b1: bdag gis shes par bsam par ni da dung sangs rgyas su ma byin pa'i sangs rgyas so/ / sangs rgyas kyi rnams ni sangs rgyas su zin pa'i sangs rgyas so
91b2: snyam du byang chub tu sems bskyed de bar mi chad par sems la bsams la de skad cig gcig theg pa chung ngu gnyis dang / mur 'dug la sems kyis bsams na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par sman lam thams cad gsol la/
91b3: pa ma dang / mkhan po dang / dge 'dun dang / dkon mchog gsum la sri zhu che zhing yid dang mi 'gal bar smon/ rtag par mkhan po mkhas pa dang / tshangs par spyod du mtshungs pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad de rtag par bdag theg
91b4: pa chen po'i yi ge dang khrims dang / g.yo zhing phyogs pa bcu dang / bskyed cing bso bso ba bcu dang / chos rdo rje dang mtshungs pa bcu dang // sa bcu la sogs pa bdag byed cing shes la chos bzhin du las byed par smon to// sangs rgyas kyi bu
91b5: tshul khrims bzung la sran thub par bya ba ni lus dang srog kyang bor te/ sems la sems dpa'i bar mi bcad par sems bsam mo// de la byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'di lta bu'i smon lam ma bskyed na ltung ba'o//
91b6: sangs rgyas kyi bu smon lam chen po bcu smon pa'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims gnas su bzang ste/ smon lam 'di bzhin du gdab bo// bdag gi lus 'di me chen po'i nang du tshig kyang rung khung zab mo dang / ral gri'i ril so
91b7: yang rung ste dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi dam pa'i chos kyi yi ge dang / tshul khrims mthar mi zhig pa dang / nam du yang mi zhag pa bud med thams cad sogs pa mi byed par smon to// gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to//
91b8: lcags bsregs pa 'dra ba dang / de lta bu rgya mo rim pa stong gis bskor te lus dkris kyang mthar yun du tshul khrims dral ba'i lus kyis dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi sa gos thams cad mi bgo bar smon to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di
92a1: ltar sman to/ / pa 'di'i nang du lcags kyi thu lum bsregs pa dang / me chu bzhin du bab ste/ 'dab la bskal pa brgya snang gi bar du lan kyang tshul khrims bshig pa khas dad pa'i sbyin bdag gzas thams cad mi za bar
92a2: smon to/ / yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// lus 'di me chen pos bsregs pa'i lcags kyi dra ba dang / lcags bsregs pa'i tsha ba'i steng du bsnyal kyang tshul khrims dral ba'i lus kyis rang ba'i sprin bdag gi khri 'o cog gi
92a3: steng du mi 'dug par smon to/ / yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// lus 'di bskal pa gcig gnyis kyi bar du mdung rtse kha gsum pa sun brgyas btsags kyang rung ste/ mthar tshul khrims bshig pa'i lus kyis dang ba'i
92a4: sbyin bdag gi rtsi sman thams cad mi za bar smon to/ / yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// lus 'dis bskal pa stong gi bar du lcags kyi zangs po che tsha ba'i nang du bcug kyang rung ste mthar tshul khrims dra ba'i lus kyi sa dang bI
92a5: sbyin bdag gi khang khyim mo cog dang / ldu mar dang / bskyed shing dang / zhing gi steng du mi 'dug par smon to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// lus 'di mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du lcags kyi gtun bus brdungs te rdul phram
92a6: bzhin du sor yang khrims dral ba'i lus sems yid ches pa'i sbyin bdag gis 'grus shing gus par phyag mi 'tshal bar smon to/ / yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// stong phrag brgya'i lcags bsregs pa'i ral
92a7: gri dang / mdung rtses mig gnyis brus shang btsags kyang tshul khrims bshig pa'i sems kyis pa logs kyi kha dog bzang po la mi lta bar smon to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// lcags kyi smad bu stong phrag
92a8: brgyas bskal pa gcig gnyis kyi bar du lus kyi chu ba dang / rna ba'i rtsa bar gtsugs kyang tha mar khrims dral ba'i sems kyis rol mo snyan pa la mi snyan par smon to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// bskal
92b1: pa stong phrag brgya'i bar du ral gris sna bcad cing gzhogs kyang khrims dral ba'i sems kyis spos so cog la mi snom par smon to/ / yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du lcer la
92b2: gris bcad btubs kyang khrims dral ba'i sems kyis mi 'o cog gi kha zas gtsang ma'o cog la mi bza' bar smon to/ / yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// sta ri rnon pos lus bcang gtubs kyang mthar khrims dral
92b3: ba'i sems kyis reg pa'i bzang ba la me skam mi chags par sman to/ / yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar sman te// sems can na cog sangs rgyas su yod par ston to// byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta bu'i sman lams skyed
92b4: na ltung ba'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par dus gnyis su sbyangs pa'i yon tan pa/ dgun dang / dbyar bsam gtan du 'jug pa dang / tshul khrims su 'jug pa so shing dang / sran phye dang / chos gos gsum dang / ril ba dang
92b5: lhung zed dang / gding ba dang / gsil byed dang / bog phor dang / chu tshogs dang / lag byis dang / gri dang / btsub shing dang / gtsub stan dang / smad tsher dang / tha gu'i khri dang / dar ma dang / khrims dang / sangs rgyas kyi bu sbyangs pa'i yon tan sbyar ba'i
92b6: tshe grong rgyu ba'i tshe 'gro zhing 'ongs na rgyang grags brgya stong du 'gro na yo byad bco brgyad rtag par lus dang mi 'bral te/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan pa ni dpyir zla rab tshes bcwa ldanas dpyid zla tha chungs tshes bco lnga'i bar du'o// ston zla 'bring
92b7: po chos bcwa lnga nas dgun zla ra ba nya'i bar du dus gnyis su yo byad bcwa brgyad lus dang mi 'bral/ dper na bya'i mdab ma dang 'dra'o// de ste gso sbyong gi nyi ma la gsar du slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams zla ba phyed byed cing kha ton du phas
92b8: pham pa bcu dang / ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi khrims kha ton du lhogs shig/ de ste khrims klog pa'i tshe sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzugs kyi spyan sngar gzugs dang / gzugs
93a1: brnyan gyi spyan sngar mi gcig gis kha ton glags la gcig gis 'thol tshangs bya ste/ gcig gam gnyis sam gang yang rung ste/ stong brgya de yang mi gcig gis kha tor klog go/ kha ton klog pa ni sa mthon po
93a2: la 'dug la nyan pa ni dma' ba la 'dug go/ / so so nas chos gos tshal bu dgu pa dang / lnga pa dang / bdun pa bgos te tshul du 'jug pa ni gcig nas gcig tu chos bzhin du'o// sbyangs pa'i yon tan spyod pa'i tshe bgegs yod cing
93a3: mi bde ba'i nang du ma 'gro cig/ yul gyi bgegs dang / rgyal po mi srun pa dang / sa mtho na dman dang / rtsi shing zab mo dang / dbyar seng ge dang / stag dang / spyad ki dang / chuste rlung gi bgegs dang / rkun po chem po dang / sbrul gdug sde
93a4: lam la sogs te/ bgegs yod do cog thams cad sbyangs pa'i yon tan pa 'gror mi rung ngo // de la ched kar song na ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu chos 'di bzhin du rim par 'khod cig/ tshul khrims sngar nos pa ni snga
93a5: 'dug shig/ tshul khrims phyis nos pa ni phyi nas 'dug shig/ rgan gzhon mi lta/ dge slong pho dang / dge slong mo dang / ya rabs dang / btsun pa dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / nyung rum dang / bran pos smos la sogs pa tshul
93a6: khrims sngar nos pa ni sngar 'dug shig/ phyis nos pa ni phyis go rims bzhin du 'dug shig/ mur 'dug ngan pa dang / mi glen pa bzhin du rgan yang rung / gzhon yang rung / snga med phyi med pa'i go rimis med pa ni g.yung po bran gyi tshes so//
93a7: ngasangs rgyas kyi chos kyi nang na ni snga ma ni steng du 'dug phyi ma ni 'og tu 'dug go/ byang chub sems dpa' ni chos bzhin du go rims su ma 'khod na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par sems can no cog bstan cing bcos te/ dge
93a8: 'dun gyi khang khyim byed cing ri dang / tshal dang / ra ba dang / zhing la sangs rgyas kyi rten gyi khang pa byas la dbyar dgun du tshul dang / bsam gtan du 'jug pa'i gnas dang / gtsang ma'i 'chags sa 'dzugs su bzhugs pa'i rigs so//
93b1: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems can no cog gi phyir theg pa chen po'i chos dang / tshul khrims kyi yi ge bkrol bshad na nam na tsha byung ba dang / yul gyi bgegs dang / dgra'i bgegs dang / pha ma dang / phu nu bo dang / mahA/
