93b2: po la sogs pa thog sa shi ba'i dus dang / bdun gsum gyi nyi ma dang / bdun bzhi'i nyi ma dang / bdun lnga'i nyi ma dang / bdun bdun gyi nyi ma la de'i phyir theg pa chen po'i yig dang / tshul khrims dkrol bshad de/ mchod rten
93b3: byas te dge ba'i bsod nams thob par gsol cig/ 'gro 'ongs kyang gson pa'i mtsho bsod nams byed pa la me chen pos stegs/ chu chen pos khyer/ rlung nag po chen pos gru bus pa dang / nga po dang / mtshon chen po'i /
93b4: dgra'i bgegs la sogs te/ sdig go cog bgegs dang lam gyis na mtshams med pa bdun/ bgegs brgyad/ lag sgyel/ gang skyil ldung dang / lcags dang / lus bcings dregs te/ g.yem zhing khro ba mang po dang /
93b5: blun zhing glen pa mang po dang / na tsha'i mang po'i dgra zus na kun gyis kyang theg pa chen po'i chos kyi yi ge dang / tshul khrims kha ton blags te dgrol ba bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' gas ngadu slob pa 'di bzhin ma byas na/
93b6: ltung ba'o// tshul khrims 'di dgu bslabs la gus par rtag par bzungs su bzung shig/ snyoms pa'i chos kyi le'u las kyang rgya che zhing mngon par bshad do// sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/
93b7: sangs rgyas kyi pu mi la tshul khrims shig sbyin na bye bragang bye ning pad ma du mi rung / rgyal po dag rgyal bu dang / blon po chen po dang / blon po pa la dang dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / pog
93b8: mo g.yem dang / gzugs kyi gnam bco brgyad dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnam drag dang / dbang po med pa dang / dbang po rnam gnyis yod pa dang / shung rum dang bran pos spos dang lha ma srin la sogs te/ thams cad
94a1: bran rnams man du rung do/ / lus la chos phyugs bag ba rnam su ni 'dug bsgyur bar spyan la chos dadu 'thun par gyis shig/ kha dgas rab snun pa nag pa dmar po// sal gos yan chad 'dag
94a2: bsgyur ro/ / lus la gos bgo gi tshes te/ kha dog bsgyur cig/ yul la cog gnang na mi'i gi/ sa su bge ba la/ dge slong de cog gi gos ni tha mal pa'i gos dang mi 'thun no// thog ma tshul khrims sbyin pa'i tshe mkhan du
94a3: dri ba khyed tshe 'di la log pa bdun gyi sdig byas sam zhes dris shig/ chos kyi mkhan po byang chub sems dpa' ni log pa bdun byas pa la/ tshul khrims sbyin du mi rung ngo // log pa bdun zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi lus la khrag
94a4: byung ba dang / pha ma dang mkhan po dang slob dpon bsad pa dang / lus kyi tshul khrims btsang ma bshig pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba po'i 'phags pa bsad pa yin te/ 'di rnams bdun tshad par byas te bsgribs pa'i tshul
94a5: la tshul khrims sbyin du mi rung ngo / / gzhan ni thams cad kyang tshul khrims sbyin du rung ngo // rab tu byung ba'i chos ni rgyal po la yang phyag mi 'chal/ ba ma la yang phyag mi 'tshal/ gnyen pa rnam pa drug la yang zhes mi bya/ lha ma srin la
94a6: yang phyag mi 'tshal lo/ / chos kyi mkhan po skad shes pa zhig rgyang grags stong gi lam nas 'ongs te/ khrims gsol pa zhig yod na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi mkhan pos ngan sems dang khro ba'i sems bskyed de/ sems can
94a7: no cog la tshul khrims ma byin na ltung ba'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bu la bstan bcos te/ yid ches pa'i sems g.yo bar bya na byang chub sems dpas gzhan tshul khrims bstan pa'i chos kyi mkhan po byas te/ tshul khrims gnod du 'ong ba'i ma
94a8: zhig mthong na sngar mkhan po slob dpon gnyer du thong shig/ mkhan po gnyis kyis kyang khyed la bdun gyis bsgribs pa'i sdig yod dam dris shig/ de la yang tshe 'di la bdun gyis bsgribs pa'i sdig yod na/ mkhan pos tshul
94b1: khrims sbyin pa mi rigs so/ / bdun gyis bsgribs pa'i sdig mdan tshul khrims sprin du rung ngo // la la zhig gis tshul khrims bcu pa shig pa zhig yod na mthol tshangs byed du chug shig/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sarma
94b2: dpa'i zhal sngar nyin mtshan drug tu bam pa bcu dang / ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi tshul khrims kha ton du klags la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la sems thag pa nas b+hag 'tshal ba'i tshe lhas bzang por bya dgos so
94b3: des nyis bdun dang / bdun ga nyis dang / bdun gsum de/ lagaci gnan chad skas bzlang pa maza dgas so// lhas bzad pa sa ma sa rnas ga / smye sa b+hAgs yang ba dang / sa
94b4: ba dang / ltas ci yang rung ba bzang po mthong na mod la sdig 'byud do// de la lhas bzang po med na mthol tshangs su zin kyang mi phan te/ de'i tshe lus kyis ni tshul khrims mi thob bo// lo dang nyams bstan te spogs
94b5: byas la/ ltas 'od byung ba dag mthong na tshul khrims mnod du rung ngo // la la zhig gis ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bshig pa ni mthol tshangs byas pa'i mod la 'byung ste/ bdun gyis bsgribs pa dang mi mtshungs so//
94b6: de nas tshul khrims ston pa'i mkhan pas chos 'di'i ning nas kyang gcig nas gcig nas khrel na mkhan po bya'o// theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang / tshul khrims yang ba dang / lci ba dang / yin pa dang ma s+t+rai bI gzugs dam pa mi shes na/
94b7: gzhung gi mchog bden pa dang / snga ma'i rang bzhin gyis sa bon dang / de ltar bskyed cing gso ba'i rang bzhin dang / gtan ma glag pa'i rang bzhin dang / chos kyis bon gyi rang bzhin dang / drang po'i rang bzhin dang / de'i nang nas rtogs pa dang /
94b8: dpyod pa'i rang bzhin dang / byi nang gi bsam gtan bcu'i yal ga la sogs te chos kyis las bya'o// cho ga dang tshul khrims dang / chos kyi yig 'di gcig nas gcig nas khong du mchud de/ byang chub sems dpa' g.yo ba'i khed
95a1: ming snyan pa 'dod pa'i phyir slob ma la khe bskam pas dran pa btsal te mi shes pa la sgyu mar ches dang / tshul khrims kyi yig kun shes so zhes zer zhing yon len pa'i bdag la yang bslus shing brnyas/ gcig du na
95a2: gzhan la yang smras shing brnyas te/ de lta bus mi la tshul khrims byin na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu gso ba'i khe 'dod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims ma mnos pa'i mdun du mur 'dug dang / ma rabs kyi mdun
95a3: dusangs rgyas stong gi tshul khrims chen po 'di bshad du mi rung ngo / / log par lta ba'i mdun du mi rung // rgyal po ma gtogs pa gzhan su'i mdun du yang bshad du mi rung // mingan pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims
95a4: ma mnos pa ni li byol song zhes bya'o/ / gar skyes gar skyes kyang dkon mchog gsum mi mthong zhing rdo gang dang mtshungs sems med de ming chos log pa zhes bya'o// log pa la lta ba'i rnams ni shing dum bu dang mtshungs so// byang
95a5: chub sems dpa' de lta bu ngan pa'i mdun du sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi tshul khrims bshad de/ bstan na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sems yid ches te rab tu byung na/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims dam po mnos la che dkar
95a6: sems bskyed de/ 'phags pa'i tshul khrims bshig na sbyin bdag go cig gi yon blang du mi rung ngo // gcig tu ni rgyal po'i khab kyis ris la yang 'gror ma rung / rgyal po'i tshul yang 'thung du mi rung ste/ 'dre chen po lnga stong gr-i/
95a7: rtag par de'i bdun bcad bcad nas 'dren re dgra chen po khyim dang / mkhar dang / yul gyi nang du 'ongs so// zhes zer te/ de rnams kyi khor mor mdi'i rjes chags so// 'jig rten na re yang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi nang du 'gro'o//
95a8: zhes zer te mig gis mthong du'ang mi dga'o// tshul khrims bshig pa ni byol song dang mtshungs/ shing dum pa dang mtshungs te/ drang po'i tshul khrims bshig na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sems gcig tu brtul te rta/
95b1: par gzungs su bzung ste kha ton du yang klog go/ lpags pa bshus te ni shog shog byas/ khrag phyung bas ni snag tshar byas/ rus pa bcag ste smyug gur byas la sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi yi ge bri'o// shing gi shun pa dang
95b2: thong kar la bris te rtag par rin po che sna bdun dang / rin med pa'i spos dang / me tog la sogs pa ra ni po che sna tshogs kyi gze ba dang sdod byas te/ nang du chos kyi yi ge tshul khrims kyi glegs bam gzhug go// de la chos kyi bzhin
95b3: du ri mo ma byas na ltung ba'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par sems rgya cher bskyed de/ yul mkhar dang khang khyim no cog tu byin te/ sems can no cog ni mthong na khyed la sogs pa sems can no cog thams cad dkon mchog gsuM
95b4: la phyogs shing tshul khrims bcu nos shig ces sgo ba'i rigs so/ / byol song gi khams shig na'ang sems la bsam khar smras te/ khyod ni byol song na byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed cig ces bsam zhing bya'o//
95b5: byang chub sems dpa' ni ri lung dbye tha dag la gnas kyang rung ste/ sems can no cog kun byang chub sems dpa'i sems skye bar byos shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can ma bstan ma bcos na ltung ba'o// /
95b6: sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par bstan cing bcos pa'i snying rje chen po bskyed nas chos byang ba dang / ya rabs la sogs pa sbyin bdag dang / 'dra ba mang po'i nang du 'greng la gos skya bo gyon te chos bshad du mi rungango // gis mya'o
95b7: pa 'du ba mang po'i nang du chos bshad na chos kyi mkhan po nis mthon por 'dug la spos dang me tog gis yon gsol te/ mtha' bzhir nyan pa'i rnams dma' ba na 'khod la gus par mnyan to// pha ma la sri zhu mi 'gal/
95b8: bar bya ba dang / slob mas mkhan po la bya ba bzhin chos la yang de bzhin gus par bya'o// bram ze me lha can chos byed pa bzhin gus par byed pa bzhin du gus par bya'o// de bzhin ma byas te chos 'chad ba pa chos
96a1: bzhin du ma bshad na ltung ba'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bu kun kyang the tsom med pa'i yid kyis khrims nos shig/ rgyal po dang rgyal bu dang / slob ma sde bzhi dang / bdag mtho zhing btsan snyems te sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /
96a2: tshul khrims pashig la nan tur gyis chos byas te/ nga'i slob ma rnam bzhi rab tu byung zhing chos byed par mi ster te/ bgegs cig tu na sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / mchod rten 'dzugs shing chos dang tshul khrims yi ge 'bring
96a3: mi ster te/ dkon mchog 'jig cing de lta bur ched kar chos 'jig pa ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu dge ba'i sems spyod pa la rab tu phyung shig legs pa'i ming snyan pa 'dod pa dang / gso ba'i khe'i phyir rgyal po dang / blon po
96a4: mdun du sangs rgyas bdun gyi tshul khrims bshad de/ dge slong dang dge slong ma la byang chub sems dpa'i khrims mi rigs par byin te/ slob ma rnams bcings brtags na seng ge'i lus la srin bu 'dug pas seng ge bdag gis
96a5: shazos pa dang mtshungs te/ byi'i srin bus sha zos pa ma yin no// de lta bas na sangs rgyas kyi bu mur 'dug dang / bdud kyi chos bshig pa ma yin no// bdag gis chos bshig pa yin no// sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims mnas
96a6: na sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi rim gro bya ba ni pha mas pa ma bu gcig bu la bsam pa dang mtshungs so/ / pha ma la srin bya ba dang 'dro'o// mur 'dug dang / mi ngan pa langag zha pa/ che ga ngan pas sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims
96a7: la skur ba zer na mdung rtse la gsum pa'i mdud na sum rgyas snyid la btsugs pa dang / ral gri stong dbyig pa stong khris lus brdegs pa dang mtshungs par byaste/ bdag gi lus bsgral la brgya ber du sems can dmyal bar
96a8: song yang sla'i/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la cig cig ngan du zer ba'i skad ni mi thos par smin to// bdag nyid kyi tshul khrims pa shig pa gzhan la len lon pa dang / zhar kyis zhar gyis tshul khrims pashig par
96b1: bstan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems med do// de lta bu byas na ltung ba'o// tshul khrims 'di dgu bslabs la sems gus par gzungs su gzung shig/ sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams tshul khrims
96b2: yang ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad khyed la sogs pas rtag par gzungs su zung shig/ sngar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni kha ton zin to// da ltar gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
96b3: kyis ni da ltar kha ton byas so/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' phyis 'ong ba'i rnams ni de de'i khar kha ton byed do// sangs rgyas kyi bu nyon cig/ phas pham pa bcu dang / ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad cig 'das pa'i
96b4: sangs rgyas kyis kha ton zin/ da ltar gyi kha ton byas phyis kyang kha ton byed de/ da'ang de bzhin da ltar kha ton byed do// de lta bas na khyed la sogs pas sems can phal mang po rgyal po dang rgyal bu dang / blon po dang dge slong
96b5: dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen mas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims nos nas 'grus par kha ton blags la bkrol bshad de/ yi ger bris la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gyis skal pa rtag par 'dug
96b6: ste/ sems kyi glegs bam rus gsum gyi bar du tshul bzhin 'bab cing thogs pa med par byas te/ sems can thams cad bstan cing bslab pa'i rgyun mi gcod cing sangs rgyas mthong la sangs rgyas gcig gis gce
96b7: la gtad de/ tshe tshe rabs su yang ngan song dang bgegs brgyad kyi nang du yang mi ltung zhing rtag par mi'i lam dang / gnam gyi steng du skye'o// ngas de ltar shing 'di'i drung du 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi chos kyi khrims
96b8: mdo tsam zhig phye ba khyed la sogs pa snying gcig tu brtul te so sor thar pa la bslabs la dga' zhing gus par gyis shig/ gzugs med pa'i gnam gyi rgyal po'i le'u slob pa'i blon 'debs pa'i nad nas gcig pu gcig
97a1: bu nas rgya zhing mngon par bshad do/ / de'i tshe slob ma mkhas pa sum stong 'dug cing nyan pas sangs rgyas kyis khaton blags pa thos nas sems thag pa nas spyi bo la khyer te/ dga' gzha' nas rtag par gzung
97a2: sugazung ngo / / de ltar shAkya thub pa sangs rgyas kyis yan chad bang mo'i me tog gi snod kyi khams kyi rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku'i sems kyi gnas chos kyi sgo mo le'u yi nang na zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims bcu bshad zin to// sto
97a3: phrag brgya 'bum gyi thub pa yang de bzhin no/ / dbang po chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal po'i pho brang nas 'di'i gtsang mo'i shing drung na 'dug pa bcu'i gnas na chos dang tshul khrims kyi le'u yang bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' thams
97a4: cad la bsgob bshad kyis mi lang ngo / / mang po pal rtag par gzungs su zung la kha ton du lhogs shig/ de'i gzhud bkrol bshad pa de yin no// stong phrag brgya yang 'bum gyi khams pad ma'i me tog snod kyi khams rdul phras
97a5: snyed kyi khams kyi thams cad kyi sems kyi snod/ tshul khrims kyi snod grangs med pa'i smon lam gyi snod yon tan dang / sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin 'dug pa'i snod de sangs rgyas thams cad grangs mang / chos kyi sgo mo yang bags
97a6: zin to/ / stong phrag brgya'i khams kyi nang na sems can thams cad kyis gzungs su bzung ste/ dga' zhig gus par byed do// sems kyi gnas rgya cher bye ba'i gzungs ni sangs rgyas kyi me tog 'od kyi rgyal ba'i le'u yinapa/
97a7: nas bshad do// sangs rgyas bdun gyis tshig gi le'u bshad pa gcig ste/ sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis bstan pa'i tshul/ dri mas bshad pa// bzod pa'i dam pas dka' thubazhugs// bzod pa'i dam pas mya ngan
97a8: 'da'/ / gzhan la gnod pa de ni byang chub ma yin no// gnyis te spyi tor sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa// mig can mi bde long bas byol te 'gro// mkhas pas 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten na// sdig pa kun kyang rnam par spongs//
97b1: gsum te thams cad skyob sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa/ gnod la mi smra ma sems te// so sor thar pa bzhin du sdom// zas kyi tshed kyang rig par bya// gnas kyang dben par 'jug par bya// rab tu sems dang ldan pa ni//
97b2: de ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o// bzhi sna log par dad sel sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa// ji ltar bud dpe me tog gi/ kha dog gsung la mi gnod par// khu ba blangs te 'bu rab bzhin// de bzhin byang chub grod du spyod// gzhan gyi
97b3: rnams la me lta bar/ / gzhan gyis legs pa byas la'o// bdag rang nyid la ltos// legs nyes ci byas pa// lnga ste gser thub sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa// bsam gtan la na ma byel bar// thub pa rnams kyis tshul
97b4: thub slobs/ / mi bde bar yang mi 'gyur mgon// mngon par zhi bas rtag tu dran pa'i yid// drug ste bsod skyabs sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa// thams cad sdig pa mi bya'o// dge'o cog ni rdzogs par bya// bdag gi sems kyang
97b5: shin du gdul/ / de ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o// // bdun te shAkya thub pa sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa// lus kyis su ni sdom pa dge/ ngag gi sdom pa yang ni dge/ yid kyi sdom pa yang ni dge/ dge' thams cad
97b6: pa ni/ byang chub kun la mgon sgrubs byed// nyon mongs thams cad kun las skyob// byang chub dag bsrung yid kyang sdom// lus kyis mi dag mi bya zhing // 'di gsum las las rnam par sbyongs// 'thob po drang srong
97b7: gsungs pa'i lam/ / mi yis brdegs spyos sha mo glan// sdig gi mi la sems mi 'khon// gshe ba'i mi la'ang rtag tu gtsang // mi yis ngan byas bdag mi byed// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab btsun byas// 'jig rten
97b8: mnga' ba skyabs nus/ / sangs rgyas 'dis tshul khrims bshad pa// ngas rgya cher bshad du kun rdzogs// sangs rgyas kun dang slob ma rnams// chos kyi tshul khrims gus par 'dzin// gcig la gcig kyang gus par byos
98a1: chos la drin gzo tshog tshang na/ / bya ba med pa'i chos thob nus// tshul khrims yi ge bshad zin nas// sems gcig brtul te byang chub thob/ chos kyi rgya mo rdzogs s+ho//
98a2: rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sUr+ya gar+b+ha nA ma ma hA bebu l+ya sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shin du rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo// bal po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
98a3: thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs te/ gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan
98a4: grangs med dpag tu med pa dag nas der lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med/ dpag tu med/ brjod du med pa dag gis kyang yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas so// de bzhin du phyag
98a5: bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag nas der 'dus te lhags pa'i nyan thos chen po gradra med/ dpag tu med/ brjod du med pa dag gis kyang yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas so// de bzhin du phyogs
98a6: bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag nas 'dir lhags pa brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po dang / lha'i dbang po dang / klu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / dri za'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang
98a7: po dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang / mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po grangs med/ dpag tu med/ brjod du med pa dag gis kyang mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sa dang nam mkha'
98a8: la 'gro ba'i lam gang bar gyur to/ / de bzhin du 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin da // nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang
98b1: lho 'phye chen po gzhan dang gzhan grangs med/ dpag tu med pa dag kyang lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la gyen du lta zhing / bcom ldan 'das ring po mi thogs par mthar phyin pa/ nam mkha' lhur sdud pa
98b2: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab tu 'byed pa/ dbugs rngub pa dang / 'byung ba dran pa 'chi ba med pa'i skyo/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa lung bstan pa ston pa na cang mi smra bar 'khod de/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i myi mjed kyi
98b3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sa dang nam mkha'i lam gang bar gyur cing / da dung bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi char gyis ston pas tshim par ma gyur nas thal mo dag rab tu sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kho na la lta zhing
98b4: 'khod pa ni dper na na pa dag sman pa la lta bar byed pa bzhin dang / mun pas khebs pa dag steng ba lta bar byed pa bzhin dang / chu bos khyer ba dag chu 'gram du lta bar byed pa bzhin dang / sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dgra skyabs
98b5: la lta bar byed pa bzhin te/ de ltar mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sa dang nam mkha'i lam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang / nyan thos dag dang / dbang po brgya byin da ga nas lto 'phye
98b6: chen po'i dbang po dag go bar dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha gzhan dang / gzhon dag nas mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams gzhan dang gzhan dag gi bar bcom ldan 'das chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal
98b7: po la lta zhing thal mo rab tu sbyar te cang mi smra bar 'khod par gyur to/ / de'i tshe tshangs pa chen po pad ma 'bar ba'i dpal zhes bya ba sangs rgyas mang po la lhag par bya ba byas pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ bla na med pa
98b8: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyid mi rto pa/ chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa shin du yongs su spyad pa byas par gyur to// de nas tshangs pa chen po pad ma 'bar ba stan las langs te bla gos phrog pa gcig tu gzar
99a1: nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa 'dis tshes bshad par gsol ba
99a2: btab po/ / ring du gshegs shing myur ba'i rkyen dang ldan/ zad pa lhur mdzad mi g.yo 'od gsal ba// rtogs pa thams cad skyed par mdzad pa po// khyod gsung rab zhi rgyu skar tshul mkhyen mkhas// dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba
99a3: dran pa mkhyen/ / tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po dge dang ldan// srid pa gsum po 'di ltar dag 'gyur bar// sems can 'gro ba spong bar mdzad pa po// tshul gcig ldan pa nyid kyi mkhyen mnga' ba// lha mi rnam pa mang po khri
99a4: dag kyang / / som nyi rgal mdzad dge brnyes chu bo rgal// bde 'gro'i mkhyen pa myur dang ldan pa po// byang chub spyod dang sangs rgyas chos mngon gsum// sems g.yo sems can kha cig 'dod klung lhung // mun pas khebs shing
99a5: mig dang mi ldan pa'i/ / sdug bsngal thams cad bcom par gyur lags pa// ma thos dge bral slob dpon mkhas ldan pa'i// skye bo bral la mi dbang thugs rje skyed/ mnyam pa'i chos nyan spro ba'i pha rol mchi// sred pa gzho
99a6: pabashad par mdzad du gsal/ / skye klung ba ro la gshegs thu ba thugs rjes gsungs// blo 'tshal skye ma sred pa'i dra ba'i lam// de dag thams cad nyon mangs rgya ba can// dang ni sems can mabyams 'gyur gcad drags
99a7: gang sdug bsngal ba zhi dbang drug dang / yid kyang ni 'gyur srid skyon rgyal ba gsungs// srad pa bral ba srad rgya mi mnga' ba// sems can gdung ba dpal kun bral gyur pa// de snang thub pa thugs rtse bas rgyus// srad pa yin
99a8: cha brang sems mdzad pa/ / myung du ba de ni 'chi ba ma mchis pa'o// chos kyang srad pa gcod pa bsha par gsal// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa padama'abar ba'i dpal la 'di skad ces paka'astsal to//
99b1: gang dag sngon na pha rol byin// spyod pa spyod cing spyod 'gyur ba// de dag nyan thos chos rnams la// nam yang dga' bar mi bya ste// sangs rgyas chos las nyams 'gyur ba'i// ltung ba gnyis pa gzhan med de/ de ni yang dang yang du
99b2: yang / gnyi gar sems ni 'jug pa yini// khro dang nyan thos chos rnams dang // rkyen gyi byang chub 'jug pa yin// chos gsum rnam par spangs pas na// sangs rgyas chos rnams rdzogs par 'gyur// skye gnas bzhi ldan sem
99b3: can 'di/ / sangs rgyas zhing 'dir lhags pa dag/ thams cad 'dod pa rten mi byed// thams cad mi sdug thob pa yin// 'di na sems can mkhas pa gang // byang chub mchog gi phyir zhugs shing // gang blo gzungs dang bzod pa
99b4: la/ / brtson zhing legs par goms byas la// dbang po drug gi sgo bsdams shing// dkyil mo dkrung gis dran bzhag nas// rang gi spyod yul sa non pa// phyi ma'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs// nor bdun rab tu rdzogs pa'ang yin//
99b5: 'dir ni mi sdug tshul bshad na// kun bzhi gang yin sems can gyi// 'ching ba brtan pa 'dir bshad 'gyur// ngas ni chos kyi sar sna spangs// sems can srung phyir ma bshad de// byang chub phyir sems 'dir ma btang // phyog
99b6: bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag gis/ / chos 'di yun ring gnas bya zhes// sa 'di yongs su spyad mdzad cing // sa 'di byin gyis brlabs pa yin// de bzhin du ni khyod kyis kyang // zhing 'di la ni brtse bar byos//
99b7: de bzhin bzod pa dag gis rtses// bsdam nas yun ring gnas par byos// nyan thos theg pa ngas bshad de// sems can chags las thar bya zhing // phung po dag dang khams rnams dang // skye mched stong pa ngas
99b8: bshad de/ / zhi gnas rnam pa bcu gsum dang // lhag mthong nga yi bshad bya ste// 'dod pa'i 'ching bas dam bcings pa'i// sems can de yis rnam dag 'gyur// sems can rnams la snying brtsebs// nyan
100a1: thos rnams kyi bden pa bzhi/ / chos rnams rtag tu yun gnas dang // zag pa med phyir ngas bshad do// nyan thos bden pas 'dul ba ni// srid pa'i mtshe las ngas bsgral lo// byang chub spyod pa thams cad kyang khyi
100a2: nas khyed la bstan par bya'o/ / de nas de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni nyan thos kyi gtam yang
100a3: dag par rab tu ston par mdzad kyi theg pa chen po'i gtam mi mdzad da snyam mo/ / de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sa yongs
100a4: su spyad pa'i phyir dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na chos kyi tshul ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang / de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di gang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na lha dang kA
100a5: dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi yin pa ma dad pa rnams mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyir dang / dad pa rnams phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
100a6: sems can chos la mngon par brtson pa dag dang / chos la gnas pa dag dang / yon tan gyis phyug pa dag dang / tshul khrims kyi dri dang yang dag par ldan pa rnams bde ba la reg pa dang / rnam par tho 'tsham pa med par bya ba'i
100a7: phyir dang / byang grol gyi bde ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / ji nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di shin du yon tan dag gis bsgo bar bya ba'i phyir dang / phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan thams cad kyang
100a8: bsgo ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang / bla ma la gus pa dang phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur par bya ba'i phyir bdag cag nang du yang dag par 'jog par bzhed pas ma la bdag cag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs pa
100b1: bya ste/ bdag cag thams cad kyis sa'i steng du skyil ma krung gis 'khod par bya zhing / rang rang gi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i bzod pa dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / ras 'byer dag gis gnas pas/
100b2: tu bya gor ma chag go snyam mo// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bskal pa brgyas nges par byung ba dag dang / gang dag sa bcu dag dang / gang dag mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzed pa la gnas pa'i' bar dgang
100b3: gang dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa dag dang / mi 'jigs pa thob pa dag gi bar de dag thams cad sa steng 'dir skyil mo krung gis 'khod par gyur to// de shin
100b4: drarang rang gi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchog bya sa cad kyi bzod pa dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin dag la mnyam par bzhag pa dag tu gyur to// yang de'i tshe bsod nams kyi stobs ji lta ba bzhin du rgyu mthun pa'i rgyu'i stobs kyis byang
100b5: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mnyam par gzhog pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan byed pa de dag las kha gcig gi lus las 'od 'di lta bu byung ste/ dper na mar me'i 'od lta
100b6: kha cig gin skar mda' dang mnyam pa dag go/ / kha cig gi ni brgya byin dang mnyam pa dag go// kha gcig gi ni mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang mnyam pa nas kha gcig gi na zla ba dang mnyam pa'i bar dag go// kha gcig gi ni nyi ma
100b7: dang mnyam pa dag go/ / kha gcig gi ni nyi ma cig dang mnyam pa dag go// kha gcig gi ni nyi ma gsum dang mnyam pa dag go// kha gcig gi ni nyi ma lnga dang mnyam pa dag go/ kha gcig gi ni nyi ma stong dang mnyam pa'i bar dag
100b8: go/ / kha gcig gi ni las las ni nyi ma bye ba brgya stong dang mnyam pa'i 'od dag byung ste/ mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i snang ba chen po rgya che ba de lta bas 'dzag rten khyab par gyur to// dag
101a1: gsus las mtshan bya sems nag zhan dag gsus dang sems kyi dpal ga pa dang / dka ba du/ mchim par byed pa/ da thams ca ga cazhi ba byed ga/ pa pa thas cad pa byed /
101a2: lus kyi gnas ngan le na thams cad ngas/ zhi bar byed pa/ pa kris pa dang nom pa thams cad rab kra'i bar byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad bcu par byed pa/ khro ba thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dang / nyon mo
101a3: dag 'ching bathams cad ba tu zhibar byed pa'i 'od byung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'din srid pa gsum gyi btson 'i tsug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa thams cad kyi bar rab tu ni par byed de// de'i rje sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dren sems can
101a4: thams cad sangs rgyas la 'bab pa dag dang / chos la 'bab padag dang / dag 'dun gyi yon// nul dga' la la mams pa dag 'khod par gyur to// yang de'i ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di phyogs bcu'i gad ga'i klung gi sa
101a5: srid kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dang / stong pa ma yin pa dag dang / yongs su dgu pa dang / yongs su dag pa lnga yin pa dgan kun nas l+h+wam me/ ldan te/ lhung dang yang dag par snang ba ni 'dis ste// mtshan ma mun pa byung
101a6: rnazla pa dang nyim ba rgya stong shar nas l+h+wam mo/ ldanane/ lhung de ba bzhin // de ltar de'i tshe mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi ning yang phyogs bcu'i gang gA'i klung gi phyim snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dang / stong pa ma yin pa dag /
101a7: yongs su dag dang yongs su ma dag pa mchog mam/ lan / yang de kru // de nas sangs rgyas kyishi de de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po gang dag yod pa dang / gang dag brtul pa brgyas
101a8: pang byung bdag dang / gang dag sangs rgyas kyi kyis pa 'das pa bco brgyad la gzhan gam gus pa ni ye shes la mkhas pa dag dang / mi 'jigs pathob pa'i ba de dag sangs rgyas kyi mthus de rnas pas te/ sems kyin
101b1: cig ma gcig dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir zhugs nas gnas ji lta ba bzhin sa steng du skyil mo krung gis 'khod par gyur to/ / de bzhin du rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs la nan tan dag tu byed cing ji ltar dge ba'i phyogs
101b2: kyi stobs paskyed pa thob pa de dag dang / mi 'arigs pa'i hUM dang rkyen dang ldan pa de dag gi lus las de 'dra ba kho na'i bod byung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskod nas nyan thos chen
101b3: po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ / byed bsam gtan gyi yul gyi mthul ltos shig/ byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyus bdud thams cad kyi yul dang / klu thams cad kyi yul zil gyis mnan nas/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
101b4: 'dir chos kyi tshul dud / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir dang / gsal bar mdzad pa'i phyir mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad yongs su spyad pa mdzad do// de bzhin du da ltar byang chub sems dpa'
101b5: sems dpa' chen po grangs med pa/ dpag tu med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bsam gtan dang / mngon par shes pa'i yul la rnam par rtse ba dang ldan pa dag gis mi mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na chos kyi tshul yun ring du
101b6: gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang / gsal bar bya ba'i phyir dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / la ma yin da/ nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa ma dad pa rnams dad par bya ba'i phyir dang / dad pa
101b7: rnams phyi zhing 'phel ba bya ba'i phyir dang / sems pan chos lha mngon pa brtson pa dang / chos kyi gnas pa dag dang / yon tan gyis drug pa dag dang / sems pa dang dang ldan par byung ba rnams bdeb la dag pa dang rnam
101b8: bar tha 'tsham pa med par bya ba'i byor dang / nga'i bstan parab tu mi 'jigs par bya ba'i phyir dag byang grol gyi bde ba yongs su rdzogs par byi ba'i phying sa chen po 'di yongs su spyad par byas pa yin no// de ni ti byin
102a1: brlabs par bya ba'i phyir de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsam gtan gyi yul dag gis rnam par rtse bar byed do/ / sa phyogs gang dang gang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
102a2: 'di dag 'khod cing bsam gtan gyi yul dag gis rnam par rtsen par byed pa de dang der/ de ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang kha cig tu la la'ang 'das nas sems can 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas skrag par byed cing mya ngan las
102a3: 'das pa 'dod pa dag sku gdung gi mchod rten ngas byed du 'jug par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi bzhugs khang dag gam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dag gam/ chos kyi bzhags khang dag byed par 'gyur ro// yang na der glegs
102a4: bam du bri ba byas nas nga'i chos kyi sku yang 'chang bar 'gyur ro/ / der yang mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang byed par 'gyur zhing / der rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang 'bul bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ gser dang dngul
102a5: dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / dbyig dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru la sogs pa dang / dar yug dang / dril bu dang / za bug dang / gso ras bzang po dang / yul
102a6: ka shi'i ngas bzang po dang / dbu rten nang tshangs can dang / gding ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / chos gos dang / mgur gyi rgyan dang / spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / lus 'dud pa dang / bla ma
102a7: dang / gus pa chen po dang / gces par byed pa dag tu 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe phyag sor bcu'i thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de dag gi mchod pa ni de nas nga nyid kyis bzhes par mdzad de/
102a8: sems can de dag thams cad ni bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum gyis phyir mi ldog pa dag tu 'gyur ro// sa phyogs la lar ni gtsug lag khang dang / gnas khang dang / 'chags dang / dgon pa'i gnas dang / bskyed
102b1: mos tshal dang / kun dga'i ra ba dag rab tu shom par byed do// yang na nyan thos kyi chos kyi gnas pa rnams la mchod pa dang / rim gro rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i
102b2: gsos sman dang / yo byad dag gis byed par 'gyur ba 'am/ byed du 'jug par 'gyur ro// gtsug lag khang dang / 'chags dang / dgon pa'i gnas de dag tu yang bskur stir byas te chos nyan pa dang / rnam par gtan la dbab pa'i
102b3: gtam byed pa dag du 'gyur ba 'am/ thugs pa ma dag klog par 'gyur ro// gtsug lag khang dang / 'chags la sogs pa de dag tu yang yongs su gtong ba rnam pa sna chags dag yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/
102b4: zhing go gzhi'am/ khyim gyi gzhi'am/ kun dga'i ra ba'i gzhi 'am/ bran dang / bran mo dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang / ba lang dang / ma ha dang / bong bu dang / byugs gzhan dag dang / snod spyad kyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs
102b5: dag der yongs su gtong bar 'gyur zhing / nga'i nyan thos kyis chos kyi gnas pa rnams longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir mal cha dang stan gyi yo b+had rnam pa sna tshogs dag sems kyi rgyan gyi don dang / sems kyi yo byad kyi don dang /
102b6: rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyi don dang / byang grol gyi bde ba don gyi mchog thob par bya ba'i phyir sngob bdag tu byung ngo // de ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga'i bstan pa la phan gdags pa'i phyir yongs su gtong ba rnam pa sna tshogs
102b7: dag yongs su gtong bar byed do/ / de bzhin du sems can de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag thams cad la ci nas kyang sems can de dag 'bras bu chen por 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir de rjes su
102b8: thugs rangs par mdzad do/ / bzhes par mdzad do// sems can log par ltung ba'i chos can ma yin pa ngan 'gro gsum rnam par spangs pa de dag thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum gyis phyir mi ldog pa
103a1: dag du 'gyur ro/ / sems can de dag yun ji srid du 'khor ba'i 'khor bar 'gyur ba de srid du yang longs spyod gnyis po chos kyi longs spyod dang / zang zing gi longs spyod dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// ri dang / nags khrod dang / shing
103a2: ljon pa chen po dang / dgon pa dang / nags 'dab gang du yang rung ste/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na thar pa don du gnyer ba chos kyis gnas pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma skra bsrungs pa
103a3: ngag dang / bcom bsnyungs pa dag dang / nang du yang dag 'jog gi tshul dang bcas pa dag dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang mtsham pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dag kyang gnas par 'gyur ro// dge slong
103a4: dag gdul ba'i don du bsam btan gyi yul gyi mthul ltos sho ga/ bdud thams cad kyi yul dang / klu thams cad kyi yul zil gyis mnan nas/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa rnams kyis chos kyi tshul/
103a5: ring thung gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir sngon yang ma mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yongs su spyod pa mdzad do// da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dang pa chen pa grangs med dpag tu
103a6: med pa gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed nas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir zhu ba dang zhal blta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / nam mkha'i mig dang
103a7: ldanags so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ / chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyi byung chub sems dpa' stod pa mnyan pa'i phyi lpags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa de dag kyang ngal snying nye pa'i phyir
103a8: chus duganas par bya ba'i dod dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i don du bsam gtan gyi ru rgyas pa ste/ bu 'ayod napa/ bdud thams cad kyi yul char gcad pa'i phyir dang 'khor bas skrag pa sbyin pa la mngon par brtson pa
103b1: sems can de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yongs su spyod pa dag tu byed do/ / da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga'i bstan pa 'di dang / dam pa'i chos sam/ dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan yun ji srid gnas par
103b2: chos kyis gnas pa'i dge slong rnams la khyim dang / kun dga'i ra ba dang / zhing dang / bran dang / bran mo'i bar gang su dag gis de ltar bsngos pa de la sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong tshul khrims 'chal ba gang dag tha na 'dab ma gcig
103b3: dang / 'bras bu gcig dang / me tog gcig cig yongs su spyod pa dag tu byed na de ni mi blun po de la don ma yin pa dang / phan pa ma yin par 'gyur te/ de la gnod pa bzhi yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ phyogs thams cad du
103b4: mi snyan pa chen po 'gro ba yin/ mdza' bo dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / rim gro ba sdug ci de yid du 'ong ba dag dang / myur du 'bral bar 'gyur ba yin/ nad tshabs chen po yun ring
103b5: ba dag gis thebs par 'gyur ba yin/ de'i chos gos dang lhung gzed gang yod pa yang 'jigs pa chen po lngas phrogs par 'gyur ba yin no// lnga gang dag gis zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po dang / chom rkun dang me dang / chu
103b6: dang / bgo skal la spyod pa mi mdza' ba dang lnga po de dag gis so// de'i 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'dod pa ma yin pa'i 'bras bu bzhi myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba yin te/ bzhi gang dag yin zhe na/ lus zhig nas sems can
103b7: dmyal ba chen po mi zad par skye bar 'gyur ba yin/ de gal te brgya la res 'ga' zhig dus ring zhig 'das nas sems can dmyal ba de nas shi 'phos nas 'brog dgon pa ro skam gyi nang du dud 'gro dang yi dgas kyi ris
103b8: su long ba dang rkang lag med pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhing / de lo brgya stong mang po dag tu bkres pa dang / skom pas yongs su gdud pa chen po'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba yin/ gal te brgya la res 'ga'
104a1: zhig 'dus ring zhig 'das nas de dag gi phos nas lo brgya stong mang po dag tu sbrul gdug pa long ba rdul za ba dag ga ning du skye bar 'gyur ba yin/ de brgyal res 'ga' zhig de nas shi 'phos nas gal te mi rnams
104a2: kyi nang du skyes nas/ 'on kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa stong pa dag tu ma nyid 'thob pa rnyed par 'gyur zhing / mong rdul ba dang / tshul du mi shes par 'gyur ba dang / mig mtshang ba dang / lag pa mtshang ba dang / rkang pa
104a3: mtshang ba dang / khyi'i longs spyod kyi kha zas la ga du zhing rgyug khrung sa'i kha zas za ba dang / 'dam rdzab dang / phyag darang khrod na nyal ba dang / 'brog dang / dgon pa dang / lam po che rnams na 'tsha bar 'gyur la/ de nas shi 'phos nas
104a4: yang sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir de'i 'bras bu 'dod pa ma yin pa de ltar lci bi 'byung zhe na/ 'di ltar sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong de ni 'di ltar chos kyis gnas pa rnams la khyim dang / zhing dang /
104a5: kun dga'i ra ba dang / bran dang / bran mo dang / phyugs dag gi bar bsngos pa dag/ phrogs nas gang zag rang gi yongs su longs spyod pas longs spyod par byed pa'i phyir te/ sdig pa spod pa'i dge slong de lta bu de ni de ltar ngo mtshar mad
104a6: du byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul med par bya ba dang / rnam par gzhig pa dang / rgyun gcad pa dang / nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa yin no// de bzhin du dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung
104a7: med par bya ba nas nub par bya ba'i bar du brtson pa yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dge ba'i phyogs ni tshogs dang ldan pa yin la/ chos kyi tshul dang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yang dge ba'i phyogs kyis rab tu bye ba /
104a8: de'i phyir de nyid kyi mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa lci ba mngon par grub pa yin no// de nas gnas brtan g.ya 'od srung gis mchim thags nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi nyid rnyed pa ni
104b1: ma thob kyang mi bsngo yi/ rab tu byung nas bza' ba dang btung ba'i slad du log par sgrub pa ni de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ga ya 'od srung chen po de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ gang du de'i sngon
104b2: las rnams zad pa dag tu 'gyur ba'i sems can dmyal bar gnas pa ni bla'i/ / 'di na gang gzhan du spyod pa ni de lta ma yin na// 'on kyang skyes bu blun po kha cig mi nyid thob pa rnyed par dka' ba rnyed de lags par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba
104b3: gang la sdug bsngal thams cad zad pa/ zag pa thams cad mthar thug par 'gyur ba ngo mtshar rmad du byang ba'i rab tu 'byung ba rnyed par dka' ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob nas 'on kyang skyes bu blun po de dag gang
104b4: gis mchod par mi 'gyur ba dang / bza' btung dang bral bar 'gyur ba mi dge'i phyogs rnal 'byor yid la byed pa yongs su bsams nas rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dod pa can dag gis khyim dang /
104b5: zhing dang / kun dga'i ra ba dang / bskyed mos tshal dang / bran dang / bran mo nas rkang bzhi pa dag gi bar dge slong chos kyi gnas pa/ yon tan gyi phyug pa dag longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir dang / dge ba'i phyogs dang 'thun par bya ba'i phyir de ltar
104b6: bsngos pa la sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong de mang du thos pa'i mthu 'am/ khyim na gnas pa'i mthus de dag la bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa phrogs nas bdag nyid kyis gang zag gi 'du shes kyis yongs su spyod par byed de//
104b7: skyes bu blun po de'i log par bsgrub pa de ni de lta bur 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dge slong chos kyis gnas pa/ yon tan gyis
104b8: drug pa dag la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa phrogs nas bdag nyid kyis yongs su spyod par bgyid pa'i dge slong rab tu byung ba'i mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu de lta bu 'byung lags na/ dpe tsam du bgyi na gang yang khyim
105a1: na gnas par gyur la/ dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa phrogs nas bdag nyid kyis yongs su spyod par bgyid na de bsod nams ma lags pa'i phung po ji snyed cig dang
105a2: ldan par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po thong khyed kyis smras pa des ci zhig bya/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong chos kyis gnas pa/ yon tan gyis phyug pa de lta bu dag la longs
105a3: spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dag gis stsol bar ni bgyid kyi/ 'phrog par ni mi bgyid lags so// 'on kyang slad ma'i dris na rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmang rigs ma dad pa 'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs par mi lta ba dag
105a4: 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / dge slong chos kyis gnas pa yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa phrogs nas bdag nyid kyis yongs su spyod par bgyid pa gang dag lags pa de dag gi rgud par 'gyur
105a5: ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po gal te ngas lung bong lta bu'i rgyal rigs dag nas/ dmangs rigs dag gi bar dag chos kyi gnas pa yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la de ltar bsngos pa ni longs
105a6: sbyospyong dang nye bar spyod pa'i phrogs nas bdag nyid kyis longs spyod par byed pa'i gang dag yin pa de dag gi log par sgrub pa 'byung ba de bshad na ni/ de'i tshe de dag kyang nga'i bka' bstan pa'i 'phrin las kyi skabs thob nas spong bdag
105a7: tu byed la yid ches pa dag tu mi byed de/ de dag ni phung bar 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa chen po'i gnod pa gnyi ga dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos lan gnyis su yang 'di skad ces gsol to// /
105a8: bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol// bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs par lta zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba
105b1: legs par bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin pa dang gsal bar bgyid pa'i rgyal rigs nas dmangs rigs kyi bar de dag gi rigs rgyud rigs btsun pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de dag ni khyod kyis bka'
105b2: 'phrin las bstan pa thos nas stobs dang brtson pa mchog tu chen pos rgyal ba'i bstan pa legs par bstan pa gsal bar bgyid pa dang / yongs su skyong ba dag tu 'gyur zhing / gang zag de ltar yang dag par zhugs pa dag
105b3: dang chos kyi gnas pa dag dang / yon tan gyis drug pag/ la yang mchod pa bgyid pa dang / srang ba bgyid pa dang / yongs su sbyong bar bgyid par 'gyur lags so// ma na gnas pa dang / rab tu byung ba de dag kyang 'grags par ma
105b4: lags so/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das khyi man gnas pa gang gis gang zag chos kyis gnas pa dag gis longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa phrogs nas bdag nyid kyis yongs su spyod par bgyid pa de'i rgud par 'gyur ba gang lags/
105b5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'i stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po gal te ngas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na lung bong lta bu'i rgyal rigs nas dmangs rigs kyi bar dag chos kyis gnas pa/ yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs
105b6: spyod dang nye bar spyod pa 'phrog cing / bdag nyid kyis longs spyod par byed pa gang dag yin pa de dag gi log par bsgrub pa 'byung ba de bshad na ni de dag kyang nga'i bka' bstan pa'i 'phrin las kyi skabs thos nas spong ba dag tu byed la yid
105b7: ches pa dag tu mi byed de/ de dag ni bu dbar 'gyur ba'i gnod pa chen po'i gnod pa gnyis ka dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying po sa lan gsum du yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
105b8: bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs par lta zhing bcom ldan 'das kyis chos 'dul ba legs par bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin pa dang gsal bar bgyid
106a1: ba'i rgyal rigs nas dmangs rigs kyi bar dag gi rigs byung rigs btsun pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags so/ / de dag gi ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' 'phrin las bstan pa thos nas stobs dang brtson pa mchog tu chen
106a2: pos rgyal ba'i bstan pa legs par bstan pa gsal bar bgyid par 'gyur zhing / gang zag de ltar yang dag par zhugs pa dag dang / chos kyi gnas pa dag dang / yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la yang mchod pa bgyid pa dang / srung ba bgyid pa//
106a3: dang / yongs su skyong bar bgyid par 'gyur lags so// khyim na gnas pa dang rab tu byung ba de dag kyang 'phrog par mi bgyid lags so// chos kyis gnas pa de dag gi longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa 'phrog par mi bgyid lags so// bcom/
106a4: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po legs so legs so// khyod kyi spobs pa legs so// rgyal po chen po ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang dag rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dag gis chos kyi gnas pa rnams
106a5: la khyim gyi gzhi dang / zhing gi gzhi dang / kun dga'i ra ba'i gzhi dang / bskyed mos tshal dang / bran dang bran mo dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dag de ltar bsngos pa dang / rkang pa bzhi pa'i ber bsngos pa yang 'phrog
106a6: bar byed pa 'am/ rku bar byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal rigs nas dmangs rigs kyi par de thams cad ni mthong ba'i chos la 'byung ba 'dod pa ma yin pa'i chos nyi shu dang myur du ldan par 'gyur ro// nyi shu gang dag ce na/ lha rnams
106a7: kyis yongs su gtad pa yin/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag du yang de'i mi snyan pa grags par 'gyur ba yin/ mdza' bshes dang snag gi gnyen mtshams dag gis kyang de yang yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i dgra bo dag
106a8: kyang mang bar 'gyur ba yin/ nor dang nor gyi yo byad dag las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par g.yeng ba yang mang ba yin/ yan lag ma tshang 'gyur ba yang yin/ de gnyid med pa yin/ rtag tu sred pas gnon par
106b1: 'gyur ba yang yin/ de'i gza' ba dang btung ba yang dug gi bya ba byed pa yin/ sdug pa dang yid du 'ong ba dag dang myur du 'bral ba thob pa yin/ rtag tu gzhan dag dang thab mo 'byung ba yin/ pa dang pa dang / spun dang / chung ma dang / bu mo dang /
106b2: bran dang / bran mo dag kyang bsgo ba bzhin mi byed pa yin/ de'i gsang sngags gsang ba dag dang / nor bsang ba dang / slas gsang ba dang / de'i dngos po gsang ba rnams kyang thams cad gsang shor bdag tu 'gyur ba yin// bsgo skal la
106b3: spyod pa mi mdza' ba la sogs pa lngas kyang longs spyod dag chud za bar 'gyur ba yin/ nad tshabs chen po dag gis kyang myur du thebs par 'gyur ba yin/ sman dang rim gro ba dang bral zhing sha dang khrag skams nas sdug bsngal nyams/
106b4: su myong bar 'gyur ba yin/ rang gi gshad gci dag gi nang du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba yin te/ rgyal po chen po 'dod pa ma yin pa'i las nyi shu po de dag dang myur du ldan par 'gyur ro// gang dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la bsngos
106b5: ba'i longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa dang / nor gyi yo byad 'phrog par byed cing / bdag nyid kyis kyang yongs su spyod par byed pa de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes par 'gyur ro// de der yang tshe bskal
106b6: par lcags dang zangs bzhun 'thung bar 'gyur zhing lcags kyi thu lum za bar 'gyur la/ me'i gos dang / longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa spyod par byed cing gnod pa mi zad pa chen po rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba yin
106b7: tshe bskal pa zad nas kyang de nas shi 'phos nas 'brog dgon pa ro skam dag gi nang du lam du skyes pa'i yi dgas rnams dang skal ba mnyam par rkang pa dang / lag pa dang / mig mtshang bar skye bar 'gyur ro// der yang phyogs pani
106b8: nas langs pa'i rlung kun du tsha ba dag gis kun du gdung bar byed cing sa spu gri dang 'dra ba'i steng du dmyal bar byed/ yongs su dmyal bar byed de/ de der lo brgya stong mang por sdug bsngal de lta bu nyams su myong bar byed pa yin no// dgal te
107a1: brgyal res 'ga' zhig de nas shi 'bos nas kyang rgya mtsha chen po'i nang du lus dpag chad brgya ba'i sha nar nar bor skye bar 'gyur ro/ / sngon gyi las kyi rgyus de 'debag tshad khor yug gi chu zangs bzhun ma ltar dmar po byung /
107a2: bar 'gyur ro/ der yang lo brgya stong mang por chu'i nang du sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pa myang bar byed pa yin no// de de nas shi 'iphos nas kyang 'breg dgon pa chen por rdzus te skye bar sha nar nang po chen po ri dang mnyam pa 'byung bar 'khrur
107a3: ro/ / phyogs pani kun du yang rlung kun du tsha ba dag gis kun du sreg par byed do// der yang phyogs bzhi nas ri dgas dang bya dag lhags te yongs su za ba dag du byed do// de brgyal res 'ga' dus ring zhig 'dus nas de nas sha 'phos nas yang
107a4: sems can dmyal ba chen po dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas kyang sha 'phos nas yang dang yang du log par sgrub pa chen po de lta bu nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ yongs su brtag pa nye bar gzung na/ de brgya la man res 'ga' zhig mi
107a5: rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skyes na yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa dag tu mig ma tshang ba dang / tshul du mi shes par skye bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po gang chos kyis gnas pa dag la bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang
107a6: nye bar spyod pa dang / nor gyi yo byad 'phrog par byed pa de'i log par sgrub pa de ni de lta bu yin no// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po mchi ma dag phyung nas gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan dpa skyes bu gang zag de lta bu ni sems cad
107a7: dmyal ba na gnas par mi bsngo lags kyi/ gang gis ma nyid rnyed pa thob nas bsod nams ma lags pa chen po de lta bu kun tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i ma nyid rnyed pa na de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rgyal
107a8: pa chen po ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rgyal rigs chos kyis gnas pa khyed cag gi lag tu gang zag yongs su gtad kyis srungs shig/ yongs su bsrungs shig/ rab tu byung ba 'am/ khyim na gnas pa gang dge slong chos kyi gnas
107b1: parnams la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod pa dang nye bar spyod pa dang / nor gyi yo byad 'brog par byed pa de la khyed kyis ji nas kyang chos dang 'thun pas chad pas gcad par bya'o// rgyal pos gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gas/
107b2: tegang dag dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / nor gyi yo byad 'phrog par byed pa'i khyim na gnas pa dang rab tu byung ba de dag chos dang 'thun pas chad pas gcod par mi
107b3: bgyid cing / de la rgyal po btang snyoms par gnas par bgyid lags na rgyal rigs de bsod nams ma lags pa'i phung po ji snyed cig skyed par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs
107b4: pa ma gtogs par nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba dag dang bcas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams ji snyed yod pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de lta bu dang / sems can gcig cig ldan par gyur na/ sems can de nyan thos dang
107b5: rang rgyal thams cad las ches khyad par du 'phags pa dang / ches bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur ba yin namargyal pos gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/ bdun ba bcom ldan 'das sems can de ches byad pa du 'dag la ga
107b6: del gang sems can 'tsho ba kun gyi nang na nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba thams cad las ches bsod nams dang ldan pa ni skyes bu 'ga' zhig 'byung ba rabs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po
107b7: gal te sems can sngam de ba sod nams kyi phreng po rdo lta bu dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi brang ba de lta bung de sems can thams cad dang ldan pa dag tu gyur la/ de la gang sems can 'tsha ba thams cad kyi yan lag rnam par
107b8: gcod par byed cing / mig 'byin pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lag pa dang / keng pa dag rnam par gcad par byed pa'i skyes bu 'ga' zhig byung bar gyur na rgyal ba chen po 'di rjesam du sa mas/ skyes bu de bas danams ma yin pa sdig pa
108a1: las ji snyed cig skyed par 'gyur/ de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po mchi ma dag phyung nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po lan thob shig lan thob shig/ de nas
108a2: rgyal po chen po gzugs can snying po shu ma zhes du bzhin du gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang sems can bsod nams dang ldan pa de lta bu gcig gi yan lag dag rnam par gcod par bgyid tsam mig 'byin pa
108a3: dang rna ba dang sna dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dag rnam par gcod par bgyid pa'i skyes bu de yang bsod nams ma lags pa sdig pa'i las grangs ma mchis/ tshad ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis/ dpe ma mchis pa skyed par
108a4: 'gyur ba lags na/ gang de lta bu'i bsod nams dang ldan pa'i sems can thams cad kyi yan lag dag rnam par gcod par bgyid cing / mig 'byin pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dag rnam par gcod pa lta ci
108a5: spos lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa 'tshe ba 'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang rung ste/ lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos
108a6: zad par 'gyur ba'i bar du khyim na gnas pa dang rab tu byung ba gang chos kyi gnas pa/ yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / nor gyis yo byad dang / zhing gi gzhi dang / khyim gyi gzhi dang
108a7: kun dga' rab dang / bskyed mos tshal dang / bran dang bran mo dang / rkang bzhi pa dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dag yod pa de las 'brog gam/ rku ba de la rgyal rigs
108a8: btang snyoms par byed cing / rab tu byung ba dang / khyim na gnas pa rkun ma de dag chad pa ci yod pa bzhin chad pas gcod du mi 'jug na rgyal rigs de bsod nams ma yin pa ches mang du skyed do// rgyal rigs ji lta ba bzhin grong
108b1: gi blar bsgos pa dang / grong khyer gyi bla dang / grong rdal gyi bla dang / ljongs kyi blar bskos pa yang de bzhin du gtang snyoms par byed cing / de ltar chu'i sems can de dag zlog par mi byed na de lta bu'i grong gi bla nas ljongs kyi tha'i bar de
108b2: bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po ches mang du skyed do/ / de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyal po nyid ni shin tu lwa ba lagaso// rgyal rigs na bag ma mchis pa mang
108b3: po dang ldan par gnas pa lags so/ / tsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang yang rgyal po bag ma mchis par gnas shing / gang zag chos kyis gnas pa de lta bu dag srung bar bgyid pa dang / de bzhin du de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod
108b4: dang nye bar spyod pa 'phrog pa'i sems can rnams sdig pa'i las de las slar zlog par bgyid pa dang / grong gi bla nas ljongs kyi blo'i bar yang de bzhin du de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dag tu ba'i sas
108b5: can rnams sdig pa'i las de las snga zlog par bgyid na de bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed cig skyed par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po gal te ngas sngar gsungs pa bzhin bsod
108b6: nams kyi phung po de lta bu dang sems can thams cad dang ldan pa dag tu gyur la/ thams cad kyang btson rang bcug cing bkres pa dang skom pa dag gis gzir bar gyur la/ de la gang sems can thams cad de lta bu'i bsod
108b7: rnams dang ldan pa dag btson rang nas yongs su thar pa byed cing / lo brgya tshang bar yang sems can de dag thams cad la chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dag gis
108b8: rem gro byed pa'i skyes bu 'ga' zhig byung bar gyur na rgyal po chen po 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci skyes bu de bzhin las bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mang lags so//
109a1: btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa skyes bu de ni bsod nams kyi phung po grangs ma mchis/ tshad ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis pa skyed lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de bas
109a2: kyang gang da ltar nas ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma'i bar la chos kyi gnas pa/ yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la de ltar bsngos pa 'phrog po'i sems can rnams sdig pa'i las de las slar zlog par byed pa'i rgyal rigs
109a3: sam/ ljongs kyi bla de bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang du skyed par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te dge slong chos kyis gnas pa gcig gi ma bsrungs na de bsod nams ma lags pa de
109a4: snyed cig skyed par 'gyur lags na/ gang yang gcig gi srung bar bgyid pa de bsod nams de snyed cig skyed par 'gyur legs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po gang zag gcig gi len pa ngas ma
109a5: gnang ngo / / gnyis las ma yin/ gsum gyi ma yin/ bzhi'i ma yin gyi/ rgyal po chen po phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang gcig dang / dgon pa'i gnas gcig tu ye nyung na yang dge slong chos kyis gnas/
109a6: pa lnga'i len par ngas gnang ste/ gaN+DI brdungs nas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong glo bur du lhags pa dag dang lhan gcig tu longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / gnas khang dang mal cha dang / stan dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang /
109a7: na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dag longs spyod par ngas gnang ngo // gal te gtsug lag khang gcig dang / dgon pa'i gnas gcig tu dge slong brgya stong gi bar gnas par byed na/ der yang gaN+DI brdungs nas phyogs bzhi'i
109a8: dge slong glo bur du lkugs pa dag dang lhan gcig tu sman gyi yo byad kyi bar dag la longs spyod par ngas gnang ngo / / ma chags pa dag dang / ma bcings pa dag dang / mchums pa dag dang / nam gyi cha stod dang / nam gyi cha smad
109a9: dag la mi nyal ba'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson pa dag dang / 'khor ba la rgyab kyi phyogs pa dag dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la nang du phyogs pa dag dang / gzhan la mi smod pa dag dang / bdag la mi stong pa dag dang / tsheg shes pa dang /
109b1: sbyangs pa'i yon tan spyod pa dang / rab tu dben pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dag dang / mnyam par gzhag pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dag gis longs spyod par ngas gnang ngo // rgyal po chen po dge slong gi dge 'dun
109b2: gyi nang na sems can de lta bu dag gnas te/ rgyal po chen po dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nang na sems can de lta bu dag la sems can rnams kyis longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa yongs su btang bas bsod nams tshad med pa ba skyed
109b3: do rgyal po chen po gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas gang na dge slong lnga ngam/ lhag par gnas kyang rung ste/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa yongs su dag pa dang / kha na ma thob phra mo dag la yang 'dziH/
109b4: par lta ba dag gnas par byed cing / de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mdo sde de dag kyang ston par byed/ kha ton du byed la/ gzhan la mi smod cing bdag la mi stong pa/ phrag dog dang ser sna rnam par
109b5: spangs pa sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba/ thar pa la mngon par brtson pa dag gnas la/ gaN+DI brdungs nas longs spyod par byed na dge slong gi dge 'dun de lta bu las sems can rnams bsod nams tshad med pa de
109b6: lta bu 'dzin pa dag tu byed do/ / rgyal po chen po ye nyung ste dge slong gi dge 'dun lnga'i tshogs shig yod du zin kyang / gal te yang tshul khrims yongs su dag cing ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa phun sum tshegal
109b7: 'jig rten pha rol gyi kha na ma tho ba la 'jigs par lta zhing sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang 'phags pa'i rigs la mngon par brtson pa yin na/ rgyal po chen po de ni dge slong gi dge 'dun rgya mtsho dang 'dra bar gsungs shing de ni med pas
109b8: tu med pa dag la phan pa byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad las rab tu rnam par thar par byed pa yin par gsungs na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun bcu'i tshe grwa dang zhes bya ba nas brgya stong ga tshogs shes bya/
110a1: bi'i bar dag lta smos kyang ci dgos/ rgyal po chen po dge slong gi dge 'dun gang la bram ze dang khyim bdag chen po dad pa can dag rim gro bya ba'i phyir gaN Ni rlung ba dag tu byed cing / der yang gal te dge sbyong ltar bcos pa sdig
110a2: pa snad pa'i dge slong lta yang rung / mad yang rung ba dag kyang 'dul/ der gal te dge slong chos kyis gnas pa/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa/ ro tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs pa dge slong lnga yang 'dun/
110a3: rgyal po chen po dge slong gi dge 'dun de ni tshes tshad med pa dang ldan pa yin zhing sbyin gnas chen po dang / lha dang mi thams cad kyis mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po de lta bas na dge slong chos kyis gnas pa dag dang /
110a4: kyis kun dga' la dga' ba dag khyad kyi lag tu ngas yongs su gtang ngo // khyim na gnas pa dang rab tu byung ba la las de dag la rkyen gang yang rung ba dag gis gtses sam/ gnod par byas na mi rung gis khyed kyis srungs shig/
110a5: 'phags pa shin du rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo// bam po gnyis pa/ rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci dge slong sdig pa spyod pa
110a6: tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi nang du longs spyod par bgyi lags sam/ chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / ma la cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dam pa dag kyang longs
110a7: spyod dang nye bar spyod par bgyi lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen pa gang khyed kyi rlan pa chen po dang / sna chen po la gtogs pa dang / rgyal pos bababs pa dang / rkang dupa dang /
110a8: rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gzhung lugs las 'gal bar nyes pa dang bcas pa zhig yod na/ gangan rgyal po chen po'i dga' ston nam dus son nye bar gnas par gyur pa'i 'khor gyi nang de
110b1: nyes pa dang bcas pa'i skyes bu 'jug pa dang / langs spyad pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtsa ba nyams su myong bar bya ba dang / bde ba dang yid bde ba mang zhing gnas par nus sam/ rgyal bas gsol pa/ bdun
110b2: pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de bzhin du gang tshul khrims 'tshal ba sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyad pa/ shing rul pa lta bur gyur pa/
110b3: dge slong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas 'che ba/ tshangs par spyod pa ma yin par tshangs par spyod par khas che ba'i gang zag de la bu ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad
110b4: thams cad la gnod pa yin te/ de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos ma yin zhing bdud kyi stobs kyi rigs kyis zin pa yin no// gang zag de ni lam nyam ngab la gnas pa yin te/ de ni phyis kyang 1
110b5: thos kyi dge 'dun gyi nang du bgrang bar ma yin no/ / de bzhin du der 'jug par bya ba ma yin te/ dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la bsngos na than til gyi phug ma tsam yang longs spyod par 'os pa
110b6: ma yin na/ dge 'dun gyi nang du nye bar longs spyod par bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de ni chos 'dul ba 'dis bor ba yin no// rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa btsa
110b7: ldan 'das stod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mtshan ma gang dag gis dge slong tshul khrims 'chal ba/ sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa/ dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyi nang du sman chad gnas pa dang / 2
110b8: spyod dang nye bar spyod par bgyid par ma nges par 'tshal lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal ba chen po rnam pa 'di lta bus tshul khrims 'chal ba'i mgo 'byung bar 'gyur zhes
111a1: gis kyang myur du rnam par shes par mi nus te/ rgyal po chen po 'di ni nang gi dang por sangs rgyas la mgus pa yin no// chos dang dge 'dun dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma'i gnas
111a2: bu rnams la ma gus pa yin/ 'phags pa'i rigs btang ba yin/ rnal 'byor yin la byed pa la kun dga' ba ma yin/ de tshar shes pa dang / khrel yod pa rnam par spangs pa yin/ khyim na gnas
111a3: dang 'dris pa yin/ tshig kyal pa smra ba yin/ bdag la bstod pa yin/ gzhan la smod pa yin/ de lta bu dag la kun dga' ba yin/ sdig pa'i snyi la chags pa yin/ lam ngan par zhugs pa yin/ khengs pa
111a4: yin/ kha drag pa yin/ 'phral g.yor can yin/ 'phyar po yin/ kha shing can yin/ g.yo sku can yin/ sku byed pa yin/ dge sbyong yon po yin/ dge sbyong g.yo can yin/ dge slong ste long lta bu yin/ dge slong
111a5: gi dge 'dun mi mthun par 'dod par smra ba yin/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa la mngon por dga' ba yin/ 'du 'dzi'i kun dga' la dga' ba yin te/ sdig pa can gyi dge slong tshul khrims la
111a6: ba de ni ji srid du de'i tshul khrims 'chal ba'i mgo byung bar ma gyur gyi bar du gang gis kyang mtshan ma de dag gis myur du shes par mi nus so/ / sdig pa can gyi dge slong degang gi tshe khyim gyi bzhi dang / zhing gi gzhi dang /
111a7: kun dga'i ra ba'i gzhi dang / bran dang / bran mo dang / glang po che dang / r+tha dang / rnga mo dang / bong bu dang / lug dag gang zag gir srel bar byed na de ni de'i tshul khrims 'chal ba'i mgo byung ba yin te/ tshul khrims 'chal
111a8: ba'i mgo des ni sdig pa can gyi dge slong de dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nang nas dor ba yin/ gnas par bya ba ma yin/ longs spyad par bya ba ma yin/ dge slong gi dngos po las lhung ba yin/ pham par gyur pa yin te/
111b1: dge slong gi tshul las kyang phyis bskrad du med par 'gyur ba yin no// rgyal po chen po se ga dol pa gnas na gnas par byed pa ni bla'i/ dge slong gdol ba yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa/ rgyud tshig pa/ don
111b2: la mi lta ba/ 'jig rten pha rol btang ba/ snying rje'i bsam pa med pa/ phyi sa khung chen po dang 'dra ba bdud kyi lam du zhugs pa/ lha dang mi rnams la gnod pa byed pa/ dus gsum thams cad kyi drang srong thub pa nams/
111b3: la slu bar byed pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung chos kyi mar me med par byed pa/ chos kyi rgya mtsho skams par byed pa/ chos smra ba'i dbyen byed pa/ sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag 'drid par byed pa/ dge slong chos kyis
111b4: gnas pa rnams la tho 'tsham par byed pa/ dge 'dun 'dun pa 'thun par byed pa'i rgyun gcod par byed pa ni de lta ma yin no// sdig pa can gyi dge slong de ni yongs su 'dzin pa'i rkyen gyis 'tho ris kyi lam las rgyal
111b5: po ldog par byed pa yin no/ / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmang rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye bu dang / bu mo ldog par byed pa yin no// ngan song gi lam gsum la rab
111b6: tu gzhog par byed pa yin no/ / rgyal po chen po sdig pa can gyi dge slong de yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis lha dang me ji snyed cig mi skyid par byed par 'gyur ba la ltos// rgyal po chen po de lta bas na
111b7: yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong tshes kyis gnas pa/ yon tan gyis phyug pa dag dang lhan cig tu kun dga'i ra ba gcig dang / gtsug lag khang gcig tu gnas par mi bya'o// gal te
111b8: sdig pa can gyi dge slong de kha drag cing ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa rnam par spangs te/ dge slong de dag dang lhan gcig gnas par byed na/ de'i phyir dge slong chos kyis gnas pa de dag gis byams pa dang ldan zhing
112a1: chos dang 'gran pa madran par byaste/ gal te sdig pa can gyi dge slong da gnas de nas 'gro bstan/ de ldan na legs/ gal te 'gro bar mi byed na de dge slong chos kyis gnas pa de dag do la grong khyer dang / zong sa/
112a2: dang / zong dang / ljongs dang / ri 'od de dag na rgyal rigs sam/ bram ze'am/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmar rigs gang dbang byed du 'jug pa de la sbran par bya'o// gal te rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / da mang rigs nges
112a3: sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa gnas de nas zlog par byed na der ni dge slong chos kyis gnas pa de dag gis gnas par bya'o/ / ji ste rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / ramang rigs de
112a4: bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / rnyed pa'i rgyus sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs byed pa lta na/ de'i phyir dge slong chos kyis gnas pa de dag gis khro bar bstan par mi bya'o// chags pa ma yin/
112a5: nga rgyal ma yin te/ 'on kyang cang mi smra bar gnas de nas 'gro bar bya zhing dgon pa'i gnas sam/ nags khrod dam/ ri 'am/ ri bo'i bor gzhan gdan skra gcom chud pa dang / nang du yang dag 'jog dang /
112a6: 'tsham pa 'am/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / 'thun par der gnas par bya'o// yang rgyal po gzugs can snying pos mchi ma phyung nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang
112a7: bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / rnyed pa'i slad du sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs bgyid cing / dge slong chos kyis gnas pa/ yon tan gyis phyug pa rnams kyang gnas
112a8: nas mchi bar 'gyur ba'i rgyal rigs dang / bram ze 'am/ rje'u rigs dang / dmang rigs ni nyams pa lags so// btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu nyams pa lags so// de'i mi nyid rnyed
112b1: pa ni rnyed par dka' ba lags te/ 'khor ba na 'khor bar bgyid pa de'i mi nyid rnyed pa'i tha ma ni de lags so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa grangs ma mchis/
112b2: dpag tu ma mchis pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur bas kyang / gang dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyi tshig gus par mi nyan pa'i sems can de ni ngan song rnams
112b3: las yongs su thar bar bgyi ba 'am/ mtho ris su gzhag par mi spyod de/ de'i sdig pa'i las de lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po
112b4: chen po ma 'ongs pa'i dus na la lar gang dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la shin tu dad pa'i rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang rje'u rigs dang / dmar rigs dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gi don
112b5: du dgon pa'i gnas dag byed par 'gyur ro/ / gtsug lag khang dang / dgon pa'i gnas der yang khyim gyi gzhi nas zhing gi gzhi dang / bran dang bran mo dang / kun dgi' ra ba'i bar de dag gi longs
112b6: spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa'i phyir yongs su gtong bar byed par 'gyur ro// de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang rgyal rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu dag u0f7fskye bar 'gyur ba nas 'dra shes meda'
112b7: shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu yang skye bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang yang zad par
112b8: 'byung ba nas ring pa mi thogs par sbyin pa po dang / byin bdag de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba'i bar du 'gyur te/ de dag ni nga'i bstan pa la
113a1: dge slong chas kyis gnas pa rnams yang dag par 'dzin par byed par 'gyur ba yin no/ / rgyal po chen pa 'di lta ste/ gang khyud kyi bu 'am/ sar+thA na ma/ bkrabs pa 'am/ ched pa la gtags
113a2: pa gang yang rung bzhig nyes pa dang bcas pa yin na/ gang dang gang du rgyal po chen po'i dus ston nam dga' ston byung ba der rgyal po chen pos dga' ba dang bde ba/ rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su myong bar
113a3: byed na/ rgyal po chen po 'di ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de khyod kyi 'dun du 'dug cing skyid pa dang rtse ba myong bar byed pa 'am/ dga' ba dang bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gnas par byed nus sam/ rgyal
113a4: pos gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags te/ skyes bu des bdag gi mdun na mchis par yang rngo mi thog lags na skyid pa dang rtse ba myong bar bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom
113a5: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de bzhin du gang zag gang zhig gang zag gir bran dang bran mo srel bar byed cing khyim gyi gzhi nas zhing gi gzhi dang lug dag gi bar srel bar byed na nga
113a6: de'i ston pa ma yin la/ de yang nga'i nyan thos ma yin no// dus gsum du gshegs pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la yang gnod par byed pa dang bcas pa yin no// de ni chos
113a7: kyi gnas pa rnams kyi gnas pa de ltar bsngos pa dag dag tu chos dang 'thun pas gnas par 'os pa ma yin no/ / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmang rigs gang yang sdig pa can
113a8: gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa de'i don byed pa dang / de nas 'gror mi ster ba'i rgyal ba rigs nas dmangs rigs kyi sa bar de ni dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
113b1: samams cad la pa gan byung pa mas / / stan sa su sa tha nus pa sa da da
113b2: kyinang du skye bar 'gyur pa/ / rgyal ba chen po de lta bas na 'dag la phan par yang dag par rjes su lta bas sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'den pa dang bas pa'i phyogs su gnas par mi bya'o//
113b3: de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltad de ni lha dang mi thams cad la yang gnod pa dang / phan pa ma yin pa dang / log par lung bar bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung med par bya ba'i phyir zhugs
113b4: pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ / rgyal po chen po rgyal rigs sam/ bram ze 'am/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmang rigs gang zhig dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyi chos kyi phyogs la yang dag par gnas par byed cing
113b5: sdig pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyi phyogs la ma yin no/ / de sbyin pa mi sbyin du zin kyang 'on kyang de ni chos kyi rgyu'i phyir dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sbyin bdag dam
113b6: pa yin no/ / de ni dam pa'i chos rjes su srung ba'i phyir dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dam pa yin par lta bar bya'o// 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba
113b7: nas ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po chen po de lta bas na rgyal rigs 'tsham pa khyod kyi lag tu chos
113b8: kyis gnas pa dang bstan pa ngas yongs su gtad kyis lnga brgya pa tha ma la gnas pa'i bar du khyod kyis nga'i chos kyis gnas pa'i yang dag par zung shig dang / de'i rkyen gyis nga'i chos kyi tshul 'di dang /
114a1: dganam chog gsum gyi gdud ldan rang du gnas par 'gyur dang lha dang ma rnams la phan pa dang ba par 'thur // de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can spyang pas 'di skad ces gsol
114a2: ga pa sa na sanas ta banas kyi san/ com ldan 'as mas kyis dan sa ta pa gdags pas gags par ma lags/ btsam ldan sa kyis pa phrul

114a4: N+Dal bachen pa dge slong 'di ga la ta myed par das gad / / dus ched pa zag pa chen pa'i yad las le' bcu ga cikA paste/ nyi ma byeng pa'i lajal sa dam pa'i chas
114a5: btsung ba dus pa di brtag sa / 'ang shin ban pa ldan 'das rgyal pa gzugs can b+h+r-i po dang babs gcig ca gis tshas kyis gnas pa rnams can rngu bsrung ba'i gtam
114a6: yang dag par rnam pa mdzad pa de'i tsha de'i dus na shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi ning chad med pa gang gA'i klung gi byam snyed 'das pa den 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su gdu ba med pa zhes bya ba yod / / na
114a7: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsam pa ka'i mdog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsha zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngan bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
114a8: gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog de'i 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po zhes bya ba chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
114b1: chen ba nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying pos chen du rnam par bltas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa nyi ma'i shugs kyi snang pos seng gnam mkha' la byang chub sems dpa' sem pa dang /
114b2: chen ba zangs mad pag rnam bkur byugs nas rnas shing thugs pa la ba gam thang bar gyur te// de nas gang mabyung chus sam sa dpa' sems dpa' can po dag 'a da banu blags pa bltas
114b3: kya / de ras snang ba chen pa mthong nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas tsam pa ka'i mdag ga la ba de lags pal mi sbyar ba rab ca 'du nas 'di skad ces gsal to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das steng gi nam mkha' mo
114b4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis pa shar phyogs nas chos shing nub phyogs su mchi ba dag bdag gis mthong lags so// nub phyogs su snang ba chen po yang
114b5: bdag gis mthong lags na 'di la rgyu gang lags/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
114b6: rigs kyi bu nub phyogs mu sa ngas rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das nas sdigs ma lnga dang ldan par gnas pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dang
114b7: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bcugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ chos kyi tshul dang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yun ring du gnas par mdzad pa'i phyir dang / chos kyis gnas
114b8: panyid kun du mi gcod pa'i phyir 'dus pa chen po la theg pa gsum rnam par gtan la dbab pa bstad pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam sangs rab tu ston par mdzad do/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzod deng bdud kyi yul nam
115a1: bar gzhig pa'i phyir dang / stobs dang mi ldan pa mdzad pa'i phyir dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar mdzad pa'i phyir dang / chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par mdzad pa'i phyir 'du ba mdzad de/
115a2: dar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rin po che tog ces bya ba'i gzungs sngags bshad cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang longs spyod pa mdzad nas slar gshegs so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
115a3: pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po yang dag par 'dus par mdzad de/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i spyan gsum dang /
115a4: tshangs pa'i gnas pa dag bstan kyang dadung 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi sa dang nam mkha' na 'dres par gang ba zhig de bzhin gshegs pa chos dam pa gsung pa shAkya thub pa'i chos bstan pa
115a5: la ngoms pa med do/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu snyan par gsung ba shAkya thub pa'i sdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang / nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa nyid dang / bdud kyi yul rnam par 'jig
115a6: par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u dang / sems can gyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags bshad par bzhed nas/ de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na
115a7: p ha rol du phyin pa drug la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bskal pa brgyas nges par byung ba nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la gzhan gyi drang mi 'jog pa'i phyir mi
115a8: ldog pa sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'i bar 'khod pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir zhugs par gyur cing / 'dir 'khod nas rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs dang bsam
115b1: gtan dag gis rnam par spyod par gyur la/ des na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'daras chen pa shin du skal ba dang ldan pa dang / bcud dang ldan pa dang / yan tan dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / dun
115b2: 'bras dang ldan pa dang / gtong ba dang ldan par sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan bzhin gyur cig snyam dgongs so// de lta bas nad ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag sangs rgyas
115b3: zhing mi mjed der zhugs pa de dag der 'khod nas rang rang gi ji ltar 'tsham pa'i dge ba'i phyogs kyis bsam gtan ngag byed de/ / sgom pa de dag las kha cig gis lus las ni 'od 'di lta bu
115b4: byung ste/ dper na 'bru mar gyi mar me bzhin no// kha cig gis lus las ni 'od 'di lta bu'i bar dag byung ste/ gang na zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po'i 'od bzhin no// der byang chub sems dpa'
115b5: sems dpa' chen po mang du 'dus pa da ltar snang ba chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed khyab par gyur te/ / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
115b6: d pa' chen po gang dag lhags par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang sngon der ma byin pa sha stag de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin las langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi
115b7: mjed der chas te/ der dor nas kyang skyil mo dkrung gis 'khod cing rang rang gi bsam gtan rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis rtse bar byed do// der yang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la de dag phyag 'tshal
