208b2: po des kyang rkyen gyi dbang gis de dag la rgyu skar gyi go rims kyi gtam brtsams pa/ ji ltar thams cad thar 'gyur ba// de bzhin du ni shes par bya// khyed la phan pa gzhan med kyi// mthar gyis su ni snyan par
208b3: gyis/ / 'dir ni nam so gang gnas pa// de ni dbyar zla tha chungs te// de ni nyi ma lta yin zhing // klu rnams kun dang 'brel ba yis// skar ma'i dpyad ni phangs pa dang // snying por drang srong sbyor bas bstan// bza'
208b4: dang rgyu skar skar ma rnams/ / nam mkha' la ni su yis bzhag/ mkhas pa rnams ni dga' bgyid pa// lo skor shes pa bshad du gsol// zla ba nyi ma rgyu skar dang / gza' rnams 'gro ba ji ltar lags// zla ba rnams
208b5: kyi dang por ni/ / rgyu skad gang zhig 'byung bar 'gyur// zla ba'i yud tsam gang zhig lags// go rims kyang ni ci 'dra lags// lha ni ci lags rus cig legs// lcib ci lags yang ba gang / phan pa ci lags
208b6: gnod pa ci/ / stobs ci bdag la myur du gsungs// gang gi su ni mtshan mo 'thob// nyi ma'i mdun na ci zhig lags// grib ma'i gom pa du zhig du// nyi ma 'khor bar bgyid pa lags// zla ba gang la lho phyogs
208b7: su/ / nyi ma byang du ji ltar gnas// drang srong khyod la kun zhun// bdag cag la ni kun ston cig/ shes rab chen pos 'jig rten mkhas// skar la dga' bas de skad smras// bskal pa bzang po zhugs
208b8: ba na/ / sngon chad byung ba kye lag 'gro// dpal ldan grong khyer la len du// 'dod pa spangs shing chos dang ldan// gtsang ma 'dod cing rab mkhas pa'i// mi rgyal 'byor pa chen po byung // de yi btsun mo dam pa
209a1: ni/ 'dod pa rnams la 'chums gyur nas// de tshe yul ni dben par yang // gzu lums can dang lhan cig spyad// mngal ni smin par bya ba'i phyir// yang dang yang du spyad nas su// tshe chos kyis sbrum par
209a2: gyur/ / mi sdug pa yi khye'u zhag byung // bong bu'i mgo la bongamagrin po// bod rna bo la bod gdong po// thams cad tsab po ral pa can// mi yi lus ni phyed yod pa// de mthong 'jigs nas myur du ni// snam phyi sar ni de bar ro//
209a3: rag du mi rung mi btsang ba// de phyir srin mo bong mes blangs// gangs kyi gnas su song nas su// bu la chags pas gsos pa yin// bcud kyis len ni mthungs pas na// de tshe lha dang lhan cig 'grogs// shes rab chen
209a4: po skal ldan po/ / rab tu brtson ldan snying rje'i sems// gzi brjid chen po byams pa thob// sems can kun la phan byed pa'i// lha yi tshogs kyang 'dus nas su// rnga bong la ni phyag 'tshal nas// de la yang ni snying
209a5: brtse'i phyir/ / gangs kyi ri bo sprul pa byas// shing dang me tog 'bras bur ldan// dri zhim dga' bar byed pa ste// sna tshogs rtsi yis khebs pa la// bya rnams sna tshogs rten pa yin// der ni drang srong rnga bong de// rnam par dben//
209a6: bar rten nas sra// lo ni drug khri tha ma par yang // rkang pa cig gis dka' thub gnas// brgya byin tshangs pas phyag byas te// lha rnams kun gyis mngon par bstod// gzugs rten lha rnams thams cad dang // der ni tshangs
209a7: pa nye bar 'ongs/ / 'dod rten lha rnams thams cad dang // der ni brgya byin nye bar 'ongs/ klu dang gnod sbyin grum bum dag/ thams cad der ni nye bar lhags// 'jig rten gang su mkhas pa ni// drang srong tshangs par spyod pa
209a8: rnams/ / 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs khams pa// thams cad der ni nye bar lhags// kun gyis drang srong rnga bong la/ mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas// btud nas thal mo sbyar byas te// brgya byin tshangs pas
209b1: 'di skad smras/ / skal ldan chen po kye khyod ni// ci phyir nged la mngon par dga'// re ba ci 'dra ci la bsams// ci 'dod pa ni smra bar gyis// drang srong rnga bong gis smras pa// gza' dang rgyu skar skar ma rnams/ mkha' la ci 'dra byung/
209b2: gyur pa'i// sngon gyi bskal pa bdag gis dran// nyin zhag du ni chu skur rnams// re re nas ni rgyu bar byed// tsha rabs kun tuchu skar gyi// yon tan las rnams rnam par shes// bskal pa bzang po 'di la ni// 'di ni ci yang mi
209b3: snang na/ snying rtser bgyis te khyod kyis ni// rgyu skar go rims kun zhog shig/ ji ltar 'jig rten 'dir gnas bzhin/ de yi las dang yon tan gsungs// yon tan rgya mtshos shod cig ces// lha yi tshogs rnams kun gyis
209b4: smras/ / drang srong rnga bong gis smras pa// re shig dang por smin drug ces// rgyu skar dkyil 'khor thams cad la// nang gi dang por gzhag par bya// ji ltar smin drug gzhag par bzhin// 'di la su zhig dad pa 'bul// lha yi bu
209b5: ni nyi ma yang / / skar mi tshogs ni ston par byed// smin drug rgyu skar de dag ni// mkha' la rtag tu rgyu bar shog/ thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor dag gnas// me lha zhig ni sprul pa byas// gzi brjid chen po drang srong lha// me bzhin
209b6: 'jug gi bus smras pa/ / bdag gi sring mo'i bu 'di dag/ gling bzhi por ni gnas par shog/ drang srong rnga bong slar smras pa// dang po smin drug de dag yin// rgyu skar chu yi rus can ni// gnyis pa yang ni yin par bya// skye dgu'i
209b7: bdag gis 'di skad smras/ / bdag gis bu lnga dbul lags te// dus ni drang srong chen po chu// rab tu brtson ldan sngar ma lags// chu yi rus kyi rgyu skar ni// snar ma'i ming gis gnyis pa lags// zla ba'i bu pho gsum po
209b8: ni/ / ming ni mgo zhes bgyi ba lags// ba ra d+h+wa dza'i rus su ni// mgo zhes bgyi ba bzhag pa lags// rab tu mi zad lag ces bya// lha drag rnams kyis bstan pa lags// ljang sngo'i bu yi bu rus su// de ni bzhi par gzhag
210a1: pa lags/ / drang srong bcas pa'i lha tshogs kyis// nyi ma'i bu ni bstan lags te// nam so lags shing gnas 'jog rus// phur bu'i bu ni gsum lags te// lag gi bu yi dus lags shing // rgyal zhes bgyi/
210a2: bar de dag bshad// sa srung gi ni bu lnga po// brtul zhugs spyod pa mkhas pa rnams// mdza bo'i bu yi dus lags te// de ltar de dag rgyu skar bdun// shar phyogs kha 'dzin rnams su gzhag/ de yi las dang go rims dang // sbyor
210a3: ba kha 'dzin bzhud la sa bstan/ / ngas kyang yang ni khyed cag la// gling bzhi pa na gnas byed cing / las ni ci 'dra sgrub byed pa/ mdor ni myur du bshad par bya// phur bu yi ni bu lnga po// byang grol brtul zhug ma tshang ba dag/ ser
210a4: skya'i bu yi rus su ni/ / lho yi phyogs su ngas gzhag go/ dbyangs can gyis ni bu gnyis po// ming gis kyang ni gre yin te// drang srong gau ta ma rus su ni// lho yi phyogs sungs gzhag go// lha mo yi ni bu gnyis po// ming gri
210a5: kyang ni spo yi ni te/ / kau di n+ya yi rus su ni// lho phyog sa kha 'dzin gsum pa gzhag/ sdig pa yi ni bu bstan pa// drang srod kA tA'i bu yi rus// lhar bcas drang srong rnams kyi sa der// ma bzhi zhes ni bya bar gzhag/ dri za'i
210a6: bu ni nag pa ste/ / kAkA'i bu yi rus yin no// sa ri de ni ma yi bu// kA tA'i bu chen rus yin no// 'dir ni sag dpal gyi bu// kA t+yA'i bu rgan rus yin te// drang srong rnams kyi rgyu skar bdun// lho phyogs kha 'dzin rnams su
210a7: gzhag/ mdza bo'i dros bre bzhi po// drag po'i bru yi rus yin te// ming gi se lha mtshams zhes bya ba// nub phyogs su ni gzhag pa yin// dbang po yi ni bu gsum ste// zla ba kA tI bu yi dus// 'jam pa'i las ni thams cad la//
210a8: gnyis pa snron ni gzhag pa yin// sa yi lha mo'i bu gsum ste// snrums ni lag pa'i bu yi rus// rgyal ba'i lha mo'i bu bzhi ste// kA tA'i bu yi rus yin no// thams cad lha zhes bya ba ba ni// maudagal bu yi rus yin no// snams dang
210b1: chu stong chu smad gnyis/ / rgyu skar gsum po gzhag pa yin// sred med bu yi bu gsum po// rgyu skar rnams ni ji bzhin 'khod// khyab 'jug gi ni bu gsum ste// kA tA'i bu pha dpal gyi rus// de ltar de dag rgyu skar bdun//
210b2: nub phyogs kyi ni kha 'dzin yin// nor lnga'i bu ni mon grum ste// drang srong rna ba'i rus yin no// chu lha'i bu ni gcig pu ste// dpe rtsa'i bu yi rus yin zhing // sman ma sbrul gyi lha mo yin// rgyu skar mon gre gnas pa yin// sdig pa
210b3: yin ni bu gnyis te/ / khrums stod ces ni bya bar bshad// chu yi rna ba'i dus su ni// gsum pa 'di ni gzhag pa yin// lha yi drang srong chu lha'i bu// khrums sbed ces ni bya bar bshad// bra nye drang srong rus yin par//
210b4: bzhi pa 'di ni gzhag pa yin// lha yi drang srong rgyal gyi ba// nam gru zhes bya de bstan te// drang srod dbang po'i dus sra/ lnga ba 'di ni gzhag pa yin// d+hi za'i rgyal po'i bu gsum ste// lnga len bu yi rus yin zhing //
210b5: rgyu skar tha skar zhe bya ba// 'jig rten mkhas pa rnams kyis gzhag/ drag po'i bu ni gsum yin te/ bra nye ngan spong rus yin no// rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni// byang phyogs kha 'dzin rnams su gzhag/ rgyu skar nyi shuH
210b6: brgyad po/ / kha 'dzin bzhir ni zhung las bshad// gtor ma las dang yon tan rnams// mdor na nga yis bshad par bya// thams cad rab tu thal sbyar 'khod// lha dang shed las skyes rnams kyis// bang song rnga bong
210b7: la ni smras/ / mi dge sngon du 'gro ba'i las// gang byas khyod ni mi sdug ces// gang du thams cad myur zad 'gyur// 'di na lha dang mi rnams dang // drang srong dag ni zhi ba rnams// thams cad
210b8: gzugs ni bzang po 'gyur/ / rig dang stan ldan de dag kun// drang srong rnga bong de dag ni// brgya byin lhan cig 'khod nas su// 'khor kun rangs ste thal sbyar gyur// bsam pa gcig tu smras pa ni nam mkha' 'di la/
211a1: rgyu skar ni// gang zhig dang por rgyu bar byed// kha zas su ni ci za shod// mi rnams kyi ni las ci sgrub// yid ni ji srid rgyu bar byed// drang srong de dag thams cad la// rnga bong gi ni ji skad smras// ji ltar nga yis brjod pa
211a2: bzhin/ / 'dir ni khyed kyi dad pa phul// rgyu skar 'di la ngas mchog phyin// de ni khyod la brjod par bya'o// go rims shes par bdag bzhin// gling bzhi'i sems can phan pa'i phyir// lo skor yang ni shes par bya// dang por
211a3: nyi ma gang yin pa/ / ngas byas pa ni nga yi mig/ bu drug g.yon can sems rangs pa// de ni nga yis dang por brjod// de yi phyir na sprin drug ni// rgyu skar tshogs ni thams cad du// nang gi gtso bor 'gyur bar shog/ zla banya
211a4: dang nyi ma yi/ / nyin mtshan de dag mnyam par gnas// mtshan mo bzhin ni mun khyab dang // chu lha yang ni gnas par 'gyur// 'gro ba bzod pa'i gling bu dang // zla nye gnas bzhin 'di ltar bshad// mon sman bcu drug
211a5: brgyar bsgyur te/ / skyes bu dang ni brgyad pa cig/ brgyad pa phrag ni bcu drug la// cha ni ci tu 'gyur ba yin// cha ni drug bcu tham pa la// yud tsam cig ni de yin no// de tsam yud tsam sum cu la// 'dir ni 'jig rten
211a6: gnas pa yi/ / ri rab g.yas nas sbyor ba'i cha// yud tsam sum nus 'gro bar byed// 'dir ni mon sran tshad ma u0f7f// bya ba zung ngu bsrub par bgyi// rgyal po nad pas 'gro bkun// zhag bcu tham pa thar par bgyis/
211a7: tudad pas mtshon chas srungs// mchog sbyin khyad kyis bu skye gang // tshong pa dbang po thul ba dang // chos kyi blo gros nas so la// mngal du nying mtshas spro bar 'gyur// 'dir ni grel bya ba mang // chu sad bri nye gsum
211a8: yon/ me bzhi skar ma gro zhen ni// nor rgud byed par 'gyur ba yin// snrums dang skag dang nam gru ni// las dag gi ni rgyu skar yin// khrums stod dang ni sman dang ni// rgyal dang yang ni khrums sad ni// phun sum tshogs
211b1: bar byed ba yin/ mar+g+ha dang chu srod tha skar dang / mon grub dang ni sprin drug dang / nga ba zhes bya ba dag gas ni/ bad ba bsgrub par byed pa yas/ 'di namag dang nag pa dang / man bus dang nam na ga dang // sa re lag na rnam /
211b2: gis// grogs po dang ni grogs mchog 'gyur// lha yi dbang pos 'di skad ces spras// sngon gyi tshen chos gnyis la// yud tsam sum cur mi zad papa/ khya phyir mkha' la khyod gnas kyis// khyod kyis kyang ni la phug dang /
211b3: ram zas la gnas par bgyi// nad pa zhag ni bcu gsum khrol// da ltar skye dgu skye ba med// shin tu tshul 'tshal snying rje spangs// mchod sbyin dang ni skye ba dang / smon la sbyar tshe rtag tu ni// mngal du mtshams sbyor bsrung bar baH/
211b4: nag pa dang ni mon gum dang // mgo la grags pa mang du byed// byi zhin dang ni gre dang dpo// lag dag gi ni rgyu skar yin// khrums spyod dang ni khrums sprad na// rgung byed chu dong chu stong dang // tha skar phun sum tshogs par byed/ snum
211b5: dang skag dang nam gru dang / / pon gre me bzhi sA ra ma ni// bde ba bsgrub par byed pa yin// bra nye dang ni gre dang ni// chu smad chu stod mchog tu 'gyur// khrums stod dang ni sa ri dang // mon grum dang ni nab mo dang / sa ga dang ni lag kyang
211b6: 'dir ni rnam pa drug du 'gyur/ / lha yi drang srong des gsob kyo// snrums bshad pa na tshes gsum la// yud tsam sum cu nam mkha' la// bya ba che chung khyod gnas kyis// zas ni 'bras bu la phug dang / bdug pa dang
211b7: ni me tog te/ / zhag ni sum nur bdag nyid kyis// nad pa yang ni thar par byed// gang zhig spyod par byed pas ni// skye dgu mi skye nor dang 'bru// skal ldan skyes bu'i rnam pa dang / sa la las ni byed par 'gyur// mgo la
211b8: mngal du mtshams sbyor ba/ / rta dang yang ni rnga mo dang // glang po che dang khyu mchog dang // dre dang bcas pa'i rnam par 'gyur// chu stod dang na gre dang ni// zo nya dang ni gsum pa ste/ 'jigs pa'i rgyur 'gyur skag dang
212a1: dang snrums/ / de la 'phel bar 'gyur / ma gru 'grang dang maHma 'gyur te// mon gyi las na rgya sar ma// khrums so cas na pa yang // dal chud par byed par 'byung// marnams nas sa gsum pa / 28
212a2: ni de la rgud byed 'gyur/ / sa ga dang ni mon gre yang // gsum pa zhes ni bya ba yin// tha skar de la bsgrub par 'gyur// chu stod zla ba gnyis pa ste// snron dang rgyal zhes bya ba yang // de la bde bar byed par 'gyur// khrums smad
212a3: ces ni bya ba ni/ / grogs dang grogs po mchog tu 'gyur// drug pa 'di dag lag dang ni// gro zhin snar ma gsum pa yin// smin drug ces ni bya ba yang // byi zhin dang ni dbo yin no// 'di ni khron pas rir gyur// me lha yin tes
212a4: gas bshad/ / gling bzhir tshes ni bcwa lnga la// khyod spyod yud tsam bzhi bcu lngas// 'gro bar byed cing bya ba ni// chen po mi zad pa yis gnas// zhag ni bcwa lnga tham par yang // nad pa yang ni thar par bgyis// su zhig kyang
212a5: ni khyod kyi bu ra/ / dag par rjes su skyel 'gyur ba// gzi brjid dang ni dpal dang ni// longs spyod dga' ba 'bar bar 'gyur// bud med brnab sems shin tu srungs// de skye'i rgyu skar lag yin no// de'i las rgyu skar mon gre yin//
212a6: mchu dang tha kar chu stod rgyu// smin drug ces na bya ba la// de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin// byi zhin dang ni dong yang ni// 'dir ni rgud par byed pa yin// khrums sod dang ni sgron dang ni// nab so yang ni gsum pa ste// lha 'tshams zhes ni bya bar
212a7: yang / de ni phun sum tshogs byed yin// nab so khrums spyod snrums dang ni// nam gru skag ni bde byed yin// gre dang yang ni chu smad dang // gsum pa bra nye bsgrub pa yin// mnga' bo dang ni mdza' mchog tu// de dag der ni 'gyur ba yin//
212a8: nag pa sngar ma mon grum bzhin// mig gnyis ma bzhi gro zhin yang // 'dir na de bdun lho phyogs kyi// kha 'dzin phrugs shes bya ba yin// / 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo//
212b1: bam po bcu pa// / mdza shes kyi ni lha mo yis// yar gyi ngo yi tshes gcig la// 'gro bar byed pa'i go rims kyang // lha 'tshams la ni smras pa yin// bra nye tshes ni bcwo lnga yin// nyin par yang ni yud tsam yin/
212b2: mtshan mo yang ni de tsa ma de// nyin mtshan cig la bra nye yin// chu yi lha mo de yang ni// nyin dang mtshan du mnyam pa ste// yud tsam sum cu tham pa ste// de yi longs spyod thar cig shog/ rgyal po legs bstan snying rje spangs//
212b3: 'thun pa yul 'khor sto ba bzhin// de bzhin du ni mi zad pa'i// za nye yang ni 'gro bar shog/ 'dzam gling 'di la ston par shog/ de bzhin khyed cag thams cad kyis// de la dmod pa bor bar gyi// de bzhin 'gro la bstan par
212b4: bgyis/ / kun gyis smras pa/ de bzhin rtag tu gyur par shog/ mi zad pa yi bya ba bgyis// khyod kyis spyod pas gang skye ba// mi yi thu bo mi zad 'gyur// de yi mngal 'jug chu stong yin// bre nye la ni skyes pa'i mi// 'chi ba'i
212b5: tshe na lha 'tshams dang / / khrums stod ces ni bya ba yin// 'di la mkhas pas rtag bya ste// sa ri mon grum ma yin gzhi// dmigs 'gro'i rtsod pa'i gnas dag gi/ bya spang spu gri'i las mi bya// snar mi me bzhi byi zhin ni//
212b6: rgung byed dgra rnams khyod kyis gzhom// khyod kyi las ni che chung kun// gre yi chen bya bar bgyis// chu sbed dang ni lnga yang ni// phun sum tshogs par byed par brjod// sman rnams rten bya sbyin dang dul// gos dang rkyen gyi bya ba
212b7: nga brjod/ / mgo dang nag pa zhes bya dang // gro zhin mchu ni bde bar byed// sa gnas so mon gre ste// de dag lam 'jug sgrub pa yin// stag dang sdu mas shes bya ba dang // tha skar dang ni mchu dang gre// grogs po mchog tu 'gyur
212b8: ba yin/ / bsgrub du mi rung las kyang bgyi// 'di tshe khri gzhom gos dang mal// mdza' bo rnams la'ang brtsam par bya// nyi ma'i bu ni mig dmar ste// drang srong chen po der dbang gtsugs// bcu gnyis khyim du gnas de nas// der
213a1: yod las 'thun grimago ma drug/ der ni dus kyang mnyam pa yin// nyin dang mtshan kyang mtshungs pa yin// da yod tha skar mtshan mo gang // lha mtshams nyin par gnas pa na// khyod kyi ni spang bar bgyi// mkha'
213a2: la spyod cing khyod kyis ston/ / gleng bzhi pa ni mgu bya phyir// 'di ni ji ltar lhags pa bzhin// ngas 'dir gang zhig yang dag 'arjod// lha yi drang srong kun dga' 'gyur// de bzhin khyod ni kun tu song // sprin drug de bzhin ma yi lha//
213a3: bdag nyid gling bzhi der gnas shing // khyod kyis me bzhin mur bya ba gyis// yud tsam sum cur tshal du song // de gang mi yi zas bzung ba// dam pa'i grags dang langs spyod kyang // zlan khyod 'dir yang legs rdzogs// de ltang
213a4: dayis thob pa yin/ / zhag bzhi tham par nang pa ni// myu ra ba kho nar thar pa rabagyis// mngal du 'jug pa med bzhi srungs// chu stong mchi bar byed pa yin// skrag khrums stod smad napa so dang // mon gre 'phel bar byed pa yin// khyod
213a5: kyis bya ba 'di spongs shig/ dmag dang brtsod pa'i gnas 'gro dang // spu gri yi ni las rnams so// gro zhini dang ni nag pa dang // mgo ni gud par byed pa yin// lag dang lbo ni 'dir 'joms byed// byi ba'i bya ba 'di gyis shig/
213a6: dang chung ba gang ci yang // sna ra mas phran sum tshogs par byed// byi zhin dang ni nag par bcas// der ni bya ba gang rtsi dang // gom pa sbyin pa gos dang mal// der ni rgyan gyis rgyan par bya// lag ni bde bar byed pa ste// mon grum dang ni sa ri/
213a7: yang // gsum po dag ni de dag yin// lam du 'jug pa'ang de dag yin// rgyal dang lha 'tshams khrums stong ni// las ngag bsgrub par byed pa yin// mchu snrums skrag dang khrums smad dang // de dang de rnams drag byed grogs// skam
213a8: bzangs bag ma gtong dang gzhon/ / mal yang der ni de bya ste// khyim dang dus shes bya ba dang // mtha' rnams bdag gis brjod pa yin// de ltar bdag gis dus kun brjod// khyod ci drang srong lha mi dga'// bdag gis byed de
213b1: bshad pa bzhin/ / lha dbang drang srong 'khor dang bcas// me yis thal sbyar 'di skad spras// 'byung po kun la phan pa khyod// 'gro ba la ni skyob pa khyod// de ltar shes mnyam je bzhin khyod// yang smras pa/ rnga bong can gyi drang srong
213b2: ste/ / sAr mchu yi rig kyang yin// chu yi lha mo khyod yin na// gsum par yod ni 'gro bar gyis// byed pa chung dang 'bring yin zhing // bzhi bcu rtsa lnga tham pa yis// yud tsam du ni khyod kyis 'gro// drag dang sha ni zas yin no// khyod la
213b3: spyod par byed pa yin/ / gang dag mi rnams skye 'gyur ba// de dag byug cing chos dang ldan// zhag lnga nad pa myur du gsos// de 'dir khyod kyis bstan pa rabagyi/ byi bzhin nam gru mang la du 'jug/ 'chi ba snrums dang mchu bzhin te/
213b4: rgyal dang lha mtshams khrums stod 'phel// dmag 'gro bag ma gtod pa yin// gnas nas 'gro bar byed pa dang // nyo tshong dang ni gzi byed pa// de 'dra ba yi bya ba spongs// sa ri mon grum de dag 'dir// rlud byed dgra 'dir gzhom par
213b5: bya/ me bzhi las kyi rgyu skar yin// che chung thams cad 'dir bgyis shig/ mgo dang nag pa gro bzhin te// de dag phran sum tshogs par byed// ci byed na yang de dag rten// nor byin gos rgyan sna tshogs sgrogs// nam so dang ni sa ga dang /
213b6: mon gre bde bar byed pa ste// de dag la ni lam du 'jug/ sngon ni sgrub par byed pa yin// skag ces bya ba khrums spad ni// drag po'i las dag byed pa yin// chu snod tshwa spad tha skar dang // pra nye khrums stong chu smad mdzal// spos na
213b7: bskal pa bzang po sbyin/ / brtson pa di gzhon pa dang // mal dang khro nau bsham pa yang // 'di la bya ba de 'jug go// yang smras pa/ 'gro ba bzhi dang ldan par ni// mig la khyod ni gnas par 'gyur// mi yi las byA myur du sgrubs//
213b8: yud tsam sum bcu 'gro bar bgyis// zhag brgyad nang pa myur du gsos// khyod zas tshon sha zla ba'i lha// der ni skye dgu gang dag skye// dpa' zhing 'byor par 'gyur ba yin// khyab 'jug bden 'di shin tu srungs// de byed je bzhin de yos
214a1: shad/ zozhin tha skar mngal du 'jug/ chu gnyis gre gro 'chi bar byed// sman gyi tshon byab 'phel// ga dang gzhan bcas thob par byed lam gcod dang gnas nas 'gro// bya bar 'dra sa bar gyis// nams
214a2: rgud par byed pa ste/ / mon ces ga bzhin du shes// bsad pa'i gnas bzhin brtsams par brtsi// brdzun g.yod sangs kyis 'joms par byed// nag pa las kyi rgyu skar te// 'di la che chung thams cad brtsam// lag
214a3: ni bran sa mtshogs par byed/ / mon thams dag zhan ba byed// 'dir na mAn dang sbyin 'dul gnas// rgyun dang gos kyang klo par byed// rgyal da ka' rnams khrums bstod de// de drug lus rba shin du 'brong / snrums pa
214a4: nam gram mchu sgrub byed/ / 'di la gdum pa'i las kyang bya// me bzhi dgra zlane pra nyo dang // sngar ma dbyer med chu gnyis bzhin// skal bzang bag ma gtod drang gzhon// ma la kun 'dir ni byed du chug/ lag la drig mos
214a5: de tshe spras/ / tshi sa lA la ni khyod gnas te// yud tsam bcwo lnga khyod 'gro byed// khyod kyi zas ni mar sar te// zag cing mi zad sdang byed sgrub// nang pa yang ni zhag bcu yin// khyod la smad pas mi ga n+d+he/ srid pa gsum dum
214a6: zad 'gyur/ / nor tshol byed cing tshol pos 'chi// khyod kyi sbyor bas de yin no// min gru snron la mngal du 'jug/ chu dang nam lus 'phel bar 'gyur// po chen 'chi bar byed// chu gnyis bra nye de bzhin no// skye dang 'dzeg dang
214a7: 'phel ba yin/ / byed pa de ni sang bar gyis// lha mtshams dang ni thams da da// byed pa bstan nas rgud par byed// pa ri sa ni rgyu sar yin// byed pa chung ngu thams cad 'jug/ sa ga 'i man grang // kha sa rbAn+ta
214a8: sum tshogs par byed/ / khrum sma pa ni bde byed yin// smon dang zhag ne lam na mnyam// the ni sgrub par byed pa ste// chu stod tha skar gsum pa yin// me bzho bar can grogs mchog ste// spen drug nag pa ze zhon da
214b1: byi zhin bag ma gtor dang bzhon/ / mal dang skal pa bzang por sgrub// nyi ma'i lha mo nab sos spras// tshes drug la yang gnas par 'gyur// sbrul khyod kyi zas su shog/ las kyang drag por bya bar bgyi// yud tsapa bzhi
214b2: bcu rtsa ldan 'gro/ / 'dir ni nad pa zhag brgyad yin// khyod spyad su yed mi nang ste// zhing ba longs spyod ldan par 'gyur// rta dang glang chen zad par 'gro// na sos mngal du 'jug par 'gyur// 'di ni mon 'gro'i zas yin
214b3: te/ / smin drag la ni 'chi bar byed// khrums spad zud par byed pa yin// skag snron las kyi rgyu skar yin// sa ga brtul zhugs bstan pa yin// rgyal yang phun sum tshogs par byed// lag dang la mtshams zhes bya dang /
214b4: khrums maud kyang ni bde bar byed// mchu dang nam gru bzhin du sa// de dag lam du zhugs na bzang // bra nye chu smang gre dang po// sgrub byed nag pa grwa bzhin dang // sa ri snang ma mgo mon grum// mi la nang khyod grogs pa
214b5: 'gyur/ rgyal 'dir lha mo phur bu khyod// chos bdun gnas khyod yad sum cu// 'gro byed bur ma spyad rtse zas// chos ldan byed chung myur du bsgrubs// nad kyang shag la khon so// khyad stong su yang mi dad te/
214b6: tshul dga' chos smra ma dun 'don rnon// zhing ring bag gtong de dag 'jigs// khrums spyod dngon lha mtshams la// mngal du 'jog par byed pan// debo dang yang ni tha sa dang // chu smang la ni 'phel bar byed//
214b7: mdag pazo zhan pa che// gsum par dag shes par bgyis// mchu snrums na pa~M gru de dag gsum// rgad byed mkhas pas shes par bkres// lha 'tshams byed pa thams cad la// las ngag gi ni rmus /
214b8: pas shes pa kho nar bgyis// sngon ni phun sum tshogs par byed// khrims smad skag gis thob bye gre// chu stod tha skar gsum po bde// me bzhi sgrub min drug dbyer med// de bzhin mkhas pas gsum zhes 'gyis//
215a1: sa ri grogs dang grogs mchog ste// mgo dang lag dang mon gru bzhin// sa ga dang ni mon gre yang // don ni 'bras bur bcas pa yin// sbrul gyi lha mo skag 'dir smras// tshes brgyad la ni khyed gnas kyis/ yud
215a2: tsam bcwo lnga khyod 'gro byed/ / god pa'i she nas zas yin no// 'gro ba'i nang du gshin rje yi// byed pa mi zad khyod gnas kyis// nyin der khyod spyod su mir skye// khrod zhing sdig pa can du 'gyur// shin tu mi sdug tshul khrims
215a3: nyams/ / chos gos gding bzad 'gyur zhing // khrums smad ces bya rab mchog la// mngal du 'jug pa ston par byed// me bzhin smin drug/ 'chi bar byed// mgo nums bre ni ro myangs pas// rgud byed chu stod tha skar dang
215a4: snron ni las kyi rgyu skar yin/ / snrums dang nam gru mchu zhes pa// gsum po phun sum tshogs par byed// bra nye la bye dgre dbo dang // gro bzhin chu gnyis khyod thos sgrubs// nag pa snar ma mchu gnyis dang // mon gre lha mtshams
215a5: saM ga dang / / lag dang nab so de dag grogs// khrums stod kyang ni de bzhin no// gshin rje'i yi dgas lha mos smras// tshes dgu la ni khyod gnas shing // yud tsam sum cur nyin mtshan du// til gyis sbyar thug zas yin no//
215a6: sems can byed pa chung 'bring sbubs// zhag brgyad tham par nang pa sos// god ma'i bra nye su mir skye// bsod nams byed par bshad pa yin// brdzun srog shin tu yun rings srung // snrums ni las kyi rgyu skar yin// 'dir
215a7: yang nam grus mngal du 'jug/ sa ga la yang 'chi bar byed// lag ces bya ba kho na dang // mo na gre yang ni gsum pa yin// snar ma dang ni nag pa dang // gsum pa gro zhin 'dir dga' byed// bo dang bra nye rgang byed yin// chu
215a8: smad phun sum tshogs par byed/ / tha skar dang ni gre dang ni// mchu gnyis 'phel bar byed pa yin// gsum po de dag shes par gyis// mo bzhi dang ni byi zhin dang // smin drug kyang ni bde bar byed// sa re de la sgrub pa
215b1: yin/ / mgo gnyis dang ni mon gru bcas// de gsum rje grogs shes par bgyis// sgron rgyal lha mtshams chu stod dang // nab so lhag par zla ba'ang yin// skal ldan lha mo gre yis smras// tshes bcu la ni khyod gnas shig/
215b2: bil ba mar sar zas yin te// yud tsam sum bcu khyod kyis 'gro// 'gro 'dir bya ba chung ngur bsgrubs// zhag bdun nad pa khyod bcad pas// su zhig mir skye dri dga' 'dod// gos dang rgyan dag 'dod pa yim/ bye brag phyed
215b3: rnams su srung ba/ / tha skar la ni mngal 'jug 'gyur// nam sos mchi mgo zi ni ro myangs// 'phel byed smin drug rgud par byed// me bzhi'ang mkhas pas mngon shes bgyis// gri zhes bya dang bra nye dang // chu smad ces ni bya ba gsum
215b4: phun sum tshogs byed shes par bgyis/ / 'di ni sa ga mon gre yang // sgrub yin lag pa'i dbang po ste// snar ma nag pa gro zhin nyid// mkhas pas grogs gnyis shes par bgyis// rnam pa drug du 'gyur ba ni// skrag dang na mgru rgyal
215b5: dag dang / / snrums dang snron zhes bya ba dang // khrums gnyis gang yin 'dir yin no// lhag par yang ni de bzhin du// thams cad kyang ni 'grang bar bgyis// mkhas pa blo gros ldan pa yin// rang gi thams cad shes par bgyis// gre dbo
215b6: nyi ma'i lha mos smras/ / tshes ni bcu cig khyod gnas kyis// yud tsam bzhi bcu rtsa lnga yis// khyod ni rnam par gro bar bgyis// mgo yis las ni chung ngus kyang // sa bon thob cing skyed bya ste// zhag bcur nad pa zhi bar bgyis// khyed
215b7: s+yAd snyed gu gang 'thung ba/ / snang zhi bsnyen gnas gnas pa'i dang // sbyin thal 'gre le sdang mo sdug/ drug gis 'chi bar 'gyur ba ste// de yi mngal 'jug pa nye shog// nam gru mon mo 'phel bar byed// lag ces bya dngas gdang /
215b8: smon zhes bya ba gsum pa ste// de dag 'chi bar byed pa yin// khrums sbed dang ni rgyal yang 'dir// rgung byed yin par shes par bgyi// skar ma dang ni chu smad kyang // de'i las chu skar shes par bgyis// me bzhi 'ang phun
216a1: sumatshogs byed cing / byi zhin dngan sngon drug kyang // bde bar byed pa'i gnas yin te// bon kyus dang ni mgo zlab byed// nam sa khyams stong lha mtshams 'dir// mkhas pa bzhin du 'ang shes par
216a2: bgyis/ / grogs dang grogs mchog tha kar te// ma chu dang nam gra gag dang bcas// snrubs dang khrims snang ces bya ba// drug pa de dag nam mkha' la// nyi ma'i lha mo lhan cig par// mkhas pa yis na shes
216a3: par gyis/ / bcu gnyis khwa sbar rgyal byed pa'i// dpal las bya bar myur mi zad // yud tsa bi sum cur 'gro bar bgyis// sems can rnams la phan par byin// em khyad zas l+h+wam mchu bshar// nag ldan
216a4: pabasrur du gsos/ / der gnas skye dgu gang skye ba// dbang phyug gtso bo nor ldan yin// chom rkun rnams ni 'dul byed mchog/ sbyin dang dul bar byed pa yin// mchod sbyin rnam pa sna tshogs kyi// mchog sbyin byed par
216a5: 'gyur ba yin/ / byang chub kyi ni yan lag bdun// go 'phang srung bar byed pas na// de mi grags pa mngal 'jug kyang // skag ces bya ba kho na yin// lha 'tshams mchi bar byed pa ste// de mi 'phel byed nam so yin//
216a6: khrums stod ces ni bya ba yang // las kyi b+ha kar dbyer med pa'o// sa ri yon gru 'dir gung byed// 'dir ni mgo yang gsum pa yin// bun sum mtshogs byed 'dir gro bzhin// sa ra sngar ma'ang gsum pa yin// men gre bde//
216a7: bapar byed pa ste// 'dir ni sa ga lag gsum pa// sngon dang rgyal yang sgrub pa ste// 'dir ni khrims smad gsum pa'ang yin// grogs dang grogs mchog 'di drug ste// chu stong mchu dang thaHra dang // chu skad ces ni bya
216a8: ba dang / / gre dang bra nye 'chi bar byed// dga' byed lha mo nag pas smras// khyod mkha' myur song yud sum cur// mi zad las byed myur gnas shig/ yan lag smras pa'ang khyed kyis bza'// zhag drug nad pa myur
216b1: khyod la gnas pas skyed pa/ / gdang rnam ma'am khas 'gyur// smyan dga' 'dang sa sa 'phrul bya// mang ma dpes ju/ yan// bka na pan byub dang // mnan pa par pas/
216b2: sa bya gsum pa'ang yin// khrusas smad sel bar byed pa ste// snron dang rgyal ni gsum pa'ang yin// de silas kyi b+ha ga ni// gro zhin yin gyis 'grang bar bkres// 'do ni min gra rbad par byed/
216b3: sag 'dang lag gsum pa'ang yid// mag ni sren su ma tshogs byed 'ding // sa ri mon gram gsum pa'ang yin// 'dir yang lham tshams bde bar byed// mgo zhes kyang ni bya ba dang // khrum snyed ces na bya ba dang // ga kyang
216b4: 'di ni sgrub pa yid/ / grogs dang grogs mchog rnams nam grwa// 'dir drug tu smad srin drug dang // the nya dang ni sgo dang yang // sa bon me dngas ri swA// phams 'dir sgras sring bzhi par // mkha' la byed sa chom brgya
216b5: na pa yid su 'gro ba'i gling ba'i bar/ / rdza yang dag thos khyong sa shig+sa/ koganas shin pa yin/ ga/ ljang nang pa sbyang drugasos// thaMd spyad ste dkyus skyeb// brtsis pa 'arjir ste tho bar babyung// 'di nyi
216b6: 'ag+sa ga/ / khang pas da par byed// 'a nan // gam pa // na // ma kyi da pa pa // 'di da pags /
216b7: de la je bayin// nam grwa sngon mdza' thagar dang // mchu blams de dag mchog tu mdzad// byi zhin tshangs pa'i lha mos smras// / chos drugs pa' la khyod yud song // mi bdapra ba 'byung bu'i phyir// sang sa yang mi rjod
216b8: shig/ khyod la sems can su gnas pa// dpa' zhing sa na thub 'byor rgyal gtso// yul 'khor grong 'joms dgra thul ba// dpo la de ni mngal du 'jug/ de la 'phel med 'chi ba med// de yi rgyulta kun grogs mchog/
217a1: gro zhin khyab 'jug lnga song smras// nga'i g.yas tshes bdun 'dir pyod song // sum cu'i yung ga bur ma zas// 'brog byed bya ba chung nga bsgrubs// khyod gnas skye dgu su skye ba// mkhas par byed pa'i mtsho
217a2: yin te/ / grogs stod rnams kyi mchod pa yin// 'dir dam bzhis mngal 'jug yin// rgyal zhes bya dang lha mtshams dang // khrims stod la ni 'phel bar byed// mchu snrums gro shin mchi bar byed// sngar
217a3: ma las kyi rgyu skar yin/ / sa ri mon gre lag rgud byed// mon grum mog zhes bya ba dang // nag pa phun sum tshogs par byed// khrums stong nab so sa ga bde// nam gru nab so sngon skrag bsgrub// rnam drug grogs dang
217a4: grogs mchog ste/ / smin drug chu smad de dag yin// de gnyis gsum pa dpo yang yin// mon gru drang srong nor lhas spras// tshes brgyad yud tsam sum cur khyod// bzhir song las chung khyod khu 'thung // der ni nang btab
217a5: lo cig gsos/ / khyod gnas skye dgu su skye ba// khro zhing rnyed gos dus kyang spangs// nang mis yongs skor mchod sbyin srungs// 'dir de'i mngal 'jug nag pa yin// gre dang bra nya mchi bar byed// chu stod gsum par 'grang
217a6: bar bgyis/ / snron sa gnam gru 'phel bar byed// sa gnas so thams stod rgud// sa ri dang ni mon gre dang // lag ni phun sum tshogs par byed// las kun gnyen gyi shin tu srungs// de yi mngal 'jug skrag yin no// mon gre
217a7: zhes ni bya ba dang / / lag ni mchi bar byed pa ste// ma bzhi dang ni mon gre dang // sngar ma 'phel bar byed pa yin// nam gu de las chu gar yin// bra nye dang ni chu smad dang // ze zhes kyang ni bya ba yang // gsum pa yin te rgud par byed//
217a8: stong mchu dang tha skar ni// phun sum tshogs byed nag pa dang // mon grum mgo ni sgrub par byed// byi zhin dpo ni bde bar bsgrags// rnam drug grogs dang grogs mchog yin// khrums stod khrums smang na ba so 'dir// rgyal zhes
217b1: byadang lha mtshams dang / / sa ga 'dir ni smras pa yin// chu stong gzhi yi lha mos smras// tshes bzhi'i mtshams khyod mkha' la song // n+ya gro d+ha ni zas yin te// yud tsam sum cur 'gro bar byed// gdab mo chu yi las phyir yin//
217b2: bdag na gyur nang chung bar 'gyur// khyod spyad skye dgu der su skye// chos gnas brtson chos longs spyod ldan// mkhas pa dag dang phrad pas yis// bya ba kun la mkhas pa yin// de spyi'i rgyu skar 'dir mchu yin// 'dir las rgyus pa//
217b3: tha skar yin// nag pa mog dang mon grub 'phel// sa ga khrums stong na bso ni// 'dir yang 'chi bar byed pa yin// do ba ni 'dir yang rgud par byed// smin drug byi zhin gsum pa'ang yin// 'di ni phun sum tshogs byed gre// bra nye chu
217b4: smad gsum pa'ang yin/ / khrums dang sa ri mon gre sgrub// me bzhi snar ma gro zhin bde// grogs dang grogs 'bring rnam drug ste// nam gru rgyal dang lha mtshams skag/ snron dang 'dir ni khrums spad yin// chu smad drang srong kun ltas
217b5: smras/ / chos lngar bzhi bcur la yud 'gro// khyod chud spu byar khyod zas mngang // zhag bdun nad gsos skye bsrungs// khyod spyad skye dgu su skye ba// bu ldan yin zhing nad kyang med// grogs mang rab tu 'byor pa ste// mngal du 'jug pa'ang
217b6: chu stong yin/ / mon gre dang ni lag dang ni// sa ri kho nas 'phel bar byed/ khrums smad dang ni lha mtshams dang // rgyal yang 'dir ni 'chi byed yin// gshin rje'i lha mo la mgos smras// rgyal zhes bya dang lha mtshams dang // bla
217b7: smad bde bar byed pa ste/ / tha skar mchu snrums sgrub pa yin// dobo zhes kyang ni bya ba dang // chud smad smin drug grogs kyang byed// snar ma byin zhing brtsis nas kyang // gsum pa me bzhi grogs mchog yin// mon gre bra nye'i lha mos smras// /
217b8: gling bzhi'i mkha' la khyod song shig/ yud tsam bcwa lngar zho mar zo// zhag bdun nad gsos las kyang chung// 'dir khyod gnas pas skye dgra skye// khro bar byed cing smad pa yin// chu bran la ni srung bar bgyis// mngal 'jug 'dir ni
218a1: sa ri yin/ / tha ska chu sdums 'phel bar byed// chu smad ces ni bya ba dang // smin drug mchi bar byed pa ste// dbo yang gsum par shes par bya// khrums smad rgyal dang lha mtshams ni// drung byed lag las rgyu skar yin//
218a2: khrums stong na ba so sa ga ste// de dag phun sum tshogs pas byed// sngon skrag na ma gru bde bar byed// gre dang chu stong bra nye srub// gro zhini mgo dang me bzhi dang // snar ma byi zhin grogs mchog grogs// khrums stong drang srong
218a3: gis sras khyod/ / lan chung g.yo byed yud sum bcung // bcu bani chos gling bzhi 'dir song // sha sran khyod zam tag rnams// der ni sems can gang dag skyes// gya byu g.yo chu glan zhing 'thab// ri dgas srog gcod
218a4: yud sum bcur/ / nad pa myur du thar byed cing // skye dgu de dag dmag rkun dang // rgyud dag rtag srungs sag yang // 'dir mngal 'jug yin bra nye dang // chu stong gsum pa ze 'dir 'phel// skar ma byi zhin ki sos byed// thams
218a5: cad bya phyir nab so lag/ chud byed na mgu sngon skag bzhin// phun tshogs khrums smad lha mtshams rgyal// tha skar mchu snrums 'dir bde byed// sprin drug mchud po gsum pa sgrub// mon gru mgo dang nag pa grogs/ thogs mchog
218a6: tshon ma lags de/ / rnams sna nyim sa ma byung// dz+ra ga chos la sa 'alal zhing // srad tsam bzhi pacaH ldang ba // rigs gag to shAg bdun rims// grod byung b+he sra pasmra ba// gdang gangamakhas nor khrum pa/
218a7: ra ga pa stsa la bye// de na sa kyi byin pargyad// sa rnams la byed sbyin da // du ba dpa/ dang ba nga/ mas ky-i y-in// rnam sa dang ang+ya d+hAn
218a8: byed/ nam bu sman gag di bu gas// ma zin byinan gru pa ta// dbang byud pan byed pa// pa dang dag pa dang // sa ma sa lag sa na// ba so nga na pa ga // khon sags sa pazugs mtshan seMn/
218b1: da zong ma rgyal smras kyad// mol 'jam chang b+ha bar byang// bcu pa zhi chos yud sum cur song // gtang ma bur ma mun pa sangs// zhag na nyi bung khyod bsrungs pas// skye dgu zla 'dzangs nor 'bruldan// sbyang dang rab/
218b2: sbyong bya ba dang // dbyig rnam pa dpag tu med pa'ang yin// de la mngal mjug sngon yin te// me bzhi snga ma byi nin 'phel// sa ri mon gram lag 'chi byed// las kyi rgya ska 'dir skrag yon// po dang chu slad sprin drag bang//
218b3: bin nag paskar ma grub// chu skrod ze banye chud byed// ThaH chu snrums bran tshogs byed// nab sas gson gyi grogs// rgyal dang lha mtshams thogs mchog ste// khrums stong drang srong gis sgrub pa// ngi 'i lha mo yud
218b4: sum ban+d+har/ / chos ni bcu bzhi dakhyod song shig/ thung bya'i gtor ma ban rnon sha// 'di na gnyi na lnga nang yin// srog ldan 'bras dkar rgya yis bsrungs// khyod srung skye dgus su skye ba// sman snod byed pa sman pa yin//
218b5: glu gang rol mo'i sgra mkhas 'gyur// 'dir de'i mngal 'dug sdums yin no// nag pa mgo dang gro zhin 'phel// nab so mon gre lag mche byed// skye 'chi 'phel nyi tshod lam 'gyod// thal mo'i drag mkhan las rto//
218b6: spongs// sprin drug/ gre go chu smang gnyis// rgud byed 'dir ni dam pa ma byed// khyod kyis las dag che chung byas// mchu dang tshe 'di tan phran tshogs// chu stod dang ni bra nye dang // gsum pa khrums spad bde bar byed// me bzhin
218b7: snang ma bde bya'i phyir/ / gsad pa'i lam du 'gro ba yin// lag dang mon grums ri sgrub// drag po'i las rnams kun gyis shig/ rgyal dang lha mtshams khrums stod grogs// bya bskal bzang 'dir chud za// skag sgron grogs
218b8: mchog brten pa ste/ / khrums smad 'dir yang gsum pa yin// skal pa bzang dang bzhon pa dang // mal dang shin tu brtan par gyis// drug bdun de dag las bzhin dang // sna tshogs mkhas pas shes nas su// sngon gyi bya ba
219a1: bzhin du bgyis/ / gshin rje'i lha chos bcu bzhir sod// zlan zla ba rangs pa'i tshe// smin drug kyang ni 'gro bar gyis// lha dang mi dang drang srong rnams// byed pa gang gis sngar stan bzhin// zhag ni sum cur zla ba
219a2: rangs/ / nyin dang mtshan ni mnyam pa ste// yud tsam bco lnga bco lnga yin// grib ma'i gom drug 'dir kun 'khor// tha skar gyis ni mtshan mo thob// nyi ma'i mdun na lha mtshams te// lho phyogs su ni nyi ma 'khor// bzhin
219a3: gyi dkyil 'khor mig dmar yin/ / gnyi bu lha srod rab spro byas// khyed kyis zla ba 'di la ni// rtsa dang lag 'grogs gnod sbyin dang // sdig pa las sogs srung bar gyi// cha dang char ni dus gzhag par// sdig pa zhes bya
219a4: khyod phan song / / phyogs dang phyogs su las gzhag par// khyod ni yang dag phan par song // mi mthun 'thun dang 'phel 'di yin// 'gro ba la ni phan pa yin// rjes su 'das pa bdag gis su// dang por bsgrub byas 'di
219a5: yin/ / de nas drang srong rnga bong gis thams cad la thal mo rab tu sbyar te 'khor la go bar byed cing smras pa// 'di ltar bdag gis go rims kyi dang po dang / mtshan mo dengade nyin mo dang // zla ba dang zla ba phyed dang / rgyu skar dang / gza'
219a6: dang / / dus dang / khyim dang / gnas dang / 'gro bar byed pa dang / 'khor ba dang / 'gro ba dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / rnam par shes pa de bzhin du da ltar yang bstan cing rnam par gzhag na/ ci khyed cag 'di ltar rnam par
219a7: gzhag pa dang gdags par d+ha skar dang / gza' yongs sum thab la rjes su yaM rang bar byed ngas// 'on te ma yin// de nas de nyid kyi tshe lham yin dang / mi dang / drang srong dang / lha dang / lag 'grodang/ mi 'am ci'i tshogs
219a8: thams cad kyis thal mo rab gyur ba bdun nas 'dig dacas smras so/ / khyod ni thathams cad kyi tham/ lha da ma yin cu bcas pa'i 'gra ba'i nang na gcag/ mtshungs pa med par mkhas la mngan par ga
219b1: snying sems bskal pa pa rol dran pa'o/ / sems can thams cad la phan par 'ad pa'o// dpal thams cad phun su mtshogs pal// yan tan thanas nad m+b+ha pa la tu phyin pa'o// dus gsum thams cad
219b2: mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin te/ 'di lta bu'i mtshan mo dang / nyin mo dang / skad cig dang / rgyu skar dang / gza' dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed 'dod par byed pa'i ye shes de lta bu su yod pa'i sems can de lta bu su yang lha
219b3: dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na med pa yin no/ / ji ltar khyod kyis da ltar btags pa bzhin du/ bdag cag thams cad kyis dar dad pa byin pa yin/ rjes su yang yi ra ngo // legs ldan legs so// sems
219b4: can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir rgyu skar dang / gza' dang / khyim dang / dus kyis tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i zla ba gnyis pa yang gdags par gyis shig/ drang srong rnga bong gis rab tu smras pa/ bdag gis rgyu
219b5: skar smin drug brjod/ / zla ba nyi tshe zla rangs 'gyur// ston zla tha chung zhes bya ba// 'di ni rab tu brjod pa yin// mtshan mo yang ni yud tsam cig/ yongs su bskor te slar log byed// bra nye dang ni smin drug kyang // lan
219b6: gnyis yongs su 'khor bar byed/ / de bas chu skar thams cad kyang // phyir zhing 'jug par byed pa ste// sna ma gicig bu'ang zla dang// tshes gcig la na mkha' la 'gro// ji ltar sngar bya bshad pa bzhin// de bzhin khyod
219b7: kyi skye dgu sungs/ / de tsam mgo tshes gnyis la 'gro// de tsam lag chos gsum la 'gro// chos bzhi la yang nab so ste/ rgyal yang chos ni lnga la 'gro// tshes drug la ni skrag gi tshigs// mchu yang tshes ni bdun la srung //
219b8: tshes brgyad la ni gre yin te// tshes dgu la ni dobo 'gro ste// me bzhi'ang tshes ni bcu la 'jug/ nag pa 'ang tshes bcu cig la 'gro// sa ri 'ang tshes bcu gnyis la gnas// tshes bcu gsum la 'das pa ste// chos
220a1: bcu bzhi la lha mtshams yin/ / tshes bco lnga la de bzhin ston// 'di ni zla ba phyed du bshad// yar gyi ngo la snrums sgrub ste// tshes cig la ni skye dgu srung // tshes gnyis la ni chu stod yin// tshes
220a2: gsum la ni chu smad yin/ / tshes bzhi la ni byi zhin srung // tshes lnga la ni gro zhan yin// tshes drug la na mon gru tshigs// chos bdun la ni chu lha yin// tshes brgyad la ni khrims stod yin// tshes dgu la
220a3: nirnams smad 'gro/ / tshes bcu la yang nam gru bsrung // de bzhin bcu cig chos tha skar// gshen rje'i lha mtshes bcu gnyis// tshes bcu gsum la me lha mo// tshes bcu bzhi la'ang snar ma yin// zla ba rangs la mtho
220a4: bshad do/ / dgun zla ra ba'i zla ba 'dir // lha yi bla ma phur bu ste// 'di ni lhan cig byed par bzung // de bas bza' zhes bya bar bshad// de phyir nyin ma chos bcu bzhir// yud tsam mtshan mo bcu drug ste// smin drag gis ni
220a5: mtshan mo 'thob/ / snrums kyang nyi ma'i mdun na ste// grib tsho dgom pa brgyad yin zhing // nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed// lho phyogs nyi mar kha ltar 'khor// de bzhin dkun zla ra ba yin// zla 'dir khyim gzhur shes par
220a6: bya/ / mar gyi ngo yi tshes cig la'ang // lag ni sgrub par byed pa yin// tshes gnyis la ni nab so ste// tshes gsum rgyal du shes par bgyis// 'dir tshes bzhi la'ang skag yin te// mchu yang tshes ni lnga la 'gro// chos
220a7: drug la yang gre yin te/ / tshes bdun la yang dbo yin bshad// tshes brgyad la ni me bzhi yin// tshes dgu la ni nag pa gnas// tshes bcu la nis ri 'gro// tshes bcu cig la sa ga 'gro// tshes bcu gnyis la'ang lnga
220a8: mtshams te/ / tshes bcu gsum la sngon yin no// tshes bcu bzhi la'ang sdums yin// chos bco lnga'ang chu stod bshad// yar gyid yi chos cig la// chu smad kyang ni rung ba yin// tshes gnyis byizhin thozhin te// ches gsum
220b1: la ni mon gru 'gro/ / tshes bzhir mon 'gro 'gro rung ste// tshes lnga la ni khrims stong yin// tshes drug la yang khrums smad yin// tshes bdun la ni nam gru 'gro// tshes brgyad la ni tha skar rung // tshes dgur gshin rje'i
220b2: lha mo yin/ / chos bcur smin drug 'gror rung ste// ches bcu gcig la'ang sngar ma yin// tshes bcu gnyis la'ang mgo yin te// tshes bcu gsum la lag kyang 'gro// tshes bcu bzhi la nabs ste// zla ba nyal rgyal yang
220b3: yin/ / zla ba nya ba 'di la yang // 'dir ni rang bzhin brjod par bya// lho yi phyogs su phyin nas kyang // nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed// nyin par bcu gsum shes par bgyis// mtshan mo bcu bdun 'gro bar byed//
220b4: mtshan mo yang ni mchog shes bgyi// nyi ma'i mdun du'ang gro zhin ste// grib tshe dgom pa bcu tham pa// nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed// 'jig rten mkhas pa rnams kyis kyang // 'dir ni spen pa'i zhing snyan pa// 'di la
220b5: mgo yin shes par gyis/ / zla ba gsum pa rnams gzhag nas// zla ba mar gyi tshes cig la// skag ni sgrub par byed pa yin// tshes gnyis la ni mtshur shes gyis// tshes gsum la ni gre yin no// tshes bzhi pa ni dbo 'gro ste// /
220b6: tshes lnga la ni me bzhi 'gro// tshes drug la ni nag pa grub// tshes bdun la ni sa ri 'gro// tshes rgyad la yangs gaste// tshes dgul ni lha mtshams yin// tshes bcu la yang sngon 'gro ste// tshes bcu gcig la snrums 'jug
220b7: byed/ / tshes bcu gnyis la chu stod yin// tshes bcu gsum la chu smad yin// tshes bcu bzhi la byin zhin te// tshes bco lnga la gro zhin 'gro// zla ba yar gyi tshes cig la// mon grum sgrub par byed pa yin// tshes gnyis la ni
220b8: mon gre ste/ / tshes gsum la yang khrums stod yin// chos bzhi la ni khyams smad yin// tshes lnga la ni nam gru 'gro// tshes drug la ni tha skar tshigs// tshes bdun gshin rje'i lha mo yin// de bzhin chos brgyad smin drug
221a1: ste/ tshes dgu la ni sngar ma 'gro// tshes bcu la yang mgo yin te// lag ni tshes bcu gcig la 'gro// tshes bcu gnyis la 'ang nab so ste// tshes bcu gsum la rgyal yang yin// tshes bcu bzhi la'
221a2: skag yin te/ / mchu ni zla ba rab rdzogs byed// dgun zla tha chungs rang bzhin yang // mthar kyis kyang ni brjod par bya// lto lo phyogs su phyin nas kyang // nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed// mtshan mo bcwo rgyad shes
221a3: par gyis/ / nyin par yang ni bcu gnyis yin// rgyal yang mtshan mo 'thob par byed// nyi ma'i mdun na mon gre yin// grib tshod kyang ni sor bcu bdun// nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed// spen pa lha yi bla ma dag/ zhing
221a4: der rab tu brjod pa yin/ / 'dir khyim bum pa mnyam pa med// de pyid zla rab mar gyi dor// tshes gcig gre ni sgrub par byed// tshes gnyis la ni dbo yin no// tshes gsum la ni me bzhi ste// tshes bzhi'i bar du nag pa/
221a5: yin// tshes lnga la ni sa ri ste// tshes drug la ni sa ga yin// tshes bdun la ni lha mtshams te// tshes brgyad la ni snron yin no// tshes dgu la ni snrums yin te// tshes bcu la ni chu stod yin// tshes bcu gcig la chu
221a6: smad yin/ / tshes bcu gnyis la byi zhin te// tshes bcu gsum la gro zhin yin// tshes bcu bzhi la mon gram ste// tshes bcwa lnga la mon gre yin// de ni zla ba phyed yin no// zla ba yar gyi ches gcig la// khrums stod ces
221a7: ni bya ba yin/ / tshes gnyis la ni khrums spyad yin// tshes gsum la ni nam gru ste// tshes bzhi la ni tha skar yin// tshes lnga la ni bre nye yin// tshes drug la ni smin drug ste// tshes bdun la ni sAr ma yin// tshes brgyad la ni
221a8: mgo yin te/ / tshes dgu la ni lag yin no// tshes bcu la ni nab so ste// tshes bcu gcig la rgyal yin no// tshes bcu gnyis la skag yin te// tshes bcu gsum la mchu yin no// tshes bcu bzhi la gre yin te// zla
221b1: rangs tshes bcwa lnga la dgo/ 'dir ni dpyid zla ra ba yin// rang bzhin yang ni brjod par bya// byang phyogs su ni kha ltas te// nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed// nyin par bcu gsum shes par bgyis// mtshan mo bcu
221b2: bdun 'gro bar byed/ / mchus kyang mtshan mo 'thob par byed// nyin par khrums stod 'gro bar byed// grib tshod sor ni bcu gnyis sa// nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/ zhing der lha yi tha ma yang // rnam par gnas pa
221b3: kho nar ni/ / bshad pa yin te 'dir yang ni// der ni mtshan mo 'byung ba yin// dpyid zla 'bring po'i zla do ya// / dang por tshes cig me bzhi ste// tshes gnyis la ni nag pa yin// tshes gsum la nas ri yin// tshes ban
221b4: la ni sa ga ste/ / tshes lnga la ni lha mtshems yin// tshas drug la ni snron yin te// tshes bdun la ni snrums yin no// tshes brgyad la ni chu stod yin// chos dgul ni chu smad yin// tshes bcu la ni byi zhin te// tshes bcu
221b5: gcig la zo zhin yin/ / tshes bcu gnyis la mon grum ste// tshes bcu gsum la mon gre yin// tshes bcu bzhi la khrums stong yin// tshes bcwa lnga la khrums smad yin// de ni zlab phyed yin te// zla ba yar gyi tshes cig la//
221b6: nam thu tshes gnyis tha skar te// chos gsum la ni bra nye yin// tshes bzhi la ni sprin drug ste// tshes lnga la ni sngar ma yin// tshes drag la ni mgo yin te// tshes bdun la ni lag yin no// tshes brgyad yin ni so ste// chos dgra
221b7: lan rgyal yin no/ / chos bcul ni stag yin no// chos bcu ga cig la margya yin no// chos bcu gnyis la ma yin te// chos bcu gsum lan ma yin no// chos bcu bzhil ma ban ste// chos bsal la nag pa yin/ da
221b8: zla'abring po kho na la/ / rang bzhin yang ni brjod par bya// byang gi phyogs su kha ltas te// nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed// 'dir ni phyis kyang yud tsam dag/ yongs su 'khor bar shes gyi ma la ni shig/ ki zhag mamra
222a1: bapar byed/ / nyen par bcu bzhi shes par gyis// mtshan mo 'ang bcu drug shes par gyis// chen po mtshan ma 'thob par byed// nyi ma'i mdun na tha ska yin// zab chad sor brgyad nyim 'khod// nyim 'bun meg
222a2: dmar te/ / gza' rno shin du mi zad yin// khyim lug la ni yang dag gnas// dpyid zla tha chung mar gyi ngo'i// dang po tshes gtsigs ri ste// chos gnyis la ni sa ga yin// tshes gsum la ni lha mtshams yin// ches ngani lani
222a3: sngon yin te/ / tshes lnga la ni sdums yin no// tshes drug la ni chu stod yin// tshes bdun la ni chu smad yin// tshes brgyad la ni byin nyin te// ches dgu la ni gro zhin yin// tshes bcu la ni mon grum ste// tshes bcu gcig la mon
222a4: gre yin/ / tshes bcu gnyis la khrums stod yin// tshes bcu gsum la khrums smad yin// tshe sa bcu bzhi la nam gru ste// tshes bcwa lnga la tha skar yin// de ni zla ba phyed yin te// zla ba yar gyi tshes gcig la// bra nye bsgrub par
222a5: byed pa yin/ / tshes gnyis la ni sprin drug ste// chos gsum la ni sngar ma yin// tshes bzhi la ni mgo yin te// tshes lnga la ni lag yin no// chos drug la nin pa so ste// tshes bdun la ni rgyal yin no// tshes brgyad la ni skrag
222a6: yin te/ / tshes dgu la ni mchu yin no// tshes bcu la ni gre yin te// tshes bcu gcig la dbo yin no// tshes bcu gnyis la me bzhi yin// tshes bcu gsum la nag pa ste// tshes bcu bzhi la sa ri yin// zla rangs tshes ni bcwa
222a7: lnga la/ / sa ga yin te sa ga yi// go rims brjod bya byang phyogs su// kha bltas nyi ma yongs su 'khor// mtshan mo mnyam mtshungs rnam pa ste// bcwa lnga bcwa lngar bshad pa yin// nag pas mtshan mo 'thob par byed//
222a8: nyin par yang ni smin drug yin// grib tshod dag kyang gom pa drug/ nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed// lha min bla ma dpab sangs// 'dir yang zhing zhes gdags pa yin// khyim glang yin te mkhas rnams kyis// zla ba
222b1: bdun po bshad pa yin/ / dbyar zla rab mar gyi ngo'i// dang po tshes gcig lha mtshams sgrub// chos gnyis la ni ston yin// tshes gsum la ni snrums yin no// chos bzhi la ni chu snod yin// tshes lnga la ni chu smad yin//
222b2: ches drug la ni bye zhin yin// tshes bdun la ni gro zhin yin// ches brgyad la ni mon bu ste// chas dgral ni son gro yin// tshes bcu la ni khrums stong yin// tshes bcu gcig la khrums smad yin// tshes bcu gnyis
222b3: lan ma gri ste/ / tshes bcu gsum la tha skar yin// tshes bcu bzhi la bri nya yin// tshes bcwa lnga la smin drug ste// de ni zla byed zla ba yang // chos gcig la ni sngar ma thub// chos gnyis la ni mgo yin te// tshes gsum lani
222b4: lag yin no/ / tshes bzhi la ni nab so ste// chas lnga la ni rgyal yin no// tshes drug la ni skrag yin te// tshes bdun la ni mchu yin no// tshes rgyad la ni gre yin te// tshes dgra la ni dpo yin no// chos bcu la ni ma bzhi ste// chos
222b5: bcu gcig la nag pa yin/ / tshes bcu gnyis la sa ri ste// tshes bcu gsum la sa ga yin// tshes bcu bzhi la lha mtshams te// chos bcwa lnga la sngon yin no// dbyar zla ba'i rim brjod bya// byang phyogs kha ltas nyim
222b6: 'khor/ / 'phel byed nyin pa rabacu drug tA// shes bya mtshan mo'ang bcu bzhi yin// sags mtshan mo 'thob par byed// nyi ma'i mdun namago yin no// grib tshod dgom pa bzhi yin te// 'di ni yongs su 'khor bar byed// der
222b7: zhing gza' ltag nyi ma'i bu/ / 'jam por byed pa'i gza' yin no// sbyor ba'i khyis yin nyin par 'gro// brgyad pa yin par brjod par yin// dbyar zla 'bring po'i ches gcig la// snrums ni sgrub par byed pa yin// chos gnyis la
222b8: nichu stod yin/ / tshes gsum la ni chu smad yin// tshes bzhi la ni byi zhin te// ches lnga la ni gro zhin no// tshes drug la ni mon grum ste// chos bdun la ni mon gre yin// tshes brgyad la ni khrums stod yin// ches dgul ni khrums
223a1: smad yin/ / tshes bcu la ni namagru ste// tshes bcu gcig la tha slar yin// tshes bcu gnyis la bra nye ste// tshes bcu gsum la smin drug yin// tshes bcu bzhi la snar ma ste// tshes bcwa lnga la mgo
223a2: yin no/ / de ni zla ba phyed yin te// zla ba yar gyi tshes cig la// lag ni sgrub par byed pa yin// tshes gnyis la ni nab so yin// tshes gsum la ni rgyal yin no// tshes bzhi la ni skag yin no// tshes lnga la ni mchu yin no// tshes
223a3: drug la ni gre yin no/ / tshes bdun la ni dbo yin te// tshes brgyad la ni me bzhi yin// tshes dgu la ni nag pa ste// tshes bcu la ni sa ri yin// tshes bcu gcig la sa ga ste// tshes bcu gnyis la lha mtshams yin// tshes
223a4: bcu gsum la snron yin te/ / tshes bcu bzhi la snrums yin no// zla nya zla bar chu stod yin// bdag gis dbyar 'bring rim brjod bya// byang phyogs bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor ltas// nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed// nyin par
223a5: yud tsam bcu bdun te/ / mtshan mo yang ni bcu gsum yin// sngon gyis kyang ni mtshan mo 'thob// nyi mar bcas na nab so yin// grib tshod dgom pa gnyis yin te// nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed// zla ba zhes bya zhing yin
223a6: te/ / lag dang yang dag len pa yin// 'di khyim sbal ba zhes bya ba// zla ba dgu par bshad pa yin// dbyar zla tha chungs mar ngo yi// tshes gcig la ni chu smad sgrub// tshes gnyis byi zhin gro zhin te// tshes gsum la ni mon grum
223a7: yin/ / tshes bzhi la ni mon gre ste// tshes lnga la ni khrums stod yin// tshes drug la ni khrums smad yin// tshes bdun la ni nam gru ste// tshes brgyad la ni tha skar yin// tshes dgu la ni bra nye ste// tshes bcu la ni smin drug
223a8: yin/ tshes bcu gcig la sngar ma yin// tshes bcu gnyis la mgo yin no// tshes bcu gsum la lag yin no// tshes bcu bzhi la nab so yin// tshes bcwa lnga la rgyal yin te// de ni zla ba phyed yin no// zla ba yar gyi tshes cig/
223b1: la/ skag ni sgrub par byed pa yin// tshes gnyis la ni mchu yin no// tshes gsum la ni gre yin te// tshes bzhi la ni dbo yin no// tshes lnga la ni me bzhi ste// tshes drug la ni nag pa yin// tshes bdun la ni sa ri ste// tshes
223b2: brgyad la ni saM ga yin/ / tshes dgu la ni lha mtshams te// tshes bcu la ni sngon yin no// tshes bcu gcig la snrums yin te// tshes bcu gnyis la chu stod yin// tshes bcu gsum la chu smad yin// tshes bcu bzhi la bya
223b3: zhin te/ / zla ba rangs la gro zhin no// bdag gis dbyar tha'i rims brjod bya// de bzhin byang gi phyogs su ni// nyi ma 'dod phyed ltas te 'khor// nyin par bcwa brgyad thob nas kyang // mtshan mo yang ni bcu gnyis te//
223b4: chu stod kyis ni mtshan mo 'thob// nyi ma'i mdun na mchu yin no// grib tshod dgom pa phyed yin te// nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed// 'dir zhing nyi ma ldan pa yin// sas kyang gzer ni gtong bar byed// 'dir khyim ser
223b5: ged shes par bgyis/ / bzla ba bcu po bshad pa yin// ston zla ra ba mar gyi ro'i// dang por tshes cig mon gru ma sgrub// tshes gnyis la ni mon gre ste// tshes gsum la ni khrums stod yin// tshes bzhi la ni
223b6: khrums smad yin/ / tshes lnga la ni nam gru ste// tshes drug la ni tha skar yin// tshes bdun la ni bra nye ste// tshes rgyad la na smin drug yin// tshes dgu la ni skar ma te// tshes bcu la ni mgo yin no// tshes bcu gcig la lag
223b7: yin te/ / tshes bcu gnyis la nab so yin// tshes bcu gsum la rgyal yin te// tshes bcu bzhi la skrag yin no// tshes bcwa lnga la mchu yin te// de ni zla ba phyed yin no// zla ba yar gyi tshes gcig la// gre ni sgrub par
223b8: byed pa ste/ / tshes gnyis la ni dbo yin no// tshes gsum la ni me bzhi ste// tshes bzhi la ni nag pa yin// tshes lnga la ni sa ri ste// tshes drug la ni sa ga yin// tshes bdun la ni lha mtshams te// tshes brgyad la ni snron
224a1: yin no/ / tshes dgul ni snrums yin te// tshes bcul ni chu snod yin// tshes bcu gcig la tshwa spyad yin// gro zhan gyi zhin tshes bcu gnyis// tshes bcu gsum la mon gram ste// tshes bcu bzhi la
224a2: mnam yin/ / zlab nya ba zla dngas la// khrims snod cas ni b+ha ba yin// bdag gis ston zlar rim brjod// lho phyogs nyi ma'i 'khor mo ldo// nyen par yang ni bcu badran ste// mtshan mo yang ni bcugasu ma yin/
224a3: xxx/ xxx
224a4: xxx/ xxx
224a5: xxx/ xxx
224a6: xxx/ xxx
224a7: xxx/ xxx
224a8: xxx/ xxx
224b1: bdag gis brjod par bya/ / lho yi phyogs su kha bltas te// nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed// nyin par bcu drug 'gro byed cing // mtshan mo yang ni bcu bzhi yin// khrums stod kyis ni mtshan mo 'thob// nyi ma'i mdun na rag pa
224b2: yin/ / grib tshod dag ni gom bzhi ste// nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed// lha min bla ma pa bsangs// gza' ni zhing la rnam par gzhag/ 'dir khyim srang zhes bya ba bzhag/ zla ba bcu gnyis bshad pa yin// yongs su 'khor
224b3: bde yis ni/ / lo na de ltar 'gro bar byed// mig stong yang dang yang du ni// 'dras te chos kyi phyogs la ltos// khyod ni shes rab bzhin yin na// chos ma yin pa'ang bzlog par gyis// chos gnas tshul khrims phun sum tshogs//
224b4: zos phyug mkhas pa bsam gtan pa// de dag khyod kyis chos gos dang // bza' btung rnams kyis rjes su srungs// yang dgaganas te brgya byin gyis// rnga bong la ni thal sbyar nas// rab tu smras pa bdag cag gis// bya ba yang
224b5: ni sgo bar gyis/ / smras pa lha yi bla ma khyod kyis mu// rtag par tshangs par spyod pa srangs// rigs sngags sman dang gsang sngags rnams// thams cad la ni bya ba sgrubs// las kun drang srong zla ba dang // zla ba chung dang zhag dang bzhi//
224b6: gzo yi las kyi mtha' kun la// gtso bo yin par bkod pa yin// drag po dung gi sna can dang // dgon pa dang ni lcib ste// gnod sbyin bzhi po de dag ni// mchog sbyin rib mar gtso bong bkod// rgya mtsho chu lha 'jog po dang // rin chen skyong
224b7: dang ring du 'gro/ / ma yid ches dang zla srungs dang // gnas thar byed pa rgya mtsho ni// gtso bor gzhag te mngos dang // khab kyis lus pa'i sa chu lhas byin// ri dag pa 'khrug pa sred bzhi// grwa rnams kyis ni gtso bor bkod// khyod ni dge ba
224b8: bskyed pa/ / ne co yi ni khyab byed pa// mkhas pa zhing gi gtso bo ste// de 'dra ba ni ji lta bu// khyod ni snying po kho nas kyang // me yi brtse mo'i gtso bo ste// khyod ni rlung mar 'gul g.yo' ba// rlung yang pa yi gtso bo yin// rdo rje'i mig dang
225a1: se ge'i mig/ legs mthong lag nam drang gsum thogs// l+h+wa ma bzhi pa de dag ni// grong khyer gtso bar bkod pa yin// god ma'i char skyes rtsibs mu gyud// 'khor lo spen pa gnod sbyin pa'i// de dag rin
225a2: chen rtag pa la/ / nye tshong byed pa'i gtso bor bkod// phyogs mtshams su ni bzhi yin te// bsrung ba'i phyir ni yang dag gnas// yul 'khor grong khyer thams cad du // srung ba'i phyir ni 'byung po bkod// drang srong dag ni
225a3: thams cad dang / / lha yi tshogs dang klu rnams dang // lha ma yin dang mi rnams kyi// bar yang rjes su yi rang byed// lung bstan rab tu rgyal ba mchog/ zag po yi ni gtso bo ste// khyod ni skye dang 'gag pa dang // zas dang rod
225a4: me tog mchog/ khyod ni dri 'phel byed pa ste// shra dag rdzogs byed 'bras bu'i mchog/ khyod ni lam bde skyed pa ste// rnam par mche las rgyal ba'i btso// dga' bo dang ni nye dga' gnyis// ri bo rnams kyi gtso bor bkod// nor
225a5: rgas bu dang thang shing zhing / / lci mchog mig dmar spags byed skeskam// / khyod ni dbyangs can chu yi gtso// khyod ni sgrub dang yid 'phrog pa// zla ba 'phrog par byed pa ste// bcud kyi len gyi btso bo yin// gza' dang rgyu skar dus kyang
225a6: yin/ / khyim bdag thams cad rnam par gzhag/ rgyal po chen po bzhi yang ni// skal ldan rgyur ni rnam par gzhag/ lus ngan gnod sbyin rnams kyi gtso// grul bum rnams kyi 'phags skyes po// klu rnams kyi ni mig mi
225a7: bzang / / dri za rnams kyi yul 'khor srung // thams cad kyi gling chen po bzhi// gling gzhan brgyad khri thams cad du// drang srong rnga bong gis gang yongs su sbyong ba ma bkod par gtang ba'i gnas ci yang med do// de ltar lha dang /
225a8: klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byas par gyur to// drang srong rnga bong gi bya ba de la
225b1: yang dag par rjes su yid rang bar gyur to/ / bya ba de ni mchod pa dang // rim gro bya bar so sor gnas par gyur to// de'i rjes la shin tu yun ring zhig na drang srong thub pa la ma zhes bya ba byung ste// des kyang skar ma'i dpyad rab
225b2: tu byas so/ / zhag gis mi thub pa dang / shol yod pa yang bshad do// yang de'i tshe drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten ga la bar klu thams cad 'dus te/ de dag drang srong skar ma la dga' ba mchog tu bla ma la gus pa dang bces
225b3: par byed pa skyes te/ de la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir ci nus su brtson par gyur to// 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po'i sde theg pa chen po'i mdo las nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa rdzogs te/ rgyu skar gyi sbyor ba
225b4: rnam par gzhag pa'i le'u rdzogs so/ / // 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo// // bam po bcu gcig pa// rgya mtshos smras pa/ nam mkha'
225b5: la ni rgyu skar tshogs/ / ji ltar gzhag pa bzhin du ni// khyod kyi sngon gyi tsher rabs dran// mkhas khyod srid gsum kun gyi btso// khyod kyi snying rje byams pa dper// shes gsal 'gro la snying brtse bzhin// kun dpal 'di nas
225b6: khyod kyis ni/ / lag 'gro thams cad thar par bgyis// srid gsum tshul brtul mtshungs med khyod// lag 'gro de kun tshim byed khyod// khyod ni drang srong kun gyi b+ha// mi rnams kyis ni mchod par 'os// 'gro ba kun dpal
225b7: khyod la ni/ / sgra dang ba dag 'gro gnod sbyin tshogs// rkyen gyi yul rnams thams cad pa// lag 'gro myur du thar bar gyis// de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' ba dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu yid dad pa bskyed par 'dod
225b8: nas de lta bu'i klu'i tshogs thams cad la shin tu rigs pa'i tshig snyan pa dag gis 'di skad ces smos so/ / yon tan de 'dra bdag la med// drang srong rnga bong bdag ma yin// khyed cag 'di nas thar byed par// bdag gis nus
226a1: ba ma yin no/ / gang gis bskal pa dramar na// dka' thab dka' ba babad pa spyad// rtsed cag thar bar byung ba yin// drang srong gzhan de lta bar gyis// rtag tu brtson ning sbyin pa byed// mkhas shing klung can
226a2: rta dang ni/ / shing rta bu dang chung ma dang // nor gyis sems can phan par byas// rkang lag mgo dang rna ba dang // mig dang lpags pa khrag dang ni// bu bran bran mo bza' btung mad// mal cha kha zas sngon chad btang // snying rje dang
226a3: ni byams pa yis/ / khyed cag thar byed srid gsum na// mtshungs med bsam gtan dga' 'byung ba// de ni drang srong rnga bong ste// kun tu brtse zhing byang chub sems// sngon chad rig byed pha rol phyin// sems can mang po sdug
226a4: bsngal gyis/ / nyam thag pa ni thar par byas// sems can kha gcig gis ched du yang // sngon gyi tshe rabs de bskal par// dmyal bar 'gro bzod de yi dgas// de ni 'jig rten sangs rgyas byung // sems can sdug
226a5: bsngal nyams thag kun/ / sdug bsngal mthar mdzad rnga bor yin// sems can smin phyir brtson 'grus dang // snying rje gtan pos de srid 'khor// rnga bong de ni skyes pa na// rgyal sras bu ram shing pa yi// rigs su zas
226a6: gtsang gi ni sras/ / des ni bcas ma thag tu khya ba// srid gsum bde 'byung 'jig rten dpal// yid bde rnam pa sna tshogs dang // lha dang klu yi bu rnams dang // 'byung po gnod sbyin rgyal pos khyab// der ni mchod phyir thams cad
226a7: lhags/ / de yis gom pa bdun por te// ri dang rgya mtshor bcas pa yi// sa ni thams cad 'khrugs par gyur// 'gro ba kun dga' nad sdug bsngal dang // 'chi bas gzer las ngas bsgral zhing // zhi ba bde ba mya ngan med//
226a8: skam la dgod ces shA ka sras gsungs// me tog dri dang rin chen dag/ lha klu rnams kyis gtor gyur cing // 'byung po'i tshogs rnams sna tshogs kyis// sras po la ni stong gyur pa// bskal pa mang po du ma ra yang //
226b1: sngon chad khyod kyis dul ba dang // sbyin dang bsam gtan dgyes la rten// sems can kun ched sdug bsngal bzod// 'di la skye ba 'di yang ni// thams cad kyi ni tha ma lags// sdug bsngal thams cad zhi mdzad par// /
226b2: ring po mi thogs khyod 'tshang rgya// des kyang dpa' bo brtan par gyur// mtshungs pa med de bud med tshogs// drug khri tham pa spongs nas su// spyod pa rab brtan lo drug sprad// g.yo sgyu can ni sder bcas pa'i// bdud ni
226b3: cig pus bcom nas kyang / / byang chub zhi mchog gzhal med brnyes// mya ngan med lam don dam gzigs// byams dang ye shes thugs rje yis// sems can kun dang mi mnyam zhing // 'byung po dag ni thams cad
226b4: la/ / de ni byams pa'i thugs mnyam pa// sems can gang la'ang tho mi 'tshams// sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las thar bar mdzad cing de yang ni// rnam bcings btson ra thar mdzad pa// ma ga d+ha na de
226b5: gnas shing / / 'gro ba'i nang na chos kyang ston// de la khyod kyis gsol ba thob// byams pa'i yid kyis rnam par ltos// drang srong mchog gi thad du dang // 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las// khyed cag yongs
226b6: su thar bar byed/ / rang nyid kyang ni 'dod par bgyis// dga' mchog bde ba 'dod nams kyis// phyin chad mkha' lding thams cad las// 'jigs pa khyed la mi 'byung ngo // rtag bde sdug bsngal bral dgar gyis//
226b7: btson ra 'di na g.yo sgra can// bdud ni khyed la rnam par 'tshe// ji ltar nga yis bshad pa bzhin// thams cad kyang ni gzung bar gyis// yang de'i tshe drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten du klu dang // klu chen po pho dang / mod pa
226b8: khye'u dang / bu mo gang dag thams cad 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis thal mo rab tu sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so// 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa// chos thams cad kyi dbang gis pha rol tu
227a1: phyin pa/ / sems can thams cad kyis sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad pa// ba ba thams cad sbyin par mdzad pa/ dga' ba thams cad skyed par mdzad pa/ shes rab thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ rtag
227a2: tu byams pa'i thugs dang ldan pa/ / thugs rje thams cad kyis khyabapa// 'phrin las thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa/ lam thams cad smon pa/ yang dag pa'i mig gsung ba/ lha dang klu rnams kyis mchod pa la
227a3: phyag 'tshal lo/ / / srid pa gsum gyi dgra bcom pa/ mchod pa thams cad 'os pa/ bdag cag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi btsonar 'dir 'phangs lags na 'di nas bdag cag thar bar mdzad par
227a4: gsol/ klu de dag dang lhan cig bdag cag gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis klu de dag thams cad sngon gyi lus kyi gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du bkod de/ gnas de nas 'gro bar mi nus so// de dag thams cad
227a5: kyi drang srong skar ma la dga' ba la smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni bden te/ sems can thams cad la bde bar bzhed pa rnam par mi mche ba'i chos nyid yin no// de la bdag cag skyabs su nye bar gnas so// 'di nas
227a6: myur du bzhud cig/ bdud kyi 'ching ba 'di las bdag cag thar bar mdzod cig/ skar ma la dga' bas 'di skad ces smras so// de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i rgyu 'thun
227a7: pa thams cad mkhyen pa thub pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par ldog par bya ba'i phyir dang / byang chub kyil ma rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir dang / rgyu dang 'bras byar
227a8: sems can yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi bar du thob par bya ba'i phyir mang por ma byung ba la dmigs pa dang / nyan thos dang thun mong ba sems can la dmigs pa'i gnas pa mchog
227b1: bstan to/ / yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slob dpon la rig las pa rnams las rgyu las yang dag par byung ba dang / so sor rtags pa la dmigs pa tshangs pa'i gnas pa bstan to// de ltar de bzhin
227b2: g shegs pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed grangs med pa dpag tu med pa rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed na theg pa bla na med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
227b3: dpa' chen po rnams dang / sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sprul ba'i phyir dang / bdud bzhi 'dul ba'i phyir dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi bcad pa'i phyir chos kyi chus khrus mdzad do//
227b4: da ltar shin tu kun tu rtog pa'i nyon mongs pa'i tshogs kyi sems can gyi khams la dmigs pa med pa/ kun nas ldang ba med pa/ sgru ba med pa/ gzhi med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ chags pa med pa/
227b5: rnam par gzhag pa med pa/ rdul med pa/ mun pa med pa/ snang ba med pa/ gzung ba med pa/ gsal byed med pa/ spyod pa med pa/ tha mi dad pa nyid ces bya ba nas phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / 'byung ba chen po thams
227b6: cad dang / mig gi rang bzhin tshor ba po med pa'i sred pa zhes bya ba'i bar nas/ yid kyi rang bzhin tshor ba po med pa'i sred pa'i bar la smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / 'jug pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings
227b7: dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / de bzhin nyid 'dres pa med pa dang / gang 'jug pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis sgrol ba/
227b8: byed pa'i ye shes kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yang dag par dmigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa/ dag la yongs su spyod pa byas pa/ sems
228a1: nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa/ mchags pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ lta ba thams cad kyi bag chags kyi nyon mongs pa yang dag par btsam pa/ rnams la tshangs pa'i gnas pa
228a2: dmigs pa med pa ston to/ / kye drang srong skar ma la dga' bas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na yang klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang // klu'i rgyal po lus 'bigs pa'i khab ces bya ba dang // klu'i rgyal po zla ba la rtsub pa zhes bya ba dang /
228a3: rgyal po rin chen skyong zhes bya ba de dag byang chub kyi stod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bsags pa'i smon lam yang dag par rjes su dran pas de dag snang ba dang / rnam par bsgyings pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob par gyur to//
228a4: de'i tshe klu gzhan brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi ni byang chub kyi spyod pa'i rtsa ba sngon bsags pa'i smon lam yang dag par rjes su dran pas byang chub kyi sems mi marjed pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' skar
228a5: ma la dga' ba la de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/ / khyod bzhud la snying rje chen po thob pa gang gis 'dir bdag cag bdud kyi 'ching ba 'di las yongs su thar par gyid pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po thob
228a6: bde la bdag cag gi tshig gis gsol ba thob shig/ de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba la drang srong gi cha byad kyis 'khor drang srong stong phrag mang po dang
228a7: de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ngo/ / / 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po'i theg pa chen po'i mdo las nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa las brgyad pa'o// // bcom ldan 'das la klu thams cad
228a8: skyabs su nye bar gnas pa bdud sdig can gyis thos te/ shas cher 'khrugs shing skrag la rgya shug gi 'dab ma bzhin du lus rab tu 'dar zhing lus rdul nas lag pa gnyis bskrang ste 'di skad ces smras so// lag 'gro rnams
228b1: ni skyabs su dang / / skye dgu thams cad rmongs gyur cing // 'chi med lam la gzhog byed pa// mi zad g.yo rgyu can la ltos// de'i tshe na bdud kyi bu me mun bral ma zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// sems can gang dag
228b2: thos tsam gyis/ / dge sbyong la ni skyabs su mchis// gang dag de'i tshig thos shing // de mthong ba lta smras ci 'tshal// brtson 'grus sna tshogs sbyor ba yis// khyod kyi yun ni ring du gzigs// bka' mchid sna tshogs lhan
228b3: cig mdzad/ / de mi rgyu ni ma skabs sam// bdud kyis slar smras pa/ dge sbyong gau tam brtan pa yin// rang bzhin mkhas pa chen po ste// stong pa'i chos la yang dag zhugs// rgyal nas skye dgu sgrol bar byed// mun bral
228b4: mas smras pa/ stong pa la ni gang zhugs pa// bdud rnams bye bas mi spyod de// byang grol bde ba sbyin gyid pa// de la bdag ni skyabs su mchi// mtshan nyid ma mchis ldan pa yi// de bzhin nyid la gang rten cing // ye shes
228b5: gyini pha rol phyin/ / de la bdag ni skyabs su mchis// sku de bdag gis bslab par bgyi// sems can thams cad rnam par dgrol// chos rnams kun la dbang sgyur ba'i/ blan med sangs rgyas 'grub par shog/ bdud kyi bu mo
228b6: lnga brgya snyed/ / bdud kyi gnas der 'khod nas byang chub tu smon lam btab par gyur te/ bdud sdig can shas cher 'khrugs shing dngangs te/ rmongs nas stobs kyi shugs kyis 'chags par zhugs te/ bdud kyi stobs
228b7: kyi shugs kyis cho 'phrul gyis byin gyi brlab pa de lta bu byin gyis brlabs so/ / gang gis drang srong skar ma la dga' ba de nas song nas ring po cham lon par drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten deng / bdud kyi gnas de nas nam
228b8: mkha' las rdo'i char ba me rab tu 'bar ba'i char mngon par rab tu dbab par brtsams te/ klu thams cad thal bar rlag par 'dod na// bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus der me tog gi char rnam pa sna tshogs rab tubab te/
229a1: klu thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur to// dga' khyab mas smras pa/ kye bdud kyi bu mo dag khyed ltos shig/ 'dzam bu'i gling der dge sbyong gau ta ma la gru gang dag skyabs su dong ba de dag thams cad kyang 'dis
229a2: sdug bsngal mang pos gnod par byed na/ gang dag 'dir 'khod nas dge sbyong gau ta ma la skyabs su dong ba rang gi bu mo khyed la lta smos kyang ci dgos// bdud kyi bu mos 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas skyabs su sems
229a3: can su 'gro ba/ / bdud rnams bye bas gsad par mi nus te// tshul khrims nyams shing blo ni 'khrugs zin kyang // de ni nges par skye ba'i pha rol 'gro// ston pa la ni me tog cig gtor zhing // byang chub smon lam rten po skyed pas na//
229a4: don bdud rnams dmas bsang mi nus// nem nur med par 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur// de yi srab pa'i bzhi ni cig blangs shing // tshig gi don cig tsam yang nyan byed la/ byang chub phyir ni sems kyang bskyed pa de// sems
229a5: can kha lo sgyur 'gyur nem nur med/ / yab klu tshogs 'di mthong ste sangs rgyas kyis// der ni me tog char pa sna tshogs 'bebs// sangs rgyas yul cig gis ni khyod la bsngos// der ni ci yang nus par ma gyur te// gang gis
229a6: sems can de dag sdig zad cing / / bdag cag gi ni las kyi sgrib 'byang ba// ched du lung bstan pa ni der nyan pa'i// rig pa cig kyang der ni ston pas gsungs// de nas bdud sdig can shas cher 'khrugs shing gshe ste/ sdug bsngal
229a7: zhing yid mi bde ba skyes nas mya ngan gyi khang par gcig pu 'dug go/ / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i gnas pa dmigs pa med pa'i gtam gyi tha mar
229a8: 'jug thogs su bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa der phyin te 'dug go/ / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' bas 'di skad ces gsol to/
229b1: zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags bshad par gsol/ gzungs sngags kyi gzhi de bdag gis ni sngon bdag cag gnyis bram ze'i khye ru gnyis
229b2: su gyur pa na lus kyi slad du rgyal po rgyal gyi lha la nongs pa bgyis pas 'gum pa la thug te/ / btson rar stsal nas zla ba phyed zas dang bral zhing bcings pa lngas bcings nas de bzhin gshegs pa man d+ha ra ba'i gsung la yid la
229b3: gzhan mi sems par gsol ba btab pa lags so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa man d+ha ra ba'i gsung bdag cag la thugs brtse bas rang gi gnas kyi shul bkar bzhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi
229b4: xxx/ xxx
229b5: so/ / gsang sngags yid la bgyid pa de dag gis bdag cag dga' ba dang dad pa yang dag par bskyed nas de'i tshe bdag cag gi mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad dang / skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang /
229b6: lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi sgrib pa dang / sbyin pa'i sgrib pa zhes bgyi ba nas shes rab
229b7: kyi sgrib pa zhes bya ba'i bar dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / longs spyod kyi sgrib pa dang / tshe'i 'du byed pas pa'i sgrib pa dang / bsam bzhin du srid par skye ba'i sgrib pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su 'gro
229b8: ba'i sgrib pa yongs su bas shing / der bdag cag bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags thos pa tsam gyis mod la/ mgrin pa 'ching ba lnga las grol te/ btson ra nas rdzu 'phrul gyi yul thob
230a1: par gyur cing / de nas nam mkha' la chos nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa man d+har ba'i gsung gi thang du nye bar la byin to// de nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ri ba'i 'od ces bgyi bar skyes smra/
230a2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi mdog gi thad du rab tu byung nas shes bgyi banas sman chad bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis par sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa rnams su bdag cag ma skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du
230a3: de bzhin dud lhur sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du thams cad du 'di dang 'og min la thug pa'i bar gyis thams cad sems can mi dang mi ma lags pa dpag tu ma mchis pas khyab ste/ de dag ni las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon
230a4: mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi sgrib pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sa zin to/ zhes bgyi ba nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su las yongs su ma dag bdag gis sgribs te/ mchi bar
230a5: mi nus pa lags so zhes bgyi ba'i bar du'o/ / sems can gyi las kyi gzungs sngags thos ma thag tu sems can rnams kyi mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba dang / lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba dang /
230a6: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi sgrib pa dang / sbyin pa'i sgrib pa zhes bgyib nas shes rab kyi sgrib pa zhes bgyi bar dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / longs spyod kyi
230a7: sgrib pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi sgrib po mchis pa thams cad dang / thos ma thag tu skye ba'i sgrib pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu 'gro ba'i sgrib pa mchis pa thams cad yongs su bas par
230a8: 'byur ba dang / chas bsten pa des sems can rnams bzod pa dang ting nge 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs thob par 'gyur ba dang / ji srid 'tsho ba'i mad mtha' bar dri dang mchi ba'i dris bgyis nas sems can rnams ji ltar
230b1: bsam pa bzhin du srid par skye ba len par rngo thog par 'gyur ba dang / tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang / rtag par rgyun tu brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par len pa dang / log par mi
230b2: ltung ba'i chos can rnams su 'gyur ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mngon par brtson pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la mngon par brtson pa dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la rim gro bgyi ba dang / bsam gtan gyis
230b3: rnam par rol pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas bsgom pa la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad du bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du chos de dag dang 'bral
230b4: bar mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das de sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags de legs par bshad par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
230b5: rigs kyi bu gang khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa legs so legs so zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// dge
230b6: srong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa nan su la la theg pa gsum las theg pa gang yang rung bas srid pa'i rgya mtsho las rgal bar 'dod pa ni myur du theg pa de yongs su rdzogs par bya
230b7: bar 'dod pa yin la/ / sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms par 'dod pa yin/ bos pa thams cad kun tu 'dzin par 'dod pa yin/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len thams cad las yongs su thar bar
230b8: 'dod pa yin/ bstan pa srung bar 'dod pa yin/ snyan pa 'dod pa dang / rnyed pa 'dod pa yin/ bza' ba dang bkung ba mang po 'dod pa dang / dbang phyug 'dod pa dang / gzugs 'dod pa dang / stobs 'dod pa dang / 'khor
231a1: 'dod pa dang / nor dang 'bru 'dod pa dang / thu bo 'dod pa dang / mi dang me ma yin thams cad kyis mchod par 'os par 'dod pa yin/ rtag tu lus 'dod pa yin// rtag tu lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kunaH
231a2: gnod par 'dod pa yin zhing myur du bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa dang gzugs dang bzod pa rnam pa sna tshogs
231a3: bsgrub par 'dod pa yin no/ / de ltar yang las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa shas cher 'phangs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shes bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gro ba'i sgrib pa rnams
231a4: kyis bsams bzhin du srid par skye ba blangs pa de'i bar gyis myur du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs de lta bu de dag sgrub par mi nus te/ las kyi sgrib pa de lta bu de dag gis zin pa'i phyir ro// gang zag de khrus byas
